listBibl.head: This edition is based on the edition of the Surasuṁdarīcariyaṁ prepared by Sādhviśrī Mahāyaśāśrījī, which was published with a chāyā. This edition does not contain the Sādhvī’s chāyā.

encodingDesc.p: This file contains the Prakrit text of Dhanēśvara Sūri’s Surasuṃdarīcariyaṃ, which is written in verse and divided into 16 chapters.

Each chapter is placed in a
element, and each verse is placed in a element. Both the chapters and verses are labelled with <@n> attributes. There are small bits of prose in the text which are enclosed in

elements, as well as labels for groups of verses (yugma, kulaka, etc.) which are enclosed in

body.head: ॐ kāraguravē namaḥ ॐ hrīṁ śrīṁ arhaṁ namaḥ gautamasvāminē namaḥ
namōstu ṇaṁ śramaṇāya bhagavatē mahāvīrāya
śrīdhanēśvaramuniviracitam
surasundarīcaritram

lg.l: jassa paṇāmā pāvaï palayaṁ paürōpi vigghasaṅghāō |
tassa risahassa paḍhamaṁ namāmi payapaṅkayaṁ payaō || 4 ||
rāgāiṇō vi sattū pañcattaṁ pāviyā samayaṁ || 5 ||
jīē kamakamalaṁ pāviūṇa pāvinti pāṇiṇō paramaṁ |
nāṇaṁ annāṇā vi hu sā jayaï sarassaī dēvī || 15 ||
jāṇa pasāēṇa puṇa maēvi jaḍabuddhiṇā kahākaraṇē |
līlāē payaṭṭijjaï, visēsaō tē gurū vandē || 16 ||
vōcchaṁ saṁvēgakariṁ kahaṁ tu surasundariṁ nāma || 17 ||
annaṁ ca tassa kīraï paḍhamaṁ ciya patthaṇā khalajaṇassa |
bīhēi kavijaṇō jassa mūsaō iva biḍālassa || 18 ||
abbhatthaṇāsaēhi vi na khalassa khalattaṇaṁ galaï || 19 ||
kuḍilattaṇaṁ na ujjhaï paricchiddagavēsaō ya dōjīhō |
laliē va niṭṭhurē vā kavvē dōsō khalēhiṁ ghēttavvō |
uṭṭhamuhāō ahavā nīharaï na jīrayaṁ kahavi || 22 ||
dujjaṇasahāē paḍiyaṁ nimmalakavvaṁ pi lahaï na païṭṭhaṁ |
āsajja dujjaṇaṁ kavijaṇassa abbhatthaṇā taō vihalā |
na hu sakkararasasittōvi cayaï kaḍuyattaṇaṁ nimbō || 24 ||
ahavā kahāpabandhō kīraï kiṁ dujjaṇāṇa saṅkāē? |
jūyābhaēṇa parihāṇavimōyaṇaṁ handi! na hu juttaṁ || 25 ||
dujjaṇaasaṁmayaṁ pi hu kuṇaï kavī kavvamēttha kimajuttaṁ? |
apatthiōvi suyaṇō kaīṇa kavvē guṇē payāsēi |
dhavalēi jayaṁ sayalaṁ sabhāvaō cēva nisināhō || 27 ||
nindākārijaṇassa vi dōsaggāhī na sajjaṇō kahavi |
kuṇaï suyandhaṁ vāsiṁ tacchijjantō vi malayaruhō || 28 ||
annaṁ ca | havaï hu virūvayampi hu kavvaṁ suyaṇāṇa saṅgamē laṭṭhaṁ |
abbhatthaṇārihāṁ jaṁ suyaṇā tō tē u patthimō iṇhiṁ |
sō antarārivijaē rōgaddōsā ya antarā sattū |
tavvijae cciya sōkkhaṁ tēhiṁ jiyāṇaṁ puṇō dukkhaṁ || 33 ||
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē | rāgaddēsāṇugayā jīvā pāvēnti vivihadukkhāiṁ |
tamhā tavvijae cciya vibuhēhiṁ hōi jaïyavvaṁ || 34 ||
jugavaṁ ṇō sakkijjaï kavīhiṁ ubhayampi kāūṇa || 36 ||
jaō | sālaṅkārēṇa ghaṇakkharēṇa rañjijjaē jaṇō vibuhō |
dōṇha vi ēkkavaēcciya sakkijjaï rañjaṇaṁ na kāūṇaṁ |
ēkkaṁ gēṇhantāṇaṁ avassa kira nāsaē bīyaṁ || 38 ||
niyagurukamappasāyā kāvi hu sattī u jaïvi maha atthi |
tahavi hu tayaṁ na kīraï asamatthaṁ patthuammi jaṁ atthē |
pāraddhā jaṁ ēsā kavittagavvēṇa nō maē tēṇa |
dīvō u atthi tatthavi vittharaō jōyaṇāṇa lakkhaṁ tu |
tassa ya dāhiṇabhāgē bharahaṁ nāmēṇa atthi varakhēttaṁ |
jattha na najjaï pahi pahiṁ aḍavivasiṭhāṇayavisēsō || 52 ||
annaṁ ca tammi dēsē guṇāṇa bhavaṇammi ēyamacchariyaṁ |
aviya | jattha ya gāmamahallā kararahiyā dhammavajjiyā muṇiṇō |
dēsassa tassa saṁvaṇṇaṇammi kō ujjamaṁ kuṇaï? || 54 ||
jattha ya nivasaï lōō piyaṁvaō dhammakaraṇatallicchō |
jattha ya purammi niccaṁ iō taō bahupaōyaṇaparēṇa |
niccaṁ hayandhayārē gayampi rāiṁ na yāṇanti || 68 ||
rammattaṇaō jassa ya palōyaṇatthaṁva āgayā dēvā |
jattha ya purammi dīsaï pāyapahārō u raṅgabhūmīsu |
aha ēkko cciya dōsō guṇāṇa bhavaṇammi tammi nayarammi |
aha annayā kayāivi atthāṇagayassa rāiṇō tassa |
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē amhaṁ dēvāēsō pamāṇanti || 82 ||
tattō raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ lahuṁ pavēsēhi tāhē sō vihiṇā |
uvaviṭṭhō bhūmīē rannā bhaṇiō kuō 'si taṁ bhadda!? |
kēṇa va kajjēṇa ihaṁ samāgaō maha samīvammi? || 84 ||
tō bhaṇaï cittasēṇō kusagganayarāu āgaō dēva! |
cittappiō ya dēvō summaï vattāsuṁ tēṇa ahamēttha |
tattō rannā bhaṇiyaṁ kērisayaṁ cittakōsalaṁ tujjha? |
daṁsēhi tāva majjhaṁ ālihiyaṁ kiñci vararuvaṁ || 87 ||
aha tēṇa kakkhadēsammi gōviyā cittapaṭṭiyā sahasā |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ naranāhō cintaï ēsō hu cittakammammi |
aïkusalō jaṁ lihiyaṁ aüvvaruvaṁ imaṁ rūvaṁ || 91 ||
tilōkkammivi mannē ērisarūvā na itthiyā atthi |
jaï puṇa katthavi hōjjā ērisaruvēṇa itthiyā kannā |
tīē vi saṅgamō jaï tā rajjaṁ hōjja sakayatthaṁ || 93 ||
hā! hā! hatti bhaṇantā atthāṇagayā samuṭṭhiyā lōyā |
vayaṇē khivanti khippa kappūraṁ taha malēnti aṅgāiṁ |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ cittasēṇō pahasiyavayaṇō daḍhaṁ jāō || 97 ||
rē! rē! kōvi hu pāvō ahimararūvēṇa āgaō ēsō |
tālēha haṇaha vandhaha ēvaṁ bhaṇantēhiṁ aṅgarakkhēhiṁ |
gahiō sō hammantō ēvaṁ bhaṇiuṁ samāḍhattō || 99 ||
bhō! bhō! bhaddā! nāhaṁ duṭṭhō tā mā muhā kayatthēha |
tattō ya tēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kahaṁ na duṭṭhō tumaṁ pāva!? || 100 ||
kammaṇakayaṁ hi cittaṁ payaṁsiyaṁ kīsa rāiṇō tumaē? |
taha mucchiyammi dēvē viyasiyavayaṇō ya kiṁ jāō? || 101 ||
tā kahasu kēṇa raṇṇō vahaṇatthaṁ pēsiō tumaṁ pāva!? |
tō bhaṇaï cittasēṇō akkhissaṁ tumha savvampi || 102 ||
rannō abbhudayatthaṁ samāgaō na uṇa duṭṭhabuddhīē |
ēmāi bhaṇantōvi hu baddhō sō rāyapurisēhiṁ || 103 ||
aha naravaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ muñcaha bhō! cittagaramēyaṁ || 104 ||
ucchōḍiyabandhō sō rannā bhaṇiō ya bhadda! uvavisasu |
āikkhasu maha saccaṁ kēṇa tumaṁ pēsiō ēttha? || 105 ||
tō bhaṇaï cittasēṇō nisuṇasu naranāha! ēttha paramatthaṁ |
tāṇa ya puttō naravāhaṇotti nāmēṇa ukkaḍapayāvō |
aha annayā ya rāyā dāuṁ naravāhaṇassa niyarajjaṁ |
ēttō ya tammi nayarē nivasaï vaṇiō u sāgarō nāma |
siridattō sē puttō sirikantā tahaya duhiyatti || 114 ||
jāyā ya garuyapīī annōnnaṁ tāṇa dōṇhampi || 115 ||
aha annayā ya rāyā maïsāgarasāgarēhi sañjuttō |
niyasahiyaṇasañjuttā tāva ya kamalāvaī tahiṁ āyā |
aha sā bhagiṇī rannā pīīē nivēsiyā niucchaṅgē |
tattō daṭṭhuṁ tīē rūvaṁ taha jōvvaṇamudaggaṁ || 122 ||
bhaṇiō rannā mantī maïsāgara! taïya pavvayantēṇa |
tāēṇa ahaṁ bhaṇiō bhagiṇī ṭhāṇammi dāyavvā || 123 ||
iṇhiṁ varassa uciyā jāyā ēsatti tā mahaṁ kahasu |
kō aṇurūvō purisō imīē sukulappasūō ya? || 124 ||
maïsāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ dēvo cciya ēttha jāṇaē uciyaṁ |
tattō rannā bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ mē phuraī cittammi || 125 ||
jō cēva hiyayaïṭṭhō taṁ cēva varēī jēṇēsā || 126 ||
maïsāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jaṁ dēvō āṇavēi taṁ kiccaṁ |
navari sayaṁvarakaraṇaṁ sampaï uciyaṁ na kāuṁ jē || 127 ||
savvēvi nivā jaïyā āyattā honti ēganaravaïṇō |
ēgassa jaō varaṇē sēsāṇaṁ sō nivāragō hōi |
sampaï puṇa rāyāṇō narinda! savvēvi ahamindā || 129 ||
tā tāṇamēgavaraṇē sēsā savvēvi sattuṇō honti |
na ya sakkā saṅgāmē jiṇiuṁ savvēvi ēgēṇa || 130 ||
tattō raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ kassēsā tarihi bhadda! dāyavvā |
kō va imīē iṭṭhō maṇassa iha kaha ṇu nāyavvaṁ? || 132 ||
jassa va tassa va rannō dāyavvā na ya maē niyayabhagiṇī |
dinnā hōi sudinnā jassa, imā tassa dāyavvā || 133 ||
ēvaṁ ca jāva jampaï rāyā maïsāgarēṇa saha tattha |
iya sōuṁ naravaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ turiyaṁ pavēsēhiṁ || 136 ||
paccakkhaṁ piva savvaṁ sāhēi sō avitahaṁ jāva || 139 ||
tāhē pahasiyavayaṇō rāyā naravāhaṇō imaṁ bhaṇati |
bhō sumaï! majjha bhagiṇī ēsā kamalāvaī kaṇṇā || 140 ||
ēīē kō bhattā hōhī maṇavallahutti vajjarasu |
naravara! cittē lihiyaṁ ēīē rūvayaṁ pulōēttā |
mucchijjissaï jō iha hōhī bhattā imīē sō || 142 ||
sayalōrōhapahāṇā tassa ya hōhī imā mahādēvī |
ētthattthē ya narēsara! mā kāhisi annahābhāvaṁ || 143 ||
sirikantāē bhattā kō hōhī majjha dhūyāē? || 144 ||
vajjaraï taō sumaī kasiṇabhuyaṅgēṇa ḍasiyamēyaṁ jō |
ujjīvissaï so cciya bhattā dhūyāē tē hōhī || 145 ||
ēvaṁ ca pucchiūṇaṁ uciyaṁ kāūṇa tassa uvayāraṁ |
tattō ya bhaṇaï mantī sōhaṇamahuṇā narinda! sañjāyaṁ |
tā iṇhiṁ tabbhaṇiē kāyavvō ujjamō hōi || 147 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ rannā kō iha sāisayaṁ lihaï cittakammanti |
maïsāgarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ supasiddhō tāva iha nayarē || 148 ||
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ sigghaṁ vāharaha tayanti takkhaṇēṇa ahaṁ |
jaṁ āṇavēsi bhaṇiuṁ, sōhaṇavannēhi taṁ lihiyaṁ || 151 ||
dēkkhāliyaṁ ca rannō sāisayaṁ pēkkhiūṇa tō tuṭṭhō |
bhaṇiō ahaṁ rannā ētthatthē taṁ siuciutti || 152 ||
daṁsēṇu jassa mucchā jāyaï ēyaṁ pulōēuṁ || 153 ||
sō maha sāhēavvō sigdhaṁ āgamma, jēṇa tassēva |
ēvaṁ raṇṇā bhaṇiō tattō paṇamittu tassa payakamalaṁ |
sandaṁsiyāu na puṇō jāyā iha atthasaṁsiddhī || 156 ||
ajja puṇō iha nayarē samāgaō dēva! tumha pāsammi |
ēyaṁ niyacchiūṇaṁ mucchā jāyā ya tumhāṇaṁ || 157 ||
jāyaṁ maha sāmisamīhiyaṁ ti cinttittu tēṇa naranāha! |
jāō harisō majjha sumariya nēmittiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ || 158 ||
ēēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ mucchāē tumha harisiō ahayaṁ |
tā mā narinda! annahabhāvēṇa viyappasu mamanti || 159 ||
kiṁ tīē kannāē ērisayaṁ atthi rūvasōhaggaṁ? |
tā bhaṇaī cittasēṇō nimēsamēttaṁ imaṁ lihiyaṁ || 161 ||
kō sakkaï kusalōvi hu jahaṭṭhiyaṁ tīē rāyakannāē |
tō bhaṇaï cittasēṇō āēsaṁ dēha dēva! amhāṇaṁ |
kiñci sasōgā pattā kamēṇa sā hatthiṇapurammi || 168 ||
indassava indāṇī jāyā aha sā mahādēvī || 170 ||
tīē saha visayasōkkhaṁ aṇuhavamāṇassa rāiṇō tassa |
tammi ya purē pasiddhō pavarō paürāṇa āsi dhaṇadhammō |
bhajjā maṇōramanāmā tassa ya pāṇappiyā dhaṇiyaṁ || 176 ||
dhaṇadēvotti ya sammaṁ nāmaṁ nivvattiyaṁ tassa || 178 ||
sayalē kalākalāvē aha jāō sōvi pattaṭṭhō || 181 ||
piuṇā sē ujjhāō sa pūiō vatthamāīhiṁ || 182 ||
aha annayā kayāivi vayaṁsavisarēṇa parigaō ēsō |
diṭṭhō ya tattha ēgō purisō gurusōyaparigaō tēṇa |
kō si tumaṁ kattō vā kiṁ vā tē sōyakāraṇaṁ bhadda!? |
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bhaṇiō sō purisō ēvamullavaï || 188 ||
na kuṇaï jō paḍiyāraṁ na ya duhiō ahava jō hōi? || 189 ||
tahavi hu kahēmi sundara! mā vayaṇaṁ tujjha nipphalaṁ jāu |
tīē ya supaïṭṭhō pallivaī tassa bhāriyā lacchī |
tassa ya bālaggahō ahayaṁ nāmēṇa dēvasammotti |
kīlāmi ya jayasēṇaṁ tattha ahaṁ vivihakīlāhiṁ || 192 ||
aha annayā ya bāhiṁ viṇiggaō gēṇhiūṇa jayasēṇaṁ |
purisēhiṁ dōhi diṭṭhō tattha ahaṁ jōgirūvēhiṁ || 193 ||
sambhāsiūṇa puvviṁ dinnō maha tēhiṁ pavaratambōlō |
jāṇāmi nēva kiñcivi vimōhiō tēhiṁ pāvēhiṁ || 195 ||
tēhi samētō ahayaṁ vayāmi jā kittiyampi bhūbhāgaṁ |
tāva ya tisiēṇa maē ēgammi uvavaṇaniguñjē || 196 ||
jāō satthasarīrō vicintiyaṁ tāhi mē ēyaṁ || 197 ||
iya cintiya caliō haṁ alakkhiō cēva saha tēhiṁ || 198 ||
siddhāē jakkhiṇīē pāvissāmō nihiṁ taṁ tu || 200 ||
iya tēsiṁ sōūṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ, bhayavēvirō daḍhaṁ jāō |
suttēsu tēsu ghēttuṁ jayasēṇaṁ tāhi naṭṭhō haṁ || 201 ||
kahakahavi hu nāsantō gavēsamāṇēhiṁ tēhiṁ haṁ pattō |
ajja puṇō iha nayarē sampattō sattamāu divasāu |
tā bhadda! imaṁ gurusōyakāraṇaṁ sāhiyaṁ maē tumha |
jaï atthi kāvi sattī tā rakkhaha bālayaṁ taṁ tu || 204 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ sampaï ciṭṭhanti kattha tē purisā? |
bīō purē paviṭṭhō surāikajjēṇa sampayaṁ cēva |
iya bhaṇiē dhaṇadēvō jōgiyapāsē gaō turiyaṁ || 206 ||
bhaṇiō ya tēṇa ēsō ēyaṁ maha dēsu bālayaṁ bhadda! |
ahayaṁ suvannalakkhaṁ tuha dēmi, na ēttha sandēhō || 207 ||
tō jōgiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jāva na sō ēi duiyaō jōgī |
tāva maha dēsu lakkhaṁ jēṇa imaṁ dēmi tuha bālaṁ || 208 ||
ghēttūṇa aṅgulīyaṁ sigghayaraṁ jōgiō taō naṭṭhō |
pāsammi samallīṇō bhaṇiō ēsō ya ginha kumaratti |
tattō ya dēvasammō pahasiyavayaṇō imaṁ bhaṇaï || 211 ||
taṁ sāmī taṁ bandhū taṁ ciya maha jīyadāyagō suyaṇu! |
kiṁ kiṁ na kayaṁ tumaē jīyaṁ kumarassa dintēṇa? || 212 ||
maha sāmiyassa dinnaṁ, jīyaṁ jaṁ pāṇavallahō puttō |
tattō dhavadēvēṇaṁ nīō gēhammi bhōiō sammaṁ |
ēsō puṇa vuttantō vitthariō tattha puravarē sahasā |
tā jattha jattha dīsaï dhaṇadēvō niyavayaṁsapariyariō |
ēsō sō dhaṇadēvō cāī bhōgī ya taha kalākusalō |
annē puṇa macchariṇō bhaṇanti niyacāyagavviyā tattha |
taṁ dāṇamiha pasassaṁ taṁ cēva ya pōrusassa vuḍ̣dhikaraṁ |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca bappaviḍhaviya davvēṇaṁ kō na viḍ̣dhiraṁ kuṇaï |
ēyaṁ jaṇappavāyaṁ nisuṇittā cintaī u dhaṇadēvō |
saccaṁ bhaṇanti ēē na hu juttaṁ majjha ērisayaṁ || 222 ||
viḍhavāmi bhūridavvaṁ iya icchā sampayaṁ majjha || 225 ||
tā aṇujāṇaü tāō pujjantu maṇōrahā imē majjha |
bhaṇiyaṁ jaṇaṇīē taō gamaṇavayaṇampi dussahaṁ putta! |
acchaü tā dūre cciya puṇa gamaṇaṁ annadēsammi || 227 ||
annaṁ ca atthi lacchī tuha jaṇaēṇāvi ajjiyā putta! |
jīē vilasantōvi hu antaṁ kāuṁ na sattō si || 228 ||
aviya | jaṇaēṇa ya tuha puttaya! atthuppattīē kāraṇaṁ jaṁ jaṁ |
taṁ savvaṁ kāraviyaṁ kiṁ kajjaṁ tuha vaṇijjēṇa? || 229 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ jāvajjavi ammi! bālaō puttō |
susamatthō vi hu jō jaṇayaajjiyaṁ sampayaṁ nisēvēi |
sō ammi! tāva lōē mamaṁva uvahāsaṁ lahaï || 232 ||
mukkalaha iha bhaṇantō paḍiō jaṇaṇīē calasēṇu || 233 ||
tō dhaṇadhammō sēṭṭhī nāuṁ avasāṇa- (ya) kāraṇaṁ tassa |
vajjaraï puttaṁ! kō tujjha vañchiē kuṇaï vigghanti? || 234 ||
sayalammi tammi nayarē kāriya āghōsaṇaṁ jaṇē miliē |
aha kamasō sampattō ēkkaṁ aïbhīsaṇaṁ aḍaviṁ || 241 ||
annaṁ ta jīē lōyā nīipahāṇassa puhaïpālassa |
nayarīē iva na kuṇanti kahavi ummagasañcaraṇaṁ || 243 ||
viyaḍāḍavīē tīē majjhaṁmajjhēṇa vayaï sō satthō |
ēsō ēttha samappaï aḍavipavēsassa vannaṇō nāma |
gahiya jalāsayamēgaṁ aha sō āvāsiō satthō || 1 ||
satthammi tammi paḍiyā jhaḍitti bhillāṇa dhāḍitti || 4 ||
kēvi asivaggahatthā kēvi hu karagahiyalaüḍayā avarē |
annāyā ēva kuōvi jjhatti bhillā samāvaḍiyā || 9 ||
paḍiēsu taō tēsuṁ satthō savvō vi āulībhūō |
rē! rē! pisāyarūvā! katthiṇhiṁ jāha diṭṭhipahapaḍiyā |
payaḍaha savvaṁ jaï atthi tumhamiha pōrisaṁ kimpi || 12 ||
hā! hā! rakkhaha rakkhaha ēvaṁ kaluṇāiṁ jampanti || 13 ||
kēvi hu luṇṭijjantā iō taō taha pahammamāṇā ya |
kēvi kahakahavi pāviyachiddā gāḍhaṁ ca khasaphasēmāṇā |
kēvi hu mayamiva bhūpaṭṭhisaṇṭhiyaṁ appayaṁ payaṁsanti |
kēvi hu chuhanti gaṇṭhiṁ mahīē pakkhāṇi jōēttā || 18 ||
jēvi hu iō taō indhaṇāiaṭṭhā gayāsi satthāō |
tēvi hu kalayalasaddaṁ sōuṁ vaccanti dūrayaraṁ || 19 ||
rē! lēha haṇaha bandhaha māraha vayaṇāiṁ bharaha dhūlīē |
summanti tattha satthē disi disi ēvaṁvihā saddā || 20 ||
ēyāvasarammi taō pāsittu iō taō vilumpantaṁ |
rē! rē! pāvā! jaï atthi tumha iha kāvi dappakaṇḍūī |
tā havaha majjha puraō sahasā taṁ jēṇa avaṇēmi || 23 ||
mā bhaṇaha jaṁ na bhaṇiyaṁ ēsa kasavaṭṭaō supurisāṇa |
hā! dhī! dhī! ēyassa u rē! duṭṭhā! tumha purisagārassa |
ēvaṁ ca nisāmittā dōccaṁ taccaṁ samullavantassa |
rē! rē! lēha imassavi phēḍēmō dhīrayaṁ kirāḍassa |
ēvaṁ samullavantā valiyā tē jhatti tayabhimuhaṁ || 27 ||
pattā ya āhasantā dhaṇadēvassantiyaṁ samantā tē |
dhaṇadēvōvi asaṅkō tahā payaṭṭēsu tēsu bhillēsu |
jaha jaha tē bhillanarā dēnti pahārē daḍhaṁ dayāhīṇā |
dhaṇadēvō uṇa taha taha abbhasiyakalō pavañcēi || 30 ||
aviya pharaēṇa kēvi hu iō taō kēvi kāyakaraṇēṇaṁ |
kahakahavi hu bhillēhiṁ gahiō pharaēhiṁ uṭṭhahēūṇa |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēhiṁ rē! rē! ēsō satthāhivō vaṇiō || 32 ||
tā bandhiūṇa ēyaṁ akkhayadēhaṁ tu pallināhassa |
appēmō jēṇēsō dēi vaṇiō dhaṇaṁ bahuyaṁ || 33 ||
tattō ya tēhiṁ gantuṁ pallīvaïṇō samappiō ēsō |
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiō sadukkhamēvaṁ tu pallināhassa |
hā! hā! sāmiya! ēsō mahāṇubhāvō sa dhaṇadēvō || 35 ||
jēṇa tayā tuha taṇaō jōgiyagahiōvi mōiō āsi |
aha bhaṇaï suppaïṭṭhō muñcaha muñcaha mahābhāgaṁ || 38 ||
tattō ya dīhadīhaṁ nīsasiya visāyagabbhiṇaṁ ēvaṁ |
paramuvagāritti tumaṁ uvēcca kilahōsi amha daṭṭhavō |
jāyaï avagāraphalō vihiō pāvāṇaṁ ahava uvayārō |
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ kīsa imaṁ vahaha guruvisāyanti |
annāṇaṁ avarajjhaï, kō dōsō ēttha tumhāṇaṁ? || 45 ||
rūvaṁ taha suyaṇattaṁ puṇōvi aïrañjiō bhaṇaï || 46 ||
pēcchaha ēgammi narē kēttiyaguṇasamudaō samaṁ vasaï? |
dhī! dhī! maha purisattaṁ dhī! dhī! maha ērisāē vittīē |
jaï puṇa hōjja vivattī samayaṁ bhillēhiṁ jujjhamāṇassa |
tā kaha majjha aünnassa hōjja pāvassa nitthārō? || 51 ||
ēmāi bahuvigappaṁ appāṇaṁ nindiūṇa tō bhaṇaï |
bhō! bhō! bhillā satthē jaṁ gahiyaṁ ēttha tumhēhiṁ || 52 ||
tēhiṁ taṇamajjāyaṁ samappiyaṁ tassa taṁ savvaṁ || 53 ||
ēttō gāuyamēttē sīhaguhā nāma atthi mē pallī |
tīē lahumāgacchaha ajja maha pāhuṇā hōha || 55 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ ēvaṁ hōutti tāhē sō satthō |
ēsā hu tāva pallī āvāsō nigdhiṇassa lōyassa |
ēsō na sammajōgō ahivaïbhiccāṇa maha ṭhiyaṁ cittē |
bhillāṇaṁ nāhāvi hu jaṁ ērisaguṇagaṇēṇa sañjuttā |
uttamanarāvi hōuṁ sāhaha maha kēṇa kajjēṇa? || 64 ||
tō bhaṇaï supaïṭṭhō kiṁ kahiēṇaṁ imēṇa dhaṇadēva! |
tahavi hu bhaṇāmi mā hōu tujjha abbhatthaṇā imā vihalā |
tammi ya puraṁ purāṇaṁ pavaraṁ suranayarasarisariddhillaṁ |
buddhīē aṇannasamā kamalā nāmēṇa sē dēvī || 70 ||
tīē saha visayasōkkhaṁ aṇuhavamāṇassa taha ya rajjadhuraṁ |
vaccantēsu diṇēsuṁ tīē dēvīē aha ahaṁ puttō |
jāō kayaṁ ca nāmaṁ vihiṇā maha suppaïṭṭhotti || 72 ||
pēccha piē! sañjāyā tujjha saricchā kubēradisā || 85 ||
taralattaṁ nayaṇāṇaṁ kuḍilattaṁ sutaṇu! tujjha kēsāṇaṁ |
annaṁ ca piya! pēcchasu paribbhamantēhiṁ indagōvēhiṁ |
niṭṭhura karapasarēṇaṁ imēṇa santāviā imā puhaī |
iya rōsēṇava ruddhō ghaṇēhiṁ sūrassa karapasarō || 89 ||
maha āgamēvi piyavirahiyāṇa mahilāṇa kiṁ na phuṭṭāiṁ |
nāuṁ maha āgamaṇaṁ tahavi hu kiṁ calliyā piyā mōttuṁ |
ētthantarammi dēvī naranāhaṁ bhaṇaï harisitā santī |
mōttūṇa virahiṇijaṇaṁ suhaō jaṁ ēsa kāmuyajaṇassa |
aha bhaṇaï puhaïnāhō īsiṁ hasēūṇa, dēvi! taṁ saccaṁ |
āhīṇaṁ sañjāyaṁ jaṁ summaï ēttha lōgammi || 96 ||
dhāyā purisā pēcchanti āyārā dhāyacaṁ disāvalayaṁ |
taha dēvi! tumaṁ suhiyā savvaṁ suhiyanti mannēsi || 97 ||
savvēvi dēvi! uuṇō saünnalōyassa honti suhahēū |
ō! pēccha pēccha sundari! addhasamārammi jarakuḍīrammi |
niyayaghariṇīē bāḍhaṁ cōijjantō puṇō puṇō varaō |
taha pēccha imaṁ sundari! suṇahaṁ cullīē sunnagēhammi |
ēvaṁ ca jāva sāhaï dēvīē tāva kañcuī jhatti |
dēvēṇa jō u puvviṁ paṭṭhaviō āsi campanayarīē |
ciṭṭhaï, ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē dēvō pamāṇanti taṁ sōccā || 108 ||
diṭṭhīē āpucchiya dēviṁ sahasatti uṭṭhiō rāyā |
naravara! muṭṭhā muṭṭhā dēvī vijjūē daddhatti || 112 ||
hā! hā! hatti bhaṇantō rāyā mucchāvasaṁ pattō || 113 ||
hā vallahi! hā sāmiṇi! hā jīviyadāyagē! visālacchi! |
hā maha hiyayanivāsiṇi! hā! kattha gayā mamaṁ mōttuṁ? || 116 ||
hā gōradēṁhi! hā pihupaōharē! hā sukōmalasarīrē! |
hā kaha nigghiṇavihiṇā tuha uvariṁ pāḍiyā vijjū? || 117 ||
hā dēvi tujjha virahē nāranārīsaṅkulaṁ imaṁ nayaraṁ |
kila dēvi! taṁ bhaṇantī tuha virahē acchiuṁ na sakkēmi |
taṁ kaha ahaṁ ahannō tumaē sahasā pariccatō || 120 ||
hā! kiṁ na kimpi jampasi kiṁvā taṁ suyaṇu! majjha ruṭṭhā si |
kiṁva maē avaraddhaṁ sundari! taṁ majjha sāhēsu? || 121 ||
taṁ ciya maha vallahiyā nēhō maha natthi annaïtthīsu |
tahavi tumaṁ kiṁ sundarī! nibbhararattassa dēsi nālāvaṁ? |
tā pasiya pasiya sāmiṇi! uṭṭhiya maha dēsu paḍivayaṇaṁ || 123 ||
ēmāi jāva vilavaï vivihaṁ rāyā sakaluṇasaddēṇa |
tāva ahaṁ sampattō rōvantō tattha dhaṇadēva! || 124 ||
taṁ cēva palavamāṇō sudīharaṁ ruvaï bālōvva || 125 ||
dēva! alaṁ runnēṇa mayakiccaṁ kuṇaha dēvīē || 126 ||
bhaṇaï taō naranāhō candaṇadārūṇi bāhiṁ nīṇēha |
dēvīē jēṇa samayaṁ ahampi aggīē vissāmi || 127 ||
tō bhaṇaï sumaïmantī kāyarajaṇacēṭṭhiēṇa kiṁ imiṇā |
maraṇēṇa tujjha naravara! dēsō savvōvi hōi jaṁ gammō |
dēvāṇaṁ bambhaṇāṇa ya ligīṇaṁ taha pāgayajaṇassa |
mahilāmēttassa kaē na hu juttaṁ tumha uttamanarāṇa |
maraṇaṁ jāyaṁ jaïyā kā gaṇaṇā annamaṇuēsu? || 132 ||
jaïyā jāyaṁ maraṇaṁ kā gaṇaṇā annamaṇuēsu || 133 ||
jaï tāva tē ya nihāyā pāvakayantēṇa nigghiṇamaṇēṇa |
tēsimpi hōi cavaṇaṁ kā gaṇaṇā annasattēsu? || 136 ||
jaï nāma hōi cavaṇaṁ kā gaṇaṇā maṇuyalōyammi? || 137 ||
sō kōvi natthi jīvō tilōyamajjhammi jō vasaṁ na gaō |
iya kālakavaliyaṁ pēcchiūṇa sayalampi tihuaṇaṁ dēva! |
jāyammi dēvimaraṇē kiṁ sōgaṁ kuṇaha vihalaṁ tu? || 139 ||
jujjaï kāuṁ sōgō maraṇaṁ jaï hōjja tīē ēkkāē |
sāhāraṇammi maraṇē kō sōgō kiṁva runnēṇa? || 140 ||
niddāsaṅgē jaṁ puṇa uṭṭhijjaï taṁ mahacchariyaṁ || 141 ||
iya lōyassa sarūvaṁ kuviyakayantassa ērisaṁ daṭṭhuṁ |
dēvimaraṇammi naravara! na hu juttaṁ sōgakaraṇanti || 142 ||
ēvaṁ ca bahuvigappaṁ bhaṇiō sō sumaïṇā naravarindō |
gahagahiō iva ciṭṭhaï rāyā dēvīē sōgēṇa || 144 ||
gahiē kalākalāvē gāmasahassaṁ tayā mahaṁ dinnaṁ |
aha annayā kayāivi atthāṇagayassa rāiṇō jhatti |
sigghaṁ pavēsasutti ya bhaṇiē sō rāiṇā aṇunnāō |
āgamma pāyapaḍiyā piuṇā sā saharisaṁ niucchaṅgē |
viṇivēsiya avagụ̄dhā bhaṇiyā ya imaṁ tu sā kannā || 156 ||
sāhasu jēṇa tuhaṁ sō kijjaï bhattā, kimannēṇaṁ? || 157 ||
ēvaṁ piuṇā bhaṇiyā lajjāē ahōmuhī ṭhiyā bālā |
puṇaruttaṁ puṭṭhāvi hu na kiñci paḍiuttaraṁ dēi || 158 ||
tō cintiuṁ payattō ēyā lajjāluyā imā varaī |
na hu sakkaï vajjariuṁ ēsō maha tāya! iṭṭhotti || 159 ||
tā cintēmi sayaṁ ciya aṇurūvamimīē pavarabhattāraṁ |
putti! tuha rūvasarisō bhattā laddhō maē iṇhiṁ || 161 ||
siddhatthapurē rāyā suggīvō nāma maha paraṁ mittaṁ |
tassa tumaṁ gaccha lahuṁ sayaṁvarā, ēttha kiṁ bahuṇā? || 162 ||
ēvaṁ ca bhaṇiyamēttē sā kannā dēva! tumha nāmēṇa |
nāūṇa tīē bhāvaṁ rāyā sampēkkhiuṇa maha vayaṇaṁ |
jaṁ āṇavēsi bhaṇiuṁ tattō haṁ taṁ gahīya sañcaliō |
jāva ya kamēṇa ēttō jōyaṇamēttammi sampattō || 166 ||
uggiliya āgaō huṁ tumhāṇa piyaṁ nivēēmi || 167 ||
dēva! mahamēyamāgamaṇakāraṇaṁ pucchiyaṁ hi jaṁ tumaē |
harisāūriyahiyaō aha rāyā bhaṇaï pariyaṇaṁ niyayaṁ |
tō pariyaṇēṇa sammaṁ tahatti sampāḍiyammi vayaṇammi |
sā rannō kaṇagavaī kālēṇa aīva vallahā jāyā |
maha māūē ṭhāṇē vihiyā aha paṭṭabaddhā sā || 171 ||
vallīsamaṁ hi pimmaṁ jaṁ āsannaṁ tahiṁ caḍaï || 172 ||
vaccanti vāsarāiṁ maha piuṇō tīē gāḍharattassa |
aha annayā kayāivi kaṇagavaīē suō samuppannō |
annadiyahammi ēyaṁ ēgantē bhaṇaï kaṇagavaī dēvī |
juvarāyapaē kiṁ navi ahisiccaï dēva! mē puttō || 175 ||
tō bhaṇaï naravarindō jēṭṭhē puttammi suppaïṭṭhammi |
vijjantē na hu juttaṁ juvarāyaṁ ṭhāviuṁ surahaṁ || 176 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dēvīē taō jēṭṭhaṭṭhavaṇē nihōḍaü kō ṇu? |
jaï tujjha ahaṁ daïyā tā surahaṁ kuṇasu juyarāyaṁ || 177 ||
tāhē rannā bhaṇiyaṁ suṭṭhuṁ piyā taṁ sulōyaṇē! majjha |
taha ēsō susamatthō ēvaṁ vihiē vihējja taṁ kimpi |
avamāṇiō hu jēṇaṁ mamāvi rajjaṁ avaharējjā || 179 ||
tō bhaṇaï hasiya dēvī ērisasattēṇa kaha tumaṁ vihiṇā |
piyayama! rāyā vihiō navari kirāḍō kaō hontō? || 180 ||
tēṇēva imaṁ sigghaṁ kaṭṭhaharē khivasu jattēṇa || 181 ||
tattō ya majjha puttaṁ juvarāyaṁ ṭhāviuṁ payattēṇa |
acchasu vigayāsaṅkō rajjaṁ ca mamaṁ ca māṇantō || 182 ||
pacchannē sōūṇaṁ savvaṁ dhaṇadēva! maha siṭṭhaṁ || 184 ||
taṁ sōuṁ maha vigappō cittē ēyārisō samuppannō |
kiṁ kaṇagavaīē vuttō karējja ēvaṁ piyā majjha? || 185 ||
ahavā | na gaṇanti puvvanēhaṁ na ya nīiṁ nēya lōyaavavāyaṁ |
na ya bhāviāvayāō purisā mahilāṇa āyattā || 186 ||
tā jā na kimpi annaṁ dēvīvayaṇāō maha piyā kuṇaï |
tāva ahiṭṭhēmi sayaṁ rajjaṁ, piyaraṁ viṇāsēttā || 187 ||
ahava na ēyaṁ juttaṁ vivēyajuttassa majjha kāuṁ jē |
kiṁvā kaṇagavaïṁ ciya saha surahēṇaṁ nayāmi jamavayaṇē |
ahavā kiṁ maha imiṇā pēkkhāmō tāva jaṁ piyā kuṇaï |
aha rāyā maha uvariṁ diṇē diṇē piyayamāē bhannantō |
sahasatti annadiyahē kimpi misaṁ dāviūṇa maha rannā |
ahavā na puvvapurisēhiṁ majjhaṁ vaṁsē kayaṁ imaṁ pāvaṁ |
mahilāvayaṇēṇa imō rāgandhō kuṇaï, kuṇaü annāyaṁ |
maha puṇa vivēyajuttassa handi! na hu ērisaṁ juttaṁ || 195 ||
tā kiṁ karēmi iṇhiṁ avamāṇaṁ tāva dūsahaṁ piuṇō |
appavahōvi na juttō dēsaccāō paraṁ juttō || 196 ||
huṁ tampi hu nahu juttaṁ avamāṇapayaṁ hi sēvatti || 197 ||
sampaï puṇa vaṇṭhōiva kaha sēvaṁ kuṇaï bhiccāṇa? || 198 ||
jā jīvaï ēsa piyā ēyammi mayammi puṇa jahā juttaṁ |
taïya cciya kāhāmō kiṁ iṇhiṁ tīē cintāē? || 201 ||
nīhariō tattō haṁ kamēṇa aha pāviuṁ imaṁ palliṁ |
miliyā majjha aṇēgē bhillā cōrā kukammanirayā ya |
tēhiṁ parivāriō haṁ sampaï pallīvaī jāō || 204 ||
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ tumhāṇaṁ kaha ṇu ēttha āvāsō |
taṁ tuha dhaṇadēva! maē garuyasiṇēhēṇa savvampi || 206 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ avvō! jaṇaōpi ērisaṁ kuṇaï |
so cciya kajjavasēṇaṁ vallahaō hōi ēttha saṁsārē |
kāraṇavasēṇa sōvi hu riuvva vēsō jaṇō hōi || 208 ||
paramatthaō na kōvi hu piō va sattū va atthi lōgammi |
naï māyā nēya piyā sakajjavasaō jaṇō savvō || 209 ||
taṁ ciya kumāra! mahappā taṁ ciya pasamassa laddhaparamatthō |
taṁ ciya vivēyajuttō tumae cciya maṇḍiyā vasuhā || 211 ||
santammi balē tahavi hu dēsaccāō kaō jēṇa || 212 ||
tāṇaṁ pañca va satta va vōlīṇā vāsarā jāva || 213 ||
tumha viōgō dūsahō ēsō satthō samucchugībhūō |
taṁ kumārō! amha jāyaṁ ēttha taḍī ēttha vagghotti || 215 ||
ēēṇaṁ ciya nēcchanti sāhavō sajjaṇēhiṁ saṁsaggiṁ |
jahavi hu vahaï na jīhā ērisavayaṇē samullavijjantē |
tahavi hu bhaṇāmi muñcasu gacchāmō sampayaṁ amhē || 217 ||
tā kimpi cintiūṇaṁ khaṇantaraṁ dīhara ca nīsasiuṁ |
tahavi hu bhaṇāmi kiñcivi kāyavvō nēva patthaṇābhaṅgō |
navaraṁ jaï suralōgē havējja na hu annakhēttammi || 223 ||
ēvaṁ viṇicchiyammivi tahavi hu kōūhalaṁ mahaṁ hiyaē |
tō bhaṇasu kaha ṇu jāyā sampattī tumha ēyassa? || 224 ||
tō bhaṇaï suppaïṭṭhō sammaṁ hi viṇicchiyaṁ tumē bhadda! |
māṇusakhēttasamutthō na hōi ēsō maṇī tāva || 225 ||
taṁ ēgamaṇō hōu jaï kōugamatthi tō suṇasu || 226 ||
tāva ya nisuō saddō dūsahagurudukkhasūyaō kaluṇō |
hā! kaha majjha nimittē piyayama! atigaruyaāvayaṁ pattō?
hā! ajjaütta! iṇhiṁ tuha virahē natthi maha jīyaṁ || 230 ||
tadaṇantaraṁ ca kēṇavi hakkiya aïniṭṭhuraṁ samullaviyaṁ |
kattō maha vasagāē sāhārō tujjha ēēṇa? || 231 ||
taṁ sōūṇaṁ majjhaṁ maṇammi kōūhalaṁ samuppannaṁ |
jāva ya dōṇṇi va tiṇṇi va vaccāmi payāiṁ tā nisuō || 232 ||
ēgō divvāgārō purisō diṭṭhō ahē tassa || 238 ||
ākaṇṭhavẹ̄dhiyaṁ taṁ daṭṭhuṁ purisaṁ maē bhaṇiyaṁ || 239 ||
dhī! dhī! hayavihiṇō vilasiyassa asamikkhiyassa ēyassa |
ēmāi maē paridēviyammi bhaṇiyaṁ imaṁ taō tēṇaṁ |
alamimiṇā tē paridēviēṇa suṇa tāva maha vayaṇaṁ || 241 ||
ciṭṭhaï cūḍāē mahaṁ majjhē baddhō phurantakiraṇillō |
jassa pabhāvēṇa imē ḍasiumaṇāvi hu cayanti nō ḍasiuṁ |
ghōravisāvi hu sappā sappanti na baddhavayaṇavva || 243 ||
taṁ ghēttūṇaṁ varamaṇiṁ siñcasu salilēṇa tēṇa tō pacchā |
āmanti bhaṇantēṇaṁ tavvayaṇaṁ sāyaraṁ kayaṁ savvaṁ |
acchōḍiyā jalēṇaṁ jhatti vilīṇā aha bhuyaṅgā || 245 ||
aviya | maṇisalilēṇaṁ sittā khaṇēṇa savvēvi pāviyā vilayaṁ |
ābhaṭṭhō paḍhamaṁ ca tēṇa ahayaṁ kattō tumaṁ āgatō,
kiṁvā nāma kahiṁ kulammi vimalē jāō si, kō tē piyā?
ēvaṁ bhō dhaṇadēva! tēṇa taïyā puṭṭhē maē sāhiyā |
puvvuttā sayalāvi tujjha kahiyā jā sā paüttī tahiṁ || 248 ||
aha sōvi maē puṭṭhō kēṇa tumaṁ ērisāē ghōrāē |
khittō si āvayāē kēṇa va kajjēṇa bhadda! muhā || 1 ||
ēvaṁ ca pucchiō sō sadukkhamaïdīharaṁ ca nīsasiuṁ |
aha sō bhaṇaï subhaṇiō saṁsārē rōgamōhiyamaṇāṇaṁ |
avarāhēsu guṇēsu ya nimittamētaṁ parō hōi || 5 ||
paramatthaō na kēṇaï suhaṁ va dukkhaṁ va kīraï narassa |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ēyanti natthi sandēhō |
aha bhaṇaï bhō sundara! jaï ēvaṁ suṭṭhu tumha nibbandhō |
tīē saha visayasōkkhaṁ aṇuhavamāṇassa tassa kālēṇa |
kamasō ya bārasāhē vōlīṇē majjha jaṇaṇijaṇaēhiṁ |
tāva ya gayaṇē diṭṭhā divvavimāṇāṇa riñchōlī || 31 ||
taṁ daṭṭhu maē bhaṇiyaṁ kattha imō handi! dēvasandōhō |
īsi hasiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ majjha vayaṁsēṇa bandhudattēṇa |
niccampi vayaṁsa! aō pasiddhavatthummi kā pucchā? || 35 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ēyanti kintu nisuṇēsu |
mahayā vicchaḍḍēṇaṁ na ēti niccaṁ surā ēttha || 36 ||
dīsanti jaṁ vayantā tēṇa maē pucchiyaṁ mitta! || 37 ||
aha bhaṇaï bandhudattō khaṇantaraṁ cintiūṇa savitakkaṁ |
acchaü tā phalakālē phullimaṁsamaēvi kālimā vayaṇē |
iya kaliuṁva palāsō cattō pattēhiṁ kiviṇōvva || 44 ||
annēvi hu appattā parariddhiṁ nēya visahanti || 45 ||
annaṁ ca | buhasahiōvi hu sūrō kavvasattō vasantamāhappā |
jiṇabimbāṇaṁ bhattīē tēṇa ēē samāgayā dēvā |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ jaï ēvaṁ tō vayaṁsa! amhēvi |
aha savvēhivi bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ hōutti suṭṭhu tē bhaṇiyaṁ |
ētthantarammi pattō maha dhāisuō balō nāma || 60 ||
āgamma tēma bhaṇiyaṁ piuṇā tē cittavēga! saṁlattaṁ |
tēṇa samaṁ amhēvi hu caliyā tā sigghamēva āgaccha |
tēvi ya majjha vayaṁsā niyaniyagēhēsu sampattā || 64 ||
kayaṇhāṇāivihāṇō saha piuṇā tāhē pavaṇagaïṇā haṁ |
tattō kamēṇa pattā disi disi naccantaaccharāniyaraṁ |
pupphāiṁ gēṇhantō antō vihiṇā paviṭṭhō haṁ || 74 ||
vattē jiṇamajjaṇaē iō taō tattha sañcarantō haṁ |
ēvaṁ ca jāva kōūhalēṇa avarāvarēsu ṭhāṇēsu |
hiṇḍāmi tattha bhavaṇē līlāē samaṁ vayaṁsēhiṁ || 80 ||
tāva maha māulasuō saharisamāgamma sāiyaṁ dāuṁ |
kusalaṁ ca pavaṇagaïṇō piubhagiṇīē ya baülavaïyāē? |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ kusalaṁ savvēsi, annaṁ ca || 82 ||
ētthēva āgayāi imāiṁ ciṭṭhanti bhadda! jiṇabhavaṇē |
ammāpiūṇa mūlaṁ samāgaō tēṇa sahiō haṁ || 83 ||
sāyaramavagụ̄dhō sō tēhiṁ paüttiṁ ca pucchiō bhaṇaï |
aha sō maē pabhaṇiō vittappāyā imā hu jiṇajattā |
sampaï puṇa amhāṇaṁ āgacchasu pāhuṇō tāva || 85 ||
tō bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō ēvaṁ ēyanti kintu nisuṇēsu |
tā cittavēga! sampaï taṁ ciya nagarammi ēhi mahataṇaē |
ukkaṇṭhiō pagāmaṁ jaṁ acchaï tumha māulaō || 87 ||
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bhaṇiō ammāpīīhiṁ abbhaṇunnāō |
tahiṁya ca cittabhāṇū maṁ daṭṭhūṁ suṭṭhu harisiō bhaṇaï |
diṭṭhō adiṭṭhapuvvō ēsō sumiṇō maē taïyā || 91 ||
caliō haṁ na ya sakkēmi gēṇhiuṁ taṁ jayā kahavi || 92 ||
kēṇavi mittēṇa taō samappiyā āyarēṇa mē gahiyā |
ōlambissaṁ galaē kila niyaē tāva sā jhatti || 93 ||
paḍiyā maha hatthāō katthavi ya gayatti nēya jāṇāmi |
sukkāvi maē ēsā puṇōvi amilāṇakusumiyā vihiyā |
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ kēṇavi kaṇṭhē viṇivēsiyā majjha || 95 ||
sōuṁ tūrassa ravaṁ jhatti paṇaṭṭhā mahaṁ niddā || 96 ||
tō harisavisāyaḍḍhaṁ daṭṭhuṁ sumiṇaṁ vicintiyaṁ hiyaē |
kiṁ nāma majjha sūyaï adiṭṭhapuvvaṁ imaṁ sumiṇaṁ? || 97 ||
kā handi! imā mālā vijjā va sampayā va maha hōjjā |
dinnā kēṇavi naṭṭhā puṇaravi laddhā, na yāṇāmi || 98 ||
aha taṁ pabhāyadiṭṭhaṁ siṭṭhaṁ suviṇaṁ tu bhāṇuvēgassa |
nicchaïuṁ nō sakkaï sōvi hu suviṇassa sabbhāvaṁ || 101 ||
jā ciṭṭhāmō amhē khaṇantaraṁ tattha ṭhāṇammi || 102 ||
savvō vi nayaralōō gantuṁ katthavi payaṭṭōti || 103 ||
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ maē bhaṇiyaṁ sabālavuḍ̣dhō imō jaṇō kattha |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa nisuṇasu ajjaṁ jaṁ mayaṇatērasī bhadda! |
ēsō naranārigaṇō pūyatthaṁ tassa vaccaï pamōyā |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ hōutti dōvi sañcaliyā |
kayasiṅgārā payaō pattā ya kamēṇa ujjāṇaṁ || 107 ||
taṁ majjhē pavisittā daṭṭhūṇa raīē sañjuyaṁ mayaṇaṁ |
jāva khaṇantaramēgaṁ kumara! ahaṁ tattha acchāmi || 118 ||
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ cintiyaṁ mē kā ēsā handi! maṇaharasaruvā |
puṭṭhō ya bhāṇuvēgō kā ēsā kassa vāvi mahilatti? |
ēīē saṅkahāē na hu kajjaṁ kiñci uṭṭhimō tāva |
ēsā huṁ vaṅkavaṅkaṁ jōyaï tuha saṁmuhaṁ jēṇa || 126 ||
dēhaṁ kuṇaï asatthaṁ avassa hiyayaṁ avaharējjā || 127 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ parihāsaparō si amhē ēmēva |
pucchāmō kōugēṇaṁ taṁ puṇa annaṁ viappēsi || 128 ||
tō bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō imammi nayarammi atthi payaḍajasō |
ēsā ēgā dhūyā tāṇaṁ jāyā aṇōvamaguṇaḍ̣dhā |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ kā ēsā mayaṇapūyaṇaṁ kuṇaï? |
ēsāvi kā sahīē puraō vattaṁ kahēmāṇī? || 131 ||
kō va imō avalambaï galaē vēsāē taruṇaō purisō? |
ēmāi maē puṭṭhō hasiūṇa taō imaṁ bhaṇaï || 132 ||
ēvaṁvihapucchāhiṁ kīsa tuma suyaṇu! maṁ payārēsa? |
na hu suyaṇu! paḍhamapucchaṁ ērisapucchāhiṁ chāiüṁ tarasi |
kiḍaēhiṁ payattēṇavi chāijjaï kaha ṇu paccūsō? || 134 ||
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bhaṇiō lajjāē ahōmuhō ṭhiō ahayaṁ |
taṁ daṭṭhu bhāṇuvēgō ṭhiō alakkhōvva hōūṇaṁ || 135 ||
maḍḍāē tahavi nivaḍaï maha diṭṭhī tīē muhakamalē || 136 ||
sariūṇa saṇiya-saṇiyaṁ jattha piyaṁ tattha alliyaï || 137 ||
sāvi hu bālā caliyā puṇō puṇō maṁ pulōēntī || 140 ||
āyaḍ̣dhiya pacchannaṁ maha hiyayaṁ jhatti avahariyaṁ || 141 ||
mayaṇattā sā jantī aṇamisanayaṇēhiṁ pulaïyā tāva |
aha bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō gacchāmō niyagihammi amhēvi |
ēvanti maē bhaṇiē samāgayā dōvi gēhammi || 145 ||
tō bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō kīsa tumaṁ dummaṇōvva sañjāō? |
kiṁ kuṇasi aṅgabhaṅgaṁ dīhaṁ nīsasiya mukkahuṅkārō |
kiṅkimpi cintiūṇaṁ aṇimittaṁ cēva kīsa taṁ hasasi? |
kiṁ ciṭṭhasi na ya sāhasi sabbhāvaṁ kiñci amhāṇaṁ? || 150 ||
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bahusō pucchijjantēṇa kumara! mē bhaṇiyaṁ |
jāṇāmi nēva kiṁ puṇa maha dēhaṁ gāḍhamassatthaṁ? || 151 ||
hasiūṇa tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ puvvaṁ ciya sāhiyaṁ maē tujjha |
tā tīē cakkhudōsā ēsō savvōvi tujjha santāvō |
dāvijjaï sā hatthaṁ paṭṭhīē jēṇa hōi suhaṁ || 153 ||
nīsasiya maē bhaṇiyaṁ sandēhō jīviyassavi ya amhaṁ |
taṁ puṇa suhiō bhāō ya parihāsaṁ kīsa nō kuṇasi? || 154 ||
annāyammi sarūvē kiṁ kāuṁ sakkimō amhē? || 155 ||
tāhi maē vajjariyaṁ sāhijjaï tassa jō na yāṇāi |
taṁ puṇa jāṇantōvi hu aliyaṁ ciya pucchisi mamanti || 156 ||
tō bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō lahuṁ pavēsēha ēva bhaṇiyammi |
aha sacciya sōmalayā samāgayā amha pāsammi || 159 ||
kayaüvayārā tāhē uvaviṭṭhā bhaṇaï sāyaraṁ vayaṇaṁ |
ēgantaṁ kuṇaha taō cūyalayā pēsiyā tattō || 160 ||
kattō bhaddē! vasaṇaṁ, sā bhaṇaī kusumabāṇāō || 162 ||
daṭṭhūṇa bhīyabhīō dūraṁ dūrēṇa vaccaï aṇaṅgō |
tattō kaha tujjha bhayaṁ jarāē jajjariyadēhāē? || 165 ||
sōmalayāē bhaṇiyaṁ mā maṁ uvahasasu suṇasu vattantaṁ |
tattō ya maē puṭhṭhā kīsa tumaṁ putti! vimaṇadummaṇiyā? |
na ya tīē kiñci siṭṭhaṁ sudīharaṁ navari nīsasiuṁ || 168 ||
tattō ya maē puṭṭhā tīē sahī haṁsiyā nāma || 169 ||
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ ambē! ujjāṇa ajja pāviyā amhē |
pūiya mayaṇaṁ bāhiṁ nīsariyā jāva tā diṭṭhō || 170 ||
taṁ daṭṭhūṇaṁ ēsā jāyā nipphandalōyaṇā sahasā |
savvaṅgiō imīē aṇimisadiṭṭhīē jōiō sa yuvā |
na ya tēṇa imā diṭṭhā kōugavakkhittacittēṇa || 173 ||
kiṅkimpi cintiūṇaṁ bhaṇaï sahīō! imammi cūyadumē |
kīlāmō tāva khaṇaṁ bandhiya andōlayaṁ amhē || 175 ||
ēvaṁ tāhiṁ bhaṇiē tahēva sampāḍiyammi ēsāvi |
jaï ēsō maha saddaṁ sōūṇaṁ saṁmuhaṁ palōējjā |
hōjjāmi tā kayatthā ii āsāē taḍijjantī || 177 ||
taṁ pēkkhiūṇa ya maē parihāsavasēṇa jampiyaṁ ēyaṁ |
kōugavakkhittamaṇō ēsō tuha dēi nēya paḍivayaṇaṁ |
taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ savilakkhā kiñci sañjāyā || 179 ||
sajjhasaharisēhiṁ imā tāhi aüvvaṁ rasaṁ pattā || 180 ||
avaruṇḍaï sahinivahaṁ uccaṁ saṁlavaï hasaï animittaṁ |
pāyaṅguṭṭhēṇa mahiṁ vilihaï kēsē ya sañjamaï || 182 ||
ēvaṁ ca haṁsiyāē bhaṇiyammi puṇōvi sā maē puṭṭhā |
kō sō purisō haṁsiṇi!, kahiyaṁ savvampi maha tīē || 184 ||
sōhaṇaṭhāṇē rāgō puttīē, cintiuṁ gayā pāsē |
tīē diṭṭhā ya maē sayaṇīyagayā kaṇagamālā || 185 ||
kahakahavi hu niyajīyaṁ mahayā kicchēṇa dhārantī || 186 ||
puṭṭhā na dēi vayaṇaṁ ālavaï na sahijaṇaṁ siṇiddhampi |
ēvaṁ kusumasarāō aïgaruyaṁ āgayaṁ mahaṁ vasaṇaṁ |
jaṁ tīē dukkhiyāē ahampi aïdukkhiyā cēva || 192 ||
tā suyaṇu! kaṇagamālā jā sā nīsāsasōsiyasarīrā |
āsāsijjaü varaī jāva na sāsā samappanti || 193 ||
lahu kuṇasu kiñcuvāyaṁ jāva na nīsaraï jīviyaṁ tīē |
tavvayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ taïyā aha rāyaütta! mē bhaṇiyaṁ |
ēyampi na jāṇāmō kā ēsā kaṇagamālatti || 195 ||
amhē puṇa pāhuṇayā ayāṇuyā ēttha vatthumi || 196 ||
aha bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō amhēvi hu nēva jāṇimō kiñci |
tō bhaṇaï sōmalayā sāsūyaṁ ērisaṁ vayaṇaṁ || 197 ||
hariūṇa tīē hiyayaṁ diṭṭhibāṇēhiṁ pahariyaṁ aṅgē |
tuḍigayajīyaṁ kāuṁ taṁ sampaï ayāṇuō jāō || 198 ||
kaṇṭhagayajīviyāsā tuha virahē maraï natthi sandēhō |
ayaṇattaṁ avalambiyaṁ taṁ ciṭṭhasi niddaō bhadda! || 199 ||
jō jattha jaṇō nivasaï rakkhaï sō āyarēṇa taṁ gēhaṁ |
tīē maṇammi vasantō kiṁ niddaya! taṁ maṇaṁ dahasi? || 200 ||
hariūṇa tīē hiyayaṁ sampaï cōrōvva ninhavēmāṇō |
na hu chuṭṭasi suyaṇu! tumaṁ kiñci uvāyaṁ vicintēsu || 201 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ amma! taṁ cēva sāhasu uvāyaṁ |
ēvaṁ cavatthiyammi jaṁ juttaṁ amha kāuṁ jē || 202 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ sōmalayāē cittaṁ pattaṁ va paccayanimittaṁ |
paṭṭhavasu jēṇa cittaṁ sandhīraï sā tayaṁ daṭṭhuṁ || 203 ||
tattō ya maē lihiyā pattē naliṇīō tīē paümammi |
hiṭṭhē ya tassa lihiyā ēsā gāhā uvvunnayarasēṇa |
taha kahavi pariṭṭhaviyaṁ aliṇō naliṇīē parimalaṁ hiyaē |
taṁ ca bahu pattamajjhē kāuṁ tō pēsiō satambōlō |
cūyalayāē hatthē dōvi gayā tīē pāsammi || 207 ||
tattō khaṇantarāō cūyalayā āgayā imaṁ bhaṇaï |
ēttō viṇiggayā haṁ pattā ya kamēṇa taggēhē || 208 ||
mattavva mucchiyā iva giliyā iva suyaṇu! gurupisāēṇa |
jhatti niviṭṭhā tattō pāsiya maṁ lajjiyāva maṇayanti |
tāhē samappiō sē tambōlō saharisaṁ gahiō || 211 ||
gahiyatthāē bhaṇiyaṁ kēṇēsō pēsiō mha tambōlō? |
mē bhaṇiyaṁ taha sundari! maṇōharēṇaṁ piyayamēṇaṁ || 212 ||
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ kannā ahanti kaha majjha piyayamō bhaddē!? |
mē bhaṇiyaṁ naṇu hōhī aha sā aphuḍakkharaṁ bhaṇaï || 213 ||
kaha māmi! aünnāē ēttiyamēttāṇi majjha punnāṇi |
jaṁ sō bhattā hōhī daṁsaṇamittampi aïdulahaṁ || 214 ||
tattō sahīhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ sāhējjasu tassa nigghiṇamaṇassa |
annaṁ ca | jaha kahavi tāva vōlaï rayaṇī kusalēṇa tā pabhāyammi |
taddaṁsaṇēṇa jīvaï na annahā ēsa nicchaō amha |
ēvaṁ bahuhā bhaṇiyā samāgayā tumha pāsammi || 218 ||
ēvaṁ cūyalayāē bhaṇiyaṁ sōūṇa tīē vuttantaṁ |
jaï marihī sā bālā kahavi hu guruvirahatāviyā handi! |
ēēṇa nimittēṇaṁ tā majjhavi āgayaṁ maraṇaṁ || 220 ||
ahavā siṇēhajuttā jaï sā tā kīsa majjha paḍivayaṇaṁ |
navi dinnaṁ tā mannē mandasiṇēhā u maha uvariṁ || 221 ||
jaïvi hu sā ninnēhā tahavi maṇaṁ majjha tīē virahammi |
nayaṇēhiṁ pulaïyā sā tāiṁ ciya dahaü ēsa piyavirahō |
hiyaēṇa kimavaraddhaṁ jēṇa tayaṁ niddayaṁ dahaï? || 223 ||
annēṇa kayaṁ annō na bhuñjaē aliyamērisaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
sā diṭṭhā nayaṇēhiṁ jāō hiyayassa santāvō || 224 ||
taṁ hiyaya! kiṁ vimūrasi sāhīṇē cintiyavvammi? || 225 ||
nayaṇēhiṁ jōiyā sā hiyaēṇa kaō ya gurayapaḍibandhō |
sarisēvi hu avarāhē virahō hiyayaṁ daḍhaṁ dahaï || 226 ||
rōsēṇa rattamuhā samāgayā jhatti aha sañjhā || 229 ||
santāviuṁ payattō maha hiyayaṁ tāhē sayaguṇiyaṁ || 232 ||
aha cintiuṁ payattō amayamaō summaī imō candō |
hē hiyaya! kīsa ujjhasi uvvēyaṁ kīsa kuṇasi accatthaṁ? |
dullahajaṇammi rāgaṁ paḍhamaṁ ciya kīsa taṁ kuṇasi? || 234 ||
annaṁ ca | jō kira karēi nēhaṁ tassēva ya hiyaya! racciuṁ juttaṁ |
dūraṭṭhiōvi jō dahaï māṇasaṁ tammi kō rāgō? || 235 ||
so cciya vubbhaï hiyaē so cciya aïniṭṭhurō dahaï dēhaṁ |
kassa kahijjaï vattā saraṇāō bhayammi ubbhūē? || 236 ||
kiṁ mannē hōjja diyahaṁ jammī laggējja majjha hatthammi |
acchaü tā dūre cciya pāṇiggahaṇāiyaṁ tu saha tīē |
kiṁ majjha jīviēṇaṁ kiṁvā maha handi! maṇuyajammēṇa |
jō virahadukkhasamaṇaṁ tīē vayaṇaṁ na pēcchāmi? || 239 ||
tīē saha daṁsaṇayaṁ aṇukūlō jaï vihī hōhī || 240 ||
aha lajjiuvva candō atthagiriṁ pāviō tattō || 244 ||
ētthantarammi ahayampi samuṭṭhiūṇa kiccaṁ pabhāyataṇayaṁ kariuṁ payattō |
bhō suppaïṭṭha! taïyā daïyāi hōhī sandaṁsaṇamha ii pahiṭṭhamaṇō pagāmaṁ || 248 ||
aha bhāō bhāṇuvēgō samāgaō pahasiō mamaṁ bhaṇaï |
puṭṭhō ya maē bhāyā kattha imaṁ vajjaē tūraṁ? || 3 ||
tō bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō sammaṁ jāṇē na kāraṇaṁ ēttha |
abbhahiō santāvō phuraï ya vāmaṁ tahā nayaṇaṁ? || 5 ||
tā bhaviyavvaṁ kēṇavi ēttha naṇu kāraṇēṇa tāhē maē |
cūyalayā vāhariyā samāgayā aha imaṁ bhaṇiyā || 6 ||
kattha imō tūraravō kēṇava kajjēṇa sammamuvalabbha |
āgantūṇaṁ bhaddē! sigghaṁ ciya kahasu amhāṇaṁ || 7 ||
vicchāyavayaṇakamalā puṭṭhā ya maē imaṁ bhaṇaï || 8 ||
tattō ya bandhudattō patthuyavatthummi pucchiyā bhaṇaï |
ēvaṁ viyāṇiūṇaṁ samāgayā ēttha tumha pāsammi |
tīē vayaṇaṁ sōuṁ dhasatti gurumōggarēṇa pahaō haṁ |
kattha imā kattha ahaṁ annōnnaṁ kattha garuyaaṇurāgō |
navaraṁ hayāsavihiṇā savvaṁ ciya annahā vihiyaṁ || 17 ||
puvvampi hu jaï buddhī ērisayā āsi tujjha rē divva! |
tā kaha maha paḍhamaṁ ciya tīē saha daṁsaṇaṁ vihiyaṁ? || 18 ||
kāūma daṁsaṇaṁ garūyarāyasahiyaṁ hayāsa! rē! divva! |
annattha taṁ mayacchiṁ jōḍēntō ki naṁ lajjihisi? || 19 ||
aviya | nayaṇāṇa paḍaü vajjaṁ ahavā vajjassa vaḍḍilaṁ kimpi |
vajjaghaḍiyaṁva mannē jaṁ navi sayasikkaraṁ jāsi || 22 ||
puṇaravi sā sōmalayā samāgayā kiñci harisiyāva maṇē |
uvaviṭṭhā maṁ daṭṭhuṁ suṭṭhuṁ visāyāuraṁ taïyā || 24 ||
tā bhaṇaï kīsa sundara! dīsasi taṁ dummaṇōvva accatthaṁ |
suṇiuṁ varaṇayavattaṁ, tāva nisāmēsu maha vayaṇaṁ || 25 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca maē ajjavi kiṁ āsā kāvi atthi amhāṇa |
vajjarasi jēṇa ēvaṁ sōmalaē!, tāhi sā bhaṇaï || 26 ||
tuha virahē gayacēṭṭhaṁ daṭṭhūṇaṁ tāva kaṇagamālaṁ tu |
sāvi hu sahīhiṁ kahavi tuha saṅgamasūyagēhiṁ vayaṇēhiṁ |
khaṇamēttaṁ mucchijjaï uṭhṭhiyaï puṇōvi muyaï huṅkārē |
gāyaï hasaï ya vēvaïrōvaï ya khaṇēṇa uttasaï || 29 ||
hasiyāvi sahijaṇēṇaṁ navi jāṇaï kiñci hayahiyayā || 30 ||
taṁ pēkkhiūṇa ya maē vicintiyaṁ jāva muyaï nō pāṇē |
vajjaraï cittamālā kīsa tumaṁ putti! uvviggā? || 33 ||
acchasi ōsannamuhī bhaṇiyāvi hu kīsa dēsi nālāvaṁ? |
suhasajjhaṁ cēva imaṁ mā putti! visāyamuvvahasu || 34 ||
amhāṇa cittabhāṇū āyattō taṁ ca putti! kannā si |
uciō ya cittavēgō rūvēṇaṁ kalāhiṁ jaṁ tujjha || 35 ||
tassa ya uvariṁ jāō aṇurāgō tujjha tēṇa savvampi |
amukūlamiṇaṁ jāyaṁ mā cintasu annahā vacchē! || 36 ||
kintu tuha putti! jaṇaō gaṅgāvattammi khayaranayarammi |
āgacchaü sō sigghaṁ kusalēṇaṁ tāhē tujjha vīvāhaṁ |
sigghaṁ ciya putti! tumaṁ mā kāhisi kiñci uvvēvaṁ || 39 ||
jāyā maṇayaṁ satthā samuṭṭhiyā tāhē sē jaṇaṇī || 40 ||
ṇhāya vilittō bhuttō uvaviṭhṭhō uvarimāē bhūmīē |
niyadhūyāē paüttī savvāvi hu tassa akkhāyā || 43 ||
taṁ sōuṁ amiyagaī sāmamuhō takkhaṇēṇa sañjāō |
bhaṇaï ahō! aïgarūyaṁ samāgayaṁ amha vasaṇanti || 44 ||
tō bhaṇaï cittamālā piyayama! kiṁ kāraṇaṁ nu vasaṇassa? |
tattō ya amiyagaïṇā vajjariyaṁ piyayamē! suṇasu || 45 ||
sirigandhavāhaṇassa ō pāsammi gaō ahaṁ taïyā || 46 ||
sambhāsiēṇa ya taō nivēiyaṁ rāyakajjaṁ sē || 47 ||
vihiyapaṇāmō rannō pāraddhō ērisaṁ sa vajjariuṁ |
vijjāharāṇa rāyā vēyaḍ̣dhē āsi jō dēva! || 49 ||
tattō ya tassa vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ gandhavāhaṇō rāyā |
bhō āgacchasu saṅgaya! āsannō, ajja tāyavattāē |
vilaïya tassa sarīrē tattō bhaṇḍāriyaṁ bhaṇaï || 60 ||
tēṇa sahiō ahampi hu caliō muṇipāyavandaṇanimittaṁ |
daṭṭhūṇa muṇivaraṁ taṁ kāūṇa payāhiṇaṁ ca tikkhuttō |
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē bhō bhō bhaddā! sammaṁ vicintēha || 79 ||
kēvalibhaṇiyaṁ dhammaṁ mōttūṇaṁ natthi kiñci annanti |
tamhā kuṇaha payattaṁ dulahaṁ laddhūṇa māṇusaṁ jammaṁ |
iya kēvaliṇā bhaṇiē viṇivēsiya karayalañjaliṁ sīsē |
vajjaraï gandhavāhaṇarāyā u tahatti jaṁ bhaṇaha || 83 ||
dāuṁ vijjāniyaraṁ rajjēṇa samaṁ tu niyayaputtassa |
paccakkhaṁ hi bhayavaō ēyaṁ jamahaṁ tu pucchissaṁ || 86 ||
dhūyāē kō bhattā hōhī maṇavallahotti ēyāē |
cintāē maha hiyayaṁ bhayavaṁ! niccapi akkhaliyaṁ || 88 ||
tā maṇanivvuihēuṁ sāhijjaü ēsa amha vuttantō |
pāṇiggahaṇaṁ tīē kō kira vijjāharō kāhī? || 89 ||
ēvaṁ ca pucchiēṇaṁ kēvaliṇā suyaṇu! ērisaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ |
mā bhadda! kuṇa visāyaṁ thōva ciya ēttha vatthummi || 90 ||
tuha dhūyāē bhattā sō hōhī jō imammi vēyaḍ̣dhē |
tattō rannā sahiō samāgaō tammi cēva nayarammi |
aha rannā haṁ bhaṇiō bahumāṇajuyaṁ imaṁ vayaṇaṁ || 94 ||
aïvallahāvi dhūyā dāyavvā tāva kassaï narassa |
jaṁ ēsā lōgaṭṭhiī tēṇamhē ērisaṁ bhaṇimō || 95 ||
nahavāhaṇassa dijjaü sā kannā jēṇa vittavīvāhaṁ |
tattō maēvi bhaṇiyaṁ ētthatthē natthi kiñci vattavvaṁ |
dhūyā kittiyamēttaṁ pāṇāvi hu tumha āyattā || 97 ||
sacciya dhūyā dhannā suṇhā jā hōi dēvapāyāṇaṁ |
kēvaligirāvi saccā jaṁ kijjaï ērisē vihiē || 98 ||
tumha suyaṁ mōttūṇaṁ vēyaḍḍhagirimmi hōjja kō annō |
vijjāṇa cakkavaṭṭī jassa piyā hōjja maha dhūyā? || 99 ||
ēvaṁ ca maē bhaṇiē viyasiyavayaṇēṇa rāiṇāṇattō |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ āēsaṁ dēha jēṇa gantūṇa |
tēṇāṇunnāō haṁ sigghaṁ ciya āgaō ihaṁ suyaṇu! |
kallē pabhāyasamaē kila hōi varaṇayaṁ tīē || 104 ||
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē | ēsā ēkkā dhūyā suṭṭhu piyā tāva kaṇagamālamha |
tā jaï maṇō 'ṇukūlaṁ sampāḍissaṁ na ēkkadhūyāē |
ēīyavi, tā sundarī! kiñca maē jīviēṇanti? || 106 ||
taṁ ca iyāṇiṁ annahakāuṁ cāijjaē na jaṁ suyaṇu! |
ēēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ mē bhaṇiyaṁ āgayaṁ vasaṇaṁ || 108 ||
tattō tīē bhaṇiyaṁ maha cittē phuraï ērisaṁ tāva |
kahakahavi maē jaṁ sā tappāvaṇasuyagēhiṁ vayaṇēhiṁ |
puvviṁ sadhīraviyā ēyaṁ puṇa annahā jāyaṁ || 111 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca amiyagaïṇā ēvaṁ hi ṭhiē karēmi kiṁ suyaṇu! |
jaï tāva na dēmi imaṁ tō rāyā rūsaï avassaṁ || 112 ||
kēvalivayaṇā rannō aïgaruō ēttha āyarō jāō |
tēṇa imāi adāṇē aïgaruyaṁ hōi maha khūṇaṁ || 113 ||
ruṭṭhēṇa tēṇa vēyaḍḍhanagavarē jaṁ na hōi āvāsō |
aïthōvaṁ ciya ēyaṁ, annampi virūvayaṁ hōi || 114 ||
annaṁ ca | giṇhissaï maḍḍāivi rāyā ēyaṁ na ēttha sandēhō |
jaï puṇa dijjaï ēsā rāyasuyaṁ mōttu cittavēgassa |
tā tassāvi amhāṇavi pāṇāṇavi saṁsaō hōi || 116 ||
tā sundari! na hu kajjaṁ annēhiṁ ēttha bahuvigappēhiṁ |
taha bhaṇasu kaṇagamālaṁ jaha ujjhaï tammi aṇurāyaṁ || 117 ||
rūvēṇa jōvvaṇēṇa ya kalāhiṁ vijjāhiṁ nimmalaguṇēhiṁ |
tattō sa ēva bhattā kamāgaō hōu kaṇagamālāē |
na hu kajjaṁ annēṇa avāyabahulēṇa purisēṇaṁ || 120 ||
ēvaṁ ca amiyagaïṇā bhaṇiyāē tāhi cittamālāē |
bhaṇiyā haṁ sōmalaē! kiṁ juttaṁ sampayaṁ kāuṁ? || 121 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ taṁ cēva ya ittha gahiyaparamatthā |
tō bhaṇaï cittamālā tīē gantūṇa bhāvamulabhasu |
icchaï va navā annaṁ purisaṁ guṇadōsakahaṇēṇa? || 123 ||
taha kuṇasu jahā icchaï vīvāhaṁ ēyataṇaēṇa || 124 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ sāmiṇi! kiṁ taṁ na yāṇasi sabhāvaṁ |
niyadhūyāē jēṇaṁ āēsaṁ dēsi maha ēvaṁ || 125 ||
mannissaï vīvāhaṁ jaṁ sā aṇṇassa, acchaü sudūraṁ |
maha vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ gurudukkhasamāhayā bhaṇaï tattō |
jaṁ bhaṇasi tumaṁ bhaddē! majjhavi hiyayammi phuraï taṁ saccaṁ |
kiṁ maha thōvaṁ dukkhaṁ navaraṁ na caēmi annahākāuṁ |
rāyasuyassa adāṇē dōsē ya guṇē vicintēsu || 131 ||
anna caṁ, kaṇagamālā bahumāṇaparā hu jaṇaṇijaṇagāṇaṁ |
annañca, kannagāē bhattā kila hōi guruaṇunnāō |
kicca | nahavāhaṇarāyasuō jāva na diṭṭhīi gōyarē paḍaï |
nijjiyaaṇaṅgaruvē diṭhṭhē uṇa tammi hōhihī rāgō |
gantūṇa kaṇagamālaṁ suniuṇavayaṇēhiṁ bhaṇasu taṁ suyaṇu! |
ēyammi vaïyarammi jaha amhaṁ hōi na hu vasaṇaṁ || 136 ||
ēvaṁ ca amiyagaïṇā bhaṇiyāē tāhi cittamālāē |
bhaṇiyā haṁ sōmalaē! piyayamavayaṇaṁ lahuṁ kuṇasu || 137 ||
tattō tahatti bhaṇiu samuṭṭhiyā jāva tāhi mē puṭṭhā |
taṁ sōūṇa vigappō uppannō maha maṇammi ērisaō |
tēṇēva imā mannē jāyā vicchāvayaṇiyā bālā |
tā jāva ēttha gantuṁ virūvamāyaraï navi kiñci || 141 ||
tā sigdhaṁ ciya gantu nivāraṇē tīē ujjamāmitti |
pattā ya gharujjāṇē iō taō taggēvasaṇanimittaṁ |
tattō vicintiyaṁ mē kiṁ mannē niyagihaṁ pamōttūṇa |
ēgāgiṇī hu ēsā samāgayā ēttha ujjāṇē? || 146 ||
tā ēīi adiṭṭhā pacchannaṭhiyā niēmi jaṁ kuṇati |
khaṇamēgaṁ jā ciṭṭhāmi tattha tā suṇasu jaṁ jāyaṁ || 148 ||
dīhaṁ nīsasiūṇaṁ ēvaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tu kaṇagamālāē |
suciraṁ vicintiūṇavi tēṇa jaṇēṇaṁ na saṅgamō tāva |
jāē tassa viōgē phuṭṭantaṁ dhāriyaṁ hiyayaṁ || 151 ||
tā kā ajjavi āsā jēṇa tumaṁ hiyaya! phuṭṭasi na jhatti |
na ya piuvayaṇaṁ sōuṁ icchiyajaṇavirahakārayaṁ hiyaṁ |
vajjaghaḍiyaṁva mannē jaṁ navi sayasikkaraṁ jāsi || 153 ||
ammāē tāyassavi vallahiyā haṁ ti iya maraṭṭō jō |
hiyayammi āsi majjhaṁ sōvi hu iṇhiṁ palīṇotti || 154 ||
suhasajjhaṁ ciya ēyaṁ kajjaṁ mā putti! kuṇa visāyanti |
jassuvari tujjha icchā dāyavvā tassa taṁ maē putti! |
vinnāyamahasarūvō ō annahā jaï karēi tāōvi |
maha vañchiyasampattīē sambhavō tā kahaṁ hōu? || 157 ||
ēvaṁ viyāṇiūṇavi hiyaya! tumaṁ kīsa muñcasi na āsaṁ |
ahavā na kōvi dōsō pahuparavasaciṭṭhiyassa tāyassa |
summaï jaṇammi payaḍaṁ kaṭṭhō khalu bhiccabhāvotti || 159 ||
jaïvi hu vijiyāṇaṅgō ruvēṇaṁ jaïvi sampayākaliō |
jaïvi hu uttamavaṁsō sakkhā sakkandaṇō jaïvi || 160 ||
tahavi na bhāvaï annō purisō taṁ hiyayavallahaṁ mōttuṁ |
jaï ēsa nicchaō hiyaya! tujjha tā kiṁ vilambēṇa? || 161 ||
ēsō sō patthāvō aïdulahō pāviotti kaliūṇaṁ |
ēvaṁ hi kaē tāyasya dēi dōsaṁ na kimpi rāyāvi |
daṭṭhūṇa sāhasantīē navari dēhaṁ pakampiyaṁ majjhaṁ |
na vahaï vāyā kahavi hu thakkāō savvasandhīō || 165 ||
aha pabhaṇiuṁ payattā ammē! jaṁ kiñci bālabhāvāō |
pabhiiṁ kilēsiyā taṁ taṁ khamiyavvaṁ mahaṁ saṁvvaṁ || 167 ||
tāya! tumampi hu maha khamasu sampayaṁ paṇayaparavasāi maē |
puvviṁ kilēsiō jaṁ paralōyaṁ patthiyā ahayaṁ || 168 ||
jaṇaṇīsamahiyanēhē! sōmalaē! khama kilēsiyā jaṁ si |
tuha saṅgamarahiyāē ēsō jammō hu tāva vōlīṇō |
annabhavē puṇa sāmiya! taṁ ciya maha vallahō hujjā || 171 ||
annaṁ bhaṇāmi sāmiya! jaïvi hu aïniṭṭhuraṁ imaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
tahavi hu tuha āvayāvāraṇatthamēsō mha nibbandhō || 172 ||
nīsara maha hiyayāō ruddhē kaṇṭhammi pāsaēṇahavā |
sakkēsi na nīsariu sāmiya! maha pāṇavallahaya! || 173 ||
mannē ca kiñci laddhaṁ hayavihiṇā maraṇakāraṇaṁ annaṁ |
maha tēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ tumaē saha daṁsaṇaṁ vihiyaṁ || 174 ||
sō khaṇadiṭṭhō lōgō daïō maha hōjja, nannotti || 175 ||
ēvaṁ bhaṇiuṁ tīē mukkō appā ahōmuhō jhatti |
mā mā sāhasamēyaṁ āyara bhaddē! samucchugā hōuṁ |
sō cēva tujjha bhattā hōhī naṇu cittavēgotti || 177 ||
aha sundari! ētthatthē mā kiñcivi kuṇa visāyanti || 178 ||
vayaṇāṇantaramēva hi tuṭṭō sē pāsaō, taō ahayaṁ |
tattō salajjavayaṇā bhaṇiyā ya maē na putti! tuha juttaṁ |
tattō ya tīi bhaṇiyaṁ ambē! amhārisāṇa kiṁ anna |
ēvaṁ hi gaē kāuṁ juttaṁ maraṇaṁ pamōttūṇaṁ? || 181 ||
jaō | vari maraṇaṁ mā virahō virahō aïdūsahō 'mha paḍihāi |
vari ēkkaṁ ciya maraṇaṁ jēṇa samappanti dukkhāiṁ || 182 ||
tattō ya maē tīsē kahiō savvōvi puvvavuttantō |
bhaṇiyā ya putti! sampaï kiṁ tuha paḍihāsaē kāuṁ? || 183 ||
aha tīē vajjariyaṁ lajjaṁ mōttuṁ bhaṇāmi ēyaṁ tu |
navi majjha karē laggaï annō purisō ihaṁ jammē || 184 ||
kintu kaha tujjha jaṇaō chuṭṭissaï gandhavāhaṇaō? || 185 ||
ētthantarammi puṇaravi gayaṇē vāyā samuṭṭhiyā ēsā |
mā! kuṇaha bahuvigappē maha vayaṇaṁ tāva nisuṇēha || 186 ||
gantūṇaṁ sōmalayā sāhaü jaṇayassa ērisaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
jaṁ cēva kuṇaï tāō taṁ cēva majjha bahumayaṁ savvaṁ |
jaï hōi sundaraṁ iha tāyassavi kīraï tayanti || 188 ||
ēvaṁ hi kaē kamasō hōhī iṭṭhatthasampattī || 189 ||
iya dēvayāē vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ cittavēga! amhāṇaṁ |
sañjātō gurutōsō tatō ya maē imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ || 190 ||
maṇavañchiyavatthummī mā kīraü putti! kāvi āsaṅkā |
ēvaṁ ca dēvayāē vayaṇaṁ annassa nēva kahiyavvaṁ |
tō bhaṇaï kaṇagamālā ēvaṁ ēyanti natthi sandēhō |
tā ambē! patthuyatthē ujjama kiṁ ēttha bahuēṇa? || 194 ||
tattō ya maē gantuṁ siṭṭhaṁ ēyaṁ tu cittamālāē |
bhaṇiyā bahuppagāraṁ tuha dhūyā bhaṇaï ēvaṁ tu || 195 ||
jaṁ kiñci bhaṇaï tāō jaṁ ciya iha bahumayaṁ tu ambāē |
jaṁ cēva ya saguṇataraṁ maēvi taṁ cēva kāyavvaṁ || 196 ||
jaha abbhudaō tāyassa hōi, jaha hōi nāvayā kayāvi |
taha cēva ya kāyavvaṁ maēvi, kiṁ ēttha annēṇa? || 197 ||
tattō ya cittamālā tavvayaṇaṁ kahaï niyayadaïyassa |
taṁ sōuṁ amiyagaī harisiyavayaṇō imaṁ bhaṇaï || 198 ||
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē | tuha maṇanivvuihēuṁ tīē vayaṇēṇa āgayā ahayaṁ |
tā mā sundara! varaṇayasavaṇāō dummaṇō tumaṁ hōsu |
jaṁ dēvayāē vayaṇaṁ aliyaṁ na ya havaï ēyaṁ tu || 202 ||
ēvaṁ ca kaṇagamālābhāṇaï na nāha! taṁ pamōttūṇa |
annassa karō laggaï maha hatthē ittha jammammi || 203 ||
dēvayavayaṇaṁ jaï saccayaṁ tā dharēmi niyapāṇā |
tadabhāvē puṇa saraṇaṁ maraṇaṁ maha nicchaō ēsō || 204 ||
jāyaṁ maṇayaṁ maha māṇasassa satthattaṇaṁ tattō || 205 ||
ēvaṁ vicintiyaṁ mē kēvaliṇā jēṇa ērisaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ |
aṇurāō jāō jaṁ summaï lōyappavāō ya || 207 ||
viyasanti piyē diṭṭhē avvō! maülinti vēsammi || 208 ||
tā bhaviyavvaṁ imiṇā navaraṁ aïdugghaḍamha paḍihāi |
jaṁ sā rāyasuēṇaṁ variyā kaha majja hōhitti? || 209 ||
jaṁ kiñci ēttha hōhī dīsissaï taṁ sayaṁ ambē! || 210 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ sōmalayāē ēvaṁ ēyanti natthi sandēhō |
aha bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō puvviṁ diṭṭhassa tassa sumiṇassa |
lēsēṇa kōvi atthō 'vadhāriō tāva taṁ suṇasu || 212 ||
ēsā hu kaṇagamālā mālā hōhitti, tīē jō rāgō |
taggahaṇaṁ taṁ jāṇasu varaṇaṁ puṇa tīē apattī || 213 ||
ēttiyamēttō atthō paripphuḍō tāva jāṇiō hu maē |
sēsampi hu avvattaṁ viyāṇiyaṁ kiñci taṁ suṇasu || 214 ||
kōvi uvāēṇa imaṁ appissaï tujjha sā puṇō kahavi |
bhaṭṭhā tuha hatthāō pāvissaï āvaï garuiṁ || 215 ||
tattō rakkhiya kōvi hu ̣dhōissaï tujjha tēṇa pajjantō |
taṁ sōuṁ maē bhaṇiyaṁ sammaṁ hi viṇicchiyaṁ tumē suyaṇu! |
ghaḍaï jaō ēsatthō navaraṁ aïdugghaḍō lāhō || 217 ||
tō bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō vatthuṁ na taṁ atthi ēttha lōgammi |
aṇukūlassa u vihiṇō jaṁ mannē dugghaḍaṁ hōi || 218 ||
sampattō aha pattā kamēṇa sā pañcamitihīvi || 221 ||
avvō! kiṁ taṁ aliyaṁ hōhī iha dēvayāvayaṇaṁ? || 222 ||
ahava na dīsaï kiñcivi aṇurūvaṁ tassa tēṇa mannāmi |
pattō ya tamujjāṇaṁ saccaviyā jattha sā maē puvviṁ |
aha cintiuṁ payattō iṇhiṁ kiṁ majjha kāumuciyaṁ tu |
parahatthaṁ sampattā tāva piyā maha niyantassa || 226 ||
iṇhiṁ puṇa nō sakkaṁ kimpi uvāyantaraṁ kāuṁ || 227 ||
ēsōvi hu aṇurāgō ēvampi gaē na tuṭṭaē kahavi |
aviya | dullahalambhammi jaṇē jassiha purisassa hōi aṇurāgō |
na ya jāṇē kahava imaṁ niyahiyayaṁ saṇṭhavāmitti? || 230 ||
tā kiṁ karēmiṁ iṇhiṁ ahavā kiṁ ēttha bahuvigappēhiṁ |
jaïvi na jujjaï ēsō vivēyajuttāṇa uttamanarāṇa |
tīē virahē tahavi hu sakkēmi na jīviyaṁ dhariuṁ || 232 ||
tā ētthēva taruvarē tīē andōlaṇēṇa supavittē |
ēvaṁ vicintiūṇaṁ ārụdhō tammi taruvarē ahayaṁ |
dāuṁ galaē pāsaṁ aha ēvaṁ bhaṇiumāḍhattō || 234 ||
rē divva! annajanmē dullahalambhammi māṇasē nēhaṁ |
mā maha karijja ēsā hu patthaṇā tuha maē vihiyā || 235 ||
annaṁ ca | kēvaliṇō taṁ vayaṇaṁ, sā vāyā dēviyāvi, taṁ suviṇaṁ |
āsānibandhaṇaṁ majjha divva! savvaṁ kayaṁ aliyaṁ || 236 ||
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa maē mukkō appā ahōmuhō jhati |
rūddhaṁ galayaṁ ākuñciyāō dhamaṇīō pasariyā viyaṇā |
karaṇāiṁ ghāiyāiṁ jāyā aha vēyaṇā mandā || 239 ||
ētthantarammi kēṇavi lambantaṁ ukkhivittu maha dēhaṁ |
lahu cchindiūṇa pāsaṁ vihiō miusīyalō pavaṇō || 242 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa kiṁ bhadda! bāhaē, daṁsiyaṁ maē galayaṁ |
aha saṁvāhaṇavihiṇā tampi hu satthaṁ kayaṁ tēṇa || 247 ||
vigayasayalapīḍō satthadēhō tayā haṁ, kisalayaraïyammī sattharē saṁniviṭṭhō |
aha sō daṭhṭhūṇa mamaṁ viddāṇamuhaṁ galantanayaṇillaṁ |
sundara! tuha sarisāṇaṁ uttamapurisāṇa jujjaï na kāuṁ |
annaṁ ca | kō si tumaṁ kassa kaō kēṇa va kajjēṇa ēyamāyariyaṁ?
dīhaṁ nīsasiūṇaṁ tattō ya maē tayā imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ |
kiṁ kahiyāē imāē vihalāē suyaṇu! vattāē? || 4 ||
kahiēṇa jēṇa labbhaï kōvi guṇō, tamiha sāhiuṁ juttaṁ |
annaha puṇa tusakhaṇḍaṇasarisēṇaṁ kiṁ nu kahiēṇaṁ? || 5 ||
aviya | vōlīṇapāyakajjē sāhārō kōvi natthi kahiēṇa |
gayapāṇiyammi pālīi bandhaṇaṁ kaṁ guṇaṁ lahaü? || 6 ||
kīsa kayaṁ maha vigdhaṁ pāṇaccāyaṁ karēntassa? || 7 ||
tā mā kāhisi iṇhimpi majjha vigghanti, tāhi sō bhaṇaï |
mā bhadda! kuṇasu ēvaṁ sāhasu maha kāraṇa tāva || 8 ||
vinnāyammi sarūvē jēṇa uvāōvi labbhaē kōvi |
tattō ya maē kahiyā nīsēsā puvvavattā sē || 9 ||
bhaṇiō juvaīē kaē na hu juttaṁ uttamanarāṇa || 10 ||
kiñca | dhannō si tumaṁ jassatthi tāva annōnnavayaṇasañcārō |
taha dēvayāē vayaṇaṁ āsāē nibandhaṇaṁ atthi || 12 ||
tā kīsa kuṇasi sōyaṁ, dhannō taṁ punnavantō ya || 13 ||
maha puṇa punnavihūṇassa kahavi taddaṁsaṇammi jā āsā |
tīēvi hu dāliddaṁ tahavi hu dhārēmi niyapāṇē || 14 ||
kittiyamittaṁ dukkhaṁ hontē vayaṇakkamammi tuha bhadda!? |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ sāhasu maha tāva niyayavuttantaṁ |
ṭhāṇampi nēya jāṇasi kaha ṇu tumaṁ niyadaïyāē? || 16 ||
kammi purē tuha vāsō kēṇava kajjēṇa āgaō ēttha? |
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ēgamaṇō bhō! nisāmēhi || 17 ||
uciyasamaē ya tēhiṁ pahañjaṇō nāma sē vihiyaṁ || 25 ||
dōnnivi tāiṁ kamasō pattāiṁ jōvvaṇaṁ paḍhamaṁ || 26 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ pahañjaṇēṇaṁ paḍhamaṁ tuha hōi kiñcijamavaccaṁ |
dhūyā vā taṇaō vā taṁ maha taṇayassa dāyavvaṁ || 28 ||
aviya | tujjha mahaṁ vā jaṁ hōjja kimpi iha paḍhamagaṁ tu ḍimbharuyaṁ |
tā bandhusundarīē tahatti bahu manniyaṁ tayaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
ēttō ya atthinayaraṁ vēyaḍ̣dhē uttarāē sẹ̄dhīē |
tattha ya khayaranarīsō bhāṇugaï nāma atullasāmatthō |
tīi sutaṇūi samayaṁ aṇuhavamāṇō u garuyapīīē |
vaccantēsu diṇēsuṁ tīē dēvīē dāriyā jāyā |
tayaṇantaraṁ ca dēvī sundarasuviṇēhiṁ sūiya taṇayaṁ |
sūyā suhatihirikkhē cittagaï nāma sē vihiyaṁ || 36 ||
aha taṁ bhāuyavayaṇaṁ sāhaï daïyassa bhāṇugaïṇō sā |
tattō ya bhāṇugaïṇā niyadhūyā cittalēhā sā || 44 ||
suranandaṇammi nayarē nīyā aha tīē nēhasahiyāē |
saha visaē bhuñjantō ciṭṭhaï dēvōvva diyalōē || 46 ||
aha annayā kayāivi khayarāhivaī pahañjaṇō daṭṭhuṁ |
aha cintiuṁ payattō maṇōharō handi! ēsa āgārō |
ēyāgiīē tā haṁ kārēmi jiṇālayaṁ rammaṁ || 48 ||
maṇikuṭṭimammi tattō ālihiuṁ ujjaō jayā rāyā |
tāva ya jhatti vilīṇō pavaṇahaō jalaharō savvō || 49 ||
daṭhṭhūṇaṁ taṁ vilīṇaṁ khaṇēṇa rāyā vicintaē ēvaṁ |
jaha ēsō abbhalavō khaṇēṇa diṭṭhō puṇō paṇaṭṭhotti |
rūvaṁ ca jīviyaṁ jōvvaṇaṁ ca savvēvi bandhusambandhā |
paccakkhaṁ hi aṇiccaṁ nāūṇavi jaṁ thiraṁva mannanti |
tā sāvajjaṁ vajjiya pavvajjāujjamaṁ karēmi lahuṁ |
annaṁ ca majjha vaṁsē rajjaṁ dāūṇa niyayaputtāṇa |
ētthantarē sughōsō caünāṇī cāraṇō muṇī tattha |
rāyā pahañjaṇō aha suyassa jalaṇappahassa aha rajjaṁ |
tattō ahiṭṭhiyaṁ taṁ rajjaṁ savvampi uggatēēṇa |
bhō cittavēga! tassa u vōlīṇā vāsarā kaïvi || 70 ||
aha annayā kayāivi jalaṇapahō sālaēṇa sañjuttō |
pattō sakōugēṇaṁ samayaṁ ciya cittagaïṇā u || 75 ||
tassa ya ahē niviṭṭhō kañcaṇapaümammi muṇivarō diṭṭhō |
sō ēsō majjha piyā pahañjaṇō nāma muṇivarō ēvaṁ |
siṭṭhammi cittagaïṇō tattō tē dōvi harisēṇa || 79 ||
tīi parisāi bhayavaṁ pāraddhō dēsaṇaṁ kāuṁ || 81 ||
jīvāṇa jōvvaṇē ērisammi kō nāma paḍibandhō? || 84 ||
visayā kugaïnimittaṁ uvabhuttā tucchagā tahā tēvi |
virasā saï avasāṇē tēsu taō kō va paḍibandhō? || 85 ||
iya saṁsārē sāraṁ jaṁ kira paḍihāsaē vivajjāsā |
tampi hu duhasayahēutti jāṇiuṁ kuṇaha jiṇadhammaṁ || 86 ||
jaṁ dulahā sāmaggī ēsā tubbhēhiṁ bhavasamuddammi |
pattā apattapuvvā tā mā taṁ nipphalaṁ nēha || 87 ||
hiṇḍantāṇaṁ tāṇaṁ na ya annaṁ jiṇamayaṁ mōttuṁ || 88 ||
tamhā jiṇēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ dikkhaṁ ghēttūṇa sañjamaṁ kāuṁ |
ujjhiya tō saṁsāra pāvaha siddhīē pavarasuhaṁ || 89 ||
ēvaṁ muṇiṇā dhammammi sāhiē kēvi tattha pavvaïyā |
jāyā uvāsayā taha annē sammaṁ pavannatti || 90 ||
bhayavaṁ! puṇaravi rajjaṁ kiṁ taṁ maha hōjja nō ahavā? || 91 ||
aha kēvaliṇā bhaṇiyaṁ hōhī, taṁ kaïya, pucchiyamaṇēṇa |
ēvaṁ muṇiṇā bhaṇiē pahasiyavayaṇēhiṁ vandiō bhayavaṁ |
tattō tē dōvi jaṇā samāgayā jhatti niyayanayarammi |
cittagaïṇā ya kahiyaṁ kēvalivayaṇaṁ tu niyapiuṇō || 95 ||
tattō ya bhāṇugaïṇā sōhaṇarikkhammi rōhiṇī vijjā |
bhaṇiyā ya puvvasēvaṁ karajāvavihāṇaō kuṇaha sammaṁ |
vasimammi ṭhiyā samayaṁ chammāsaṁ jāva tō pacchā || 97 ||
annaṁ ca bhīsaṇāsuvi vibhīsiyāsuṁ maṇaṁ na dāyavvaṁ |
punnē sattamamāsē dēssaï aha daṁsaṇaṁ vijjā || 99 ||
ēvaṁ rannā bhaṇiyā dōnnivi paṇamittu tassa payakamalaṁ |
pāraddhā taṁ kāuṁ chammāsā jāva punnatti || 100 ||
aha sattammi māsē gantuṁ aḍavīē tavvihī savvō |
sōvi hu aṇannacittō pāraddhō taṁ vihiṁ kāuṁ || 102 ||
diṭṭhā u cittalēhā bhayabhīyā tammi ṭhāṇammi || 103 ||
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ niyabhagiṇiṁ cittagaī bhaṇaï kattha taṁ bhaddē! |
kassa va bhaēṇa gāḍhaṁ kampasi taṁ bhagiṇi! tāhi sā bhaṇaï |
pattā ujjāṇammī tattha maē pūiō kusumabāṇō |
mōttūṇaṁ pariyaṇaṁ taṁ palāyamāṇī samāgayā ēttha |
aḍavīē tāva maē diṭṭhō kaṇagappahō sahasā || 107 ||
pāvēṇa tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ iccha mamaṁ tāhi gāḍhakuddhāē |
akkōsiō sa bahuhā niṭṭhuravayaṇēhiṁ mē tāhē || 108 ||
uggīriūṇa khaggaṁ bhaṇiyā haṁ tēṇa icchasu mamanti |
aha navi, tō tē sīsaṁ chindāmi imēṇa khaggēṇa || 109 ||
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bhaṇiyā palāyamāṇī bhaēṇa kampantī |
pattā tumha samīvē rakkha mamaṁ tāō pāvāō || 110 ||
ēvaṁ bhaṇamāṇiṁ taṁ sahasā āgamma giṇhiuṁ hatthē |
hā! rakkha rakkha bhāuya! hā vallaha! kuṇasu maha parittattiṁ |
purisō bhava ēsa tuhaṁ sīsacchēyaṁ karēmitti || 113 ||
aha taṁ vimōhayantō kaṇagapahō āgaō niyanayarē |
aha sō mōhiyacittō cittagaī tattha vāhirujjāṇē |
daṭṭhūṇa ya cittagaïṁ paṇamiya nēūṇa tāhi ēgantē |
uppaïō tāva tumaṁ, jalaṇapahō picchiumpi taṁ savvaṁ |
aha sā rōhiṇivijjā paccakkhā jhatti sañjāyā || 123 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ tīē puttaya! aṇannasarisaṁ hi suṭṭhu dhīrattaṁ |
tā siddhā tujjha ahaṁ bhaṇasu ya jaṁ majjha kāyavvaṁ? || 124 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ jalappahēṇaṁ avahariyā majjha bhāriyā jā sā |
kaṇagappahēṇaṁ, taṁ tāva sigghamāṇēha maha pāsaṁ || 125 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ vijjāi taō suṇasu imaṁ tāva vaïyaraṁ putta! |
pannattīē kahiō tattō sō āgaō tuha samīvē |
khōhaṇahēuṁ savvaṁ māyāē kayaṁ imaṁ tēṇa || 127 ||
tuha mahilā niyagēhē acchaï niruvaddavā suhēṇaṁ tu |
tā mā kāhisi kiñcivi ētthatthē putta! uvvēvaṁ || 129 ||
ēvaṁ bhaṇiuṁ vijjā adaṁsaṇaṁ jhatti uvagayā tāhē |
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bhaṇiō damaghōsēṇaṁ amūḍhacittō sō |
cittagaī sañjāō caliō saha tēṇa niyaṭhāṇaṁ || 131 ||
aviya | kōvi hu sibiyārụ̄dhō ārụ̄dhō rahavarēsu cittēsu |
daṭṭhuṁ naṭṭhō lōō disō disiṁ maraṇabhayabhīō || 136 ||
kōūhalēṇa gayaṇē pariṭṭhiō pulōiüṁ payattō sō |
bhūmitalaluliyadēhā aha diṭṭhā tēṇa sā kariṇā || 144 ||
tattō ujjhiyahatthō tīi vahaṭṭhāi karivarō caliō |
taṁ daṭṭhu pariyarēṇa garuō hāhāravō vihiō || 145 ||
daṭṭhumpi samāsannaṁ nāgaṁ, gantuṁ acāyamāṇiṁ tu |
hā! hā! kāmanihāṇaṁ mahilārayaṇaṁ viṇassaï laggaṁ |
ōyariūṇaṁ gayaṇāu tāhi aṅkammi sā gahiā || 149 ||
ghittūṇa sayaṁ sahasā ṭhāṇē niruvaddavammi nēūṇa |
cittagaīvi ya tīē daṭhṭhūṇa aṇōvamaṁ tayaṁ rūvaṁ |
tāva ya tīē dhāī kaïvayajuvaīhiṁ parigayā jhatti |
tā nikkāraṇavacchala! tujjha pabhāvāō jīviyā ēsā |
ēmāi bahuvigappaṁ abhinandiya sā puṇō bhaṇaï || 156 ||
gacchāmi amha gēhaṁ ussūraṁ vaṭṭaē jaō iṇhiṁ |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca cittagaïṇā ēvaṁ kuṇahatti tattō ya || 157 ||
niyayakarasaṇṭhiyaṁ puṇa samappiyaṁ tassa tāṇa pacchannaṁ |
aha sā sahiyaṇasahiyā kamēṇa niyapuravaraṁ paviṭṭhatti |
tā gammaü niyaṭhāṇē kumāra! kimiṇā vilambēṇa? || 163 ||
maha hatthāō paḍiyaṁ muddārayaṇaṁ tu ēttha katthavi ya |
taṁ puṇa gacchasu sigdhaṁ kahējja jalaṇappahassa vuttantaṁ |
paccakkhammivi diṭṭhē kumāra! kiṁ ēttha vaṅkabhaṇiēēhiṁ? |
kiṁ navi diṭṭhā kannā tuha hatthā taṁ pagiṇhantī || 167 ||
tā kavaḍaṁ mōttūṇaṁ jahaṭṭhiyaṁ cēva sāhiuṁ juttaṁ |
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bhaṇiō cittagaī vihasiūṇa vajjaraï |
sammaṁ viyāṇiyaṁ tē maṇōgayaṁ majjha damaghōsa! || 169 ||
aha sō kayappaṇāmō uppaïō pāviō niyaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ |
aha cintiuṁ payattō kiṁ mannē tīi majjha hatthāō |
kaṇa ṇu maē nāyavvaṁ tīē kulaṁ kahava sā varēyavvā |
jaï sā havijja mahilā havijja tō jīviyaṁ sahalaṁ || 173 ||
sō ya kayatthō purisō laggijjā jassa karayalē bālā |
dhannō hamittiēṇaṁ gahiyā aṅkammi sā maē sutaṇū |
avagūhiyā ya gāḍhaṁ jaṁ na maē vañciō taṁ tu || 176 ||
puṇaravi havijja jattā hatthibhaē bhūminivaḍiyā taha sā |
ghittūṇa jēṇa sahasā avayāsējjā tayaṁ gāḍhaṁ || 177 ||
niddāē samaṁ rāī khayaṁ gayā, uggaō sūrō || 178 ||
aha sō pahāyasamaē vihiṇā vandittu jiṇavaraṁ paḍhamaṁ |
pattō ya puraṁ picchaï jaṇarahiyaṁ sunnasayaladhavalaharaṁ |
aha picchiūṇa taṁ sō vimhiyahiyaō maṇēṇa cintēi |
kattō hanta! akaṇḍē puramēyaṁ uvvasaṁ jāyaṁ? || 181 ||
kiṁ hōjja indayālaṁ ahavā saccaṁ hi uvvasaṁ ēyaṁ |
ahavā bhayāō kassavi naṭṭhō lōgō imāō nayarāō |
tāvaya samuhamintō ēgō purisō pulōiō tēṇa |
bhaddamuha! kiṁnimittaṁ uvvasiyaṁ puravaraṁ imaṁ sahasā |
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sāhijjantaṁ nisāmēhi || 185 ||
nīsāriō ya bhāyā jiṭṭhō sasurassa sō gaō nayarē |
ēsōvi imammi purē acchaï rajjaṁ aṇuhavantō || 188 ||
sasurēṇa bhāṇugaïṇā kila vijjā rōhiṇī u sē dinnā |
sō sāhiuṁ payattō siṭṭhaṁ ca imassa vijjāē || 189 ||
tattō tavvigghaṭṭhā rāyā kaṇagappahō gaō tattha |
na ya khōbhiō sa tēṇaṁ maṇēṇa bhīō taō ēsō || 190 ||
puvvaṁ dharaṇindēṇaṁ ēsō samaō kaō nahayarāṇa |
tassa khayarāhamassa ō vijjācchēō bhavissaī sahasā |
tattō imassa rannō jinabhavaṇaṁ laṅghiyanti ruṭṭhēṇa |
nāūṇa vaïyaramiṇaṁ khuhiō savvōvi nāyarō lōgō |
amhāṇa pahū naṭṭhō na ya sakkaï vāsiuṁ puraṁ ēyaṁ |
tēṇa viṇā tā amhaṁ na juttamiha acchiuṁ iṇhiṁ || 198 ||
kō kuṇaï amha rakkhaṁ ēttha vasantāṇa nāharahiyāṇa |
savvēsiṁ tēṇa uciyaṁ puramēyaṁ ujjhiuṁ sigghaṁ || 199 ||
savvōvi jaṇō naṭṭhō jāyaṁ aha sunnayaṁ nayaraṁ || 200 ||
āsajja kāraṇamiṇaṁ uvvasiyaṁ tēṇa puravaraṁ ēyaṁ |
cittagaī bhaṇaï taō kattha gaō sō jaṇa bhadda!? || 201 ||
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kōvi jaṇō gayaṇavallahē nayarē |
kōvi gaō vijayapurē kōvi hu iha vējayantammi || 202 ||
sattuñjayammi kōvi hu ariñjaē kōvi taha gaō lōō |
rahanēurammi kōvi hu āṇandapurammi arijaē kōvi |
sagaḍāmuhammi kōvi hu purīē taha vējayantīē || 204 ||
kōvi hu rayaṇapurammi sirinayarē rayaṇasañcayaṁ kōvi |
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa narō vihiyapaṇāmō sa gantumāraddhō |
cittagaīvi ya tāhē sōccā tavvayaṇaṁ sahasā || 207 ||
pahaüvva mōggarēṇaṁ giliō iva rakkhasēṇa khuhiēṇa |
vajjēṇa tāḍiō iva dukkhaṁ aïdūsahaṁ pattō || 208 ||
aha cintiuṁ payattō daṭṭhavvā kattha sā maē bālā |
tā kiṁ karēmi iṇhiṁ hayavihiṇā vihaḍiyammi ēyammi |
labbhijja kaha paüttī kahavā maha daṁsaṇaṁ hōjjā? || 212 ||
kō pucchijjaü nāmaṁ kō maha sāhijja kulaharaṁ tīē? |
jattha gayā mama daïyā akkhijjā puravaraṁ kō taṁ? || 213 ||
kahava tuḍijōgaō sā diṭṭhā amhēhiṁ hayavihiniōgā |
iṇhiṁ puṇa daṭṭhavvā kō jāṇaï katthava navatti? || 214 ||
suigōyaraṁ gayāiṁ na majjha hā! kattha vaccāmi? || 215 ||
hā! hiyaya! kāsa jhūrasi nibbandhaṁ muñca tammi lōyammi |
ajjavi kā tuha āsā ṭhāṇampi ayāṇamāṇassa || 216 ||
aviya | jaï ḍajjhasi tā ḍajjhasu kuṭṭasi hē hiyaya! na hu nivārēmi |
daïyāē jaṁ paüttīvi dullahā sampayaṁ jāyā || 217 ||
jēṇa uvāyapayaṭṭā purisā pāvinti icchiyaṁ atthaṁ |
summaï lōyammi jaō labbhaï suviṇaṁ suyantēhiṁ || 219 ||
ēsō ya iha uvāō bhamāmi savvēsu khayaranayarēsu |
mā kahaya kōvi katthavi tīē paüttimpi sāhijjā || 220 ||
dāsijja ahava sakkhā paribbhamantēhi kammivi purammi |
candamuhī sā bālā, tahā ya aïsundaraṁ cēva || 221 ||
ēvaṁ viṇicchiyatthō sō haṁ bhō cittavēga! cittagaī |
savvēsuvi paribhamiō na ya laddhā tīē katthavi paüttī |
tattō ya dakkhiṇāē sēṇīē āgaō ahayaṁ || 224 ||
tatthavi purēsu kēsuvi āhiṇḍiya icchiyaṁ apāvintō |
ajja puṇō iha pattō tuha nayaraṁ kuñjarāvattē || 225 ||
ēyammi ya ujjāṇē maha pavissantassa sōhaṇō saüṇō |
sañjāō taha phuriyā dāhiṇabāhū tahā nayaṇaṁ || 226 ||
tattō viyappiyaṁ mē avassamajjēva hōhiī tīē |
daïyāē daṁsaṇaṁ, ahava kiñci aïsōhaṇaṁ annaṁ || 227 ||
ēvaṁ vicintayantō pattō haṁ ēttha kayaligēhammi |
tāva ya khaṇantarāō samāgayā suyaṇu! majjha niddatti |
sōūṇa tujjha saddaṁ jhatti pabuddhō ahaṁ tattō || 229 ||
kēṇa imaṁ ullaviyanti cintiuṁ jā disāō pulaēmi |
tāva ya tumaṁ hi diṭṭhō palambamāṇō tarulayāē || 230 ||
hā! hā! aṇaṅgarūvō kaha ṇu juvāṇō viṇassaē laggō? |
pattō tujjha samīvē chinnō aha pāsaō maē sahasā |
bhō cittavēga! sēsaṁ paccakkhaṁ cēva tuha savvaṁ || 232 ||
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ kaha ṇu tumaṁ bhadda! niyayadaïyāē |
ṭhāṇampi nēya jāṇasi taṁ savvaṁ sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ || 233 ||
mahilāmittassa kaē na hu maraṇaṁ hōi kāyavvaṁ || 234 ||
bhō cittavēga! jaïvi hu piyavirahē dūsahaṁ havaï dukkhaṁ |
tahavi hu na hōi juttō appavahō kintu kōvi hu uvāō |
bhō suppaïṭṭha! ēvaṁ vajjariē tēṇa cittagaïṇā ō |
dīhaṁ nīsasiūṇaṁ ēvaṁ hi maē samullaviyaṁ || 238 ||
vōlīṇā tīi kahā na hu iṇhiṁ atthi kōvi uvāō |
ajjēva ya rayaṇīē jaṁ hōhī tīi vivāhō || 239 ||
cittagaī bhaṇaï taō ēkkōvi ya tīē pāvaṇōvāō |
maha phuraï māṇasammī jaï tuha paḍihāsaē suyaṇu! || 240 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca maē kō sō tattō sō bhaṇaï bhadda! nisuṇēsu |
niyakulakamāgayaṁ aha pariṇijjaï sā taō pacchā || 242 ||
amhē puṇa dōvi jaṇā puvvaṁ ciya ittha pavisāmō || 243 ||
aha tīē āgayāē nēvatthaṁ tīē santayaṁ ahayaṁ |
ghitūṇa kaṇagamālaṁ taṁ puṇa nāsijja takkhaṇā cēva |
ēvaṁ hi kaē tīē sampattī atthi, nannahā bhadda! |
taha dēvayāē vayaṇaṁ hōjjā ēvaṁ ca saccanti || 246 ||
kiñca | purisēṇa purisayārō kāyavvō tāva icchiyatthammi |
vihiṇō niōgaō puṇa havaï hu kajjassa nipphattī || 247 ||
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa kahiē uciē uvāē āgāmiyaṁ garuyadukkhamacintiūṇa |
bhō suppaïṭṭha! vayaṇaṁ paḍivannayaṁ sē tivvāṇurāgaparimōhiyamāṇasēṇa || 248 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca cittagaïṇā annāyā ēva ēttha pavisāmō |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ hōutti uṭṭhiyā dōvi |
pavisiya mayaṇassa gihē pūiya mayaṇaṁ ca ēvamullaviyaṁ |
bhayavaṁ! tuha ppasāyā sampajjaō icchiyaṁ amha || 4 ||
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa taō dōvi nilukkā aṇaṅgapaṭṭhīē |
pattā ō kaṇagamālā dārē aha kāmagēhassa || 8 ||
sampūiūṇa kāmaṁ aha sā nivaḍēvi tassa calaṇēsu |
nijjiyasuramaṇuōvi hu paharasi itthīṇa kiṁ bhayavaṁ!? || 12 ||
jaï majjha tammi lōē bhayavaṁ! garuō kaō hu aṇurāō |
tā kīsa taṁ pamōttuṁ ghaḍasi mamaṁ annalōēṇaṁ? || 13 ||
annaṁ ca | summanti ittha lōē pañcēva silīmuhā ō kila tujjha |
navaraṁ mamaṁ paḍuccā sahassabāṇōvva taṁ jāō || 14 ||
jaï jāva majjha paharasi paharasu kō taṁ nivārēi bhayavaṁ! |
navaraṁ taha maha paharasu kayantabhavaṇē jaha vayāmi || 15 ||
tumaē puṇa taha pahayā jaha na mayā nēya jīviyā ahayaṁ |
tā kiṁ bhaṇāmi iṇhiṁ saraṇammi samāgayā tujjha? || 16 ||
daḍḍhassa huyavahēṇaṁ sō cēva jahōsahaṁ tu lōyassa |
tumaē pīḍiyadēhā taha saraṇaṁ tujjha allīṇā || 17 ||
jaï majjha tumaṁ tuṭṭhō dēhi varaṁ patthiō maē ēyaṁ |
tāva imō maha jammō piyajaṇaāsāē vōliō ahalō |
taṁ ciya daïyaṁ dijjasu bhayavaṁ! maha annajammēvi || 19 ||
bhō suppaïṭṭha! ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇaṁ tāhi kaṇagamālāē |
baddhō niuttarīēṇa pāsaō tāhi sā puṇō bhaṇaï |
ēsā marāmi sampaï kusumāuha! tujjha puraō haṁ || 22 ||
mā maha bhaṇijja kōvi hu vihiyamajuttanti kaṇagamālāē |
iṇhiṁ puṇa na hu sakkā kāuṁ bhaṅgaṁ tu niyapaïnnāē |
taṁ mōttuṁ hiyayadaïyaṁ na laggaē maha karē annō || 24 ||
annaṁ ca dēvayāō! aliyaṁ jampanti nēya kaïyāvi |
tampi hu annaha jāyaṁ majjha aünnēhiṁ pāvāē || 25 ||
ahava kavaḍēṇa kēṇavi pisāyarūvēṇa vañciyā taïyā |
tā sampayaṁmi mā hōjja majjha abhivañchiyatthavāghāō |
bhayavaṁ! tuha ppasāyā sijjhaü maraṇaṁ avigghēṇa || 27 ||
maraṇaṁ hōjja na hōjja va ajjavi āsaṅkaē hiyayaṁ? || 28 ||
taṁ jaï havijja iṇhiṁ sukayatthā hōjja tā ahayaṁ || 29 ||
ēvaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ tīē mukkō appā ahōmuhō jhatti |
turiyaṁ gantūṇa maē chinnō aha pāsaō tīē || 30 ||
gahiūṇa tayaṁ aṅkē tāhē saṇiyaṁ maē imaṁ bhaṇiyā |
ēyammi cēva jammē uvaṇīō sō jaṇō ēsō || 32 ||
kijjaü kaṇṭhaggahaṇaṁ gāḍhaṁ ukkaṇṭhiō jaṇō tujjha |
ēvaṁ bhaṇiyā bālā lajjāē ahōmuhī jāyā || 33 ||
cittagaīvi ya tāhē samāgaō tammi cēva ṭhāṇammi |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ varamittō ēsa maha suyaṇu! || 34 ||
tujjha viōē sundari! appavahē ujjaō ahamimēṇa |
tuha pāvaṇē uvāō ēsō maha sāhiō imēṇēva |
kāūṇa tujjha rūvaṁ jēṇa imō suyaṇu! vaccaē bāhiṁ |
ēvaṁ ca maē bhaṇiyā saharisahiyayā karēi taṁ savvaṁ |
aha dōvi nilukkāiṁ puṇaravi mayaṇassa paṭṭhīē || 39 ||
cittagaīvi ya tīē nīsēsaṁ nivisiūṇa nēvatthaṁ |
aha tammi gaï lōē nīsaddaṁ jāṇiūṇa taṁ bhavaṇaṁ |
bhaṇiyā ya maē ēsā sundari! kiṁ iṇhi kāyavvaṁ? || 41 ||
kuṇasu sayaṁ jaṁ juttaṁ saraṇammi samāgayā tujjha || 43 ||
ēvaṁ tīē bhaṇiē gandhavvavihīē sā maē bālā |
pariṇīyā taṁ mayaṇaṁ dēvaṁ kāūṇa sakkhiṇayaṁ || 44 ||
niddāvigamē ya maē vajjariyaṁ suyaṇu! vaccimō iṇhiṁ |
ērisamāyariūṇaṁ na hu juttaṁ acchiuṁ ēttha || 46 ||
dīhaṁ nīsasiēṇaṁ aha bhaṇiyaṁ tīī hiyayadaïyāē |
hā ajjaütta! juttaṁ kamapattaṁ āsi maha maraṇaṁ || 47 ||
majjha nimittē pāvisi sāmiya! jaṁ garuyaāvaïṁ iṇhiṁ |
nāsantāṇavi amhaṁ na nāha! saraṇaṁ tu vijjaē kiñci |
tā tuha vaïriṇirūvā jāyā paramatthaō ahayaṁ || 49 ||
tuhavirahatāviyāē na āsi maha sāmi! tārisaṁ dukkhaṁ |
jaṁ tuha nāha! vivattiṁ sambhāviya iṇhi sañjāyaṁ || 50 ||
laddhōvi nāha! kahavi hu majjha aünnāē hōsi na hu iṇhiṁ |
punnarahiyāṇa ahavā pattampi hu vihaḍaē sahasā || 51 ||
bhō suppaïṭṭha! ēvaṁ bhaṇiuṁ avalambiūṇa maha kaṇṭhē |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ sundari! kiṁ sōyamasarisaṁ vahasi? |
laddhaṁ jaṁ lahiavvaṁ iṇhiṁ jaṁ hōu taṁ hōu || 53 ||
tuha saṅgamarahiyāṇaṁ maraṇaṁ jaï hōjja, hōjja tā dukkhaṁ |
iṇhiṁ puṇamha sundari! maraṇēvi hu natthi dukkhanti || 54 ||
kiñca | ēsō acintiōvi hu jaha jāō saṅgamō saha tumāē |
taha cēva mā kayāvi hu annampi hu sōhaṇaṁ hōjjā || 55 ||
kīraü tāva uvāō ahalō jaï hōi hōu, kō dōsō? |
nahavāhaṇakhayaraṁ taṁ daṭṭūṇa maē imaṁ kayaṁ suyaṇu! |
bhaviyavvayāē diṭṭhaṁ hōjjā jaṁ kiñcimaha uciyaṁ || 57 ||
abbhuvagayaṁ hi maraṇaṁ nāsijjaü tahavi tāō khayarāō |
jalacavvaṇujjayāṇaṁ mā kahavi hu ēi gulaōvi || 58 ||
tā suyaṇu! muñca sōyaṁ vaccāmō rayaṇasañcaē tāva |
kālōciyaṁ ca pacchā diṭṭhaṁ diṭṭhaṁ karissāmō || 59 ||
tattō ya tīē samayaṁ nīhariō paṇamiūṇa raïnāhaṁ |
dūraṁ nāsiyatimirō aha sahasā uggaō sūrō || 61 ||
tattō ya tīē bhaṇiyaṁ sāmiya! gāḍhaṁ pivāsiyā ahayaṁ |
sūsaï galayaṁ ajjavi kēdūrē amha taṁ nayaraṁ? || 62 ||
dūrē ajjavi nayaraṁ sundari! ittha vaṇanikuñjammi |
ōyarimō jaṁ hōhī ittha jalaṁ ēva mē bhaṇiē || 63 ||
tattō dōvi jaṇāiṁ avaïnnāiṁ vaṇammi rammammi |
pāūṇa jalaṁ aha sā pattalataruchāhiyāē uvaviṭṭhā |
bhō suppaïṭṭha! ēvaṁ khaṇantaraṁ vīsamāmi jā tattha |
tāva ya nisuō saddō āsannē kēligēhammi || 66 ||
jāyā satthasarīrā sundari! vaccāmu iṇhiṁ niyaṭhāṇaṁ |
ēyaṁ saddaṁ sōuṁ ēsa vigappō mahuppannō || 67 ||
nūṇaṁ cittagaïssa ya ēsō saddō na hōi annassa |
ēyammi vaṇaniguñjē ahavā kō sambhavō tassa? || 68 ||
ahamavi tēṇaṁ, tattō uvaviṭṭhā dōvi tatthēva || 70 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyō nīhariēṇaṁ tu mayaṇagēhāō |
kiṁ mitta! tumē vihiyaṁ vimōhiō pariyaṇō kahavā? || 71 ||
kahava tumaṁ nicchuṭṭō kā vā ēsā maṇōharāgārā |
mahilā, kattha va pattā, sāhasu maha savvamēyanti? || 72 ||
cittagaī bhaṇaï taō nisuṇasu bhō cittavēga! ēgamaṇō |
ārụ̄dhō sibiyāē pattō ya kamēṇa varasamīvammi |
laggē samāgayammī gahiō maha karayalō saharisēṇa |
nahavāhaṇēṇa, tattō kamēṇa vattō ya vīvāhō || 75 ||
ētthantarammi ēgā juvaī āgamma karayalaṁ niyayaṁ |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ cintiyaṁ mē ēsā sā majjha santiyā muddā |
aïguruyaṁ aṅguṭṭhiṁ maṇayaṁ ōsāriuṁ maē tattō |
avalōiyā ya ēsā sahasā aha paccabhinnāyā || 79 ||
ēsā sā maha daïyā hatthibhaē jā vimōiyā taïyā |
pēccha aïdugghaḍampi hu sahasā kaha majjha daṁsaṇaṁ jāyaṁ? |
aṇukūlō ahava vihī kiṁvā taṁ jaṁ navi karēi? || 81 ||
ēvaṁ vicintiūṇaṁ nidaṁsiō niyakarō maē tīē |
kannē hōu tīē āsannasahīya sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ |
tā ēsā khaṇamēgaṁ asōgavaṇiyāi suvaï laggatti |
tumhē ēttha ṭhiyāō jahāsuhaṁ cēva acchāha || 84 ||
vattē puṇa pēkkhaṇaē jāṇāvijjāu amha sigghanti |
ēvaṁ bhaṇiuṁ tīē uṭṭhaviō cittavēga! ahaṁ || 85 ||
dinnammī āsaṇammī uvaviṭṭhō, sāvi maha puraō || 87 ||
aha sā sajjhasabhariyā jāhē na caēi kiñci vajjariuṁ |
tāhē niyayapaüttī savvāvi hu cittavēga! maē || 88 ||
puvvaṁ jā tuha kahiyā tīēvi hu sā maē samāsēṇa |
kahiyā ya jāva itthaṁ itthīrūvēṇa āyāō || 89 ||
sundari! tujjha viōgē gurudukkhaṁ māṇasaṁ maē pattaṁ |
tā lajjaṁ mōttūṇaṁ sāhasu kiṁ tujjha nāmadhēyanti |
kammi kulē tuha jammō kiṁvā nāmaṁ tu tē piuṇō? || 91 ||
kahavi purē iha pattā pabhūyalōyassa majjhayārammī |
itthīrūvōvi ahaṁ vinnāō suyaṇu! kaha tumaē? || 92 ||
ēvaṁ ca maē bhaṇiyā kahavi hu ujjhittu sajjhasaṁ bālā |
āyannasu maṇavallaha! kahēmi savvampi jaṁ tumē puṭṭhaṁ |
tumha supasiddhamēva hi nayaraṁ suranandaṇaṁ tāva || 94 ||
tassa ya pavarō mantī aïkusalō nīisatthēsu || 95 ||
pahuṇō ya daḍhaṁ bhattō buddhīē caüvvihāē sampannō |
tassa ya ghariṇī pavarā païvvayā rūvasaṁvayākaliyā |
jaṇayāṇa kayāṇandō kamasō sō jōvvaṇaṁ pattō || 99 ||
ēttō ya dakkhiṇāē imīē sẹ̄dhīē kuñjarāvattē |
ēyammi cēva nayarē candagaī āsi varakhayarō || 100 ||
tassa ya maṇavallahiyā mahilā nāmēṇa mayaṇarēhatti |
kālēṇa tāṇa puttō amiyagaī nāma sañjāō || 101 ||
aha sā campagamālā variyā suranandaṇammi nayarammi |
nīyā niyaē nayarē saha tīē sō visālanayaṇāē |
aha annayā kayāivi mantipayaṁ dēvi asaṇivēgassa |
aha campagamālāē kamēṇa puttā ō pañca uppannā |
tāṇaṁ piyayama! nisuṇasu kamēṇa ēyāiṁ nāmāiṁ || 108 ||
vajjagaī vāugaī candō taha candaṇō susīhō ya |
pañcaṇhaṁ puttāṇaṁ uvariṁ dhūyā ahaṁ jāyā || 109 ||
vattē ya bārasāhē nāmaṁ tu piyaṅgumañjarī majjha |
gahiyāō kamēṇa taō pattā haṁ jōvvaṇaṁ paḍhamaṁ || 113 ||
tattha ya piyayama! ahayaṁ sahāvaō purisavēsiṇī jāyā |
varayā ya majjha bahavē inti tahiṁ khayarapavarāṇa || 115 ||
na ya katthavi maha īcchā jāyaï tō tē nivārēi || 116 ||
jō jō āvaï varaō taṁ taṁ nēcchāmi jāvaya ahaṁ tu |
tāhē ya asaṇivēgō majjha piyā sōyamāvannō || 117 ||
jaṭṭhūṇaṁ taṁ sasōgaṁ campagamālā u bhaṇaï niyadaïyaṁ |
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ maha dhūyā tāva jōvvaṇaṁ pattā |
na ya icchaï kimpi varaṁ sundari! garuī imā cintā || 119 ||
taṁ kimpi kuṇaï kajjaṁ lahaï kulaṁ maïlaṇaṁ jēṇa || 120 ||
kō hōjja varō dhūyāē handi! maṇaïcchiutti cintāē |
sudaṁri! na ēi niddā rayaṇīēvi maha pasuttassa || 121 ||
ēyaṁ nisamma vayaṇaṁ campagamālāvi tāhi mē jaṇaṇī |
majjha nimittē sundara! jāyā sōgāurā dhaṇiyaṁ || 122 ||
bhaṇaï ya kimajja piyasahi! hiyavva vikkiyavva vunnavva |
ciraāgayāvi piyasahi! kīsa na sambhāsiyā ahaṁ tumaē? |
tā bhaṇasu sōgakāraṇamēyaṁ jaṁ tujjha sañjāyaṁ? || 125 ||
ēvaṁ ca piyasahīē bhaṇiyāē maē tayā samullaviyaṁ |
tujjhēhiṁ samaṁ piyasahi! kīlittā tā viyālasamayammi |
ēvaṁvihā ya dēvā dēvīō kattha diṭṭhāō || 131 ||
ēvaṁ viñcintayantī piyasahi! mucchāvasaṁ ahaṁ pattā |
jaha taṁ nisuṇasu dhāriṇi! savvampi hu vajjarijjantaṁ || 133 ||
tammi ya majjhimakhaṇḍē āriyakhittammi āsi varanayaraṁ |
haridattō nāmēṇaṁ ibmō parivasaï aha tattha || 138 ||
pañcapayārē visaē tīē samaṁ tasya aṇuhavantassa |
tatō viṇayavaīē kamēṇa dhūyāō tinni jāyāō |
jēṭṭhā sulōyaṇatti ya bīyā kannā aṇaṅgavaīnāmā |
sāvi hu vasumaïkannā nayarīē mēhalāvaīē ō |
aha sō dhaṇavaïvaṇiō kalāsu kusalō aṇaṅgapaḍirūvō |
samayaṁ tu vasumaīē bhuñjaï māṇussaē bhōē || 147 ||
aha annayā kayāivi pavarē hammiyatalammi pāsuttō |
niddākhaē vibuddhā muddhā sā vasumaī varaī || 151 ||
sā pavaṇahayā taṇutarulayavva aha kampiyā sahasā || 152 ||
cintaï sā miyanayaṇā kattha gaō majjha niyayanāhō sō |
dukkhapavēsammi gihē ēsō purisō kaha paviṭṭhō? || 153 ||
kiṁvā sō maṇadaïō havijja nihaō imēṇa pāvēṇa |
sōcciya daïō annō paḍihāsaï kiṁ vivajjāsā? || 154 ||
ahavā na hōi ēsō maha daïō tāva nicchaō ēsa |
ēsa aüvvō kōvi hu dīsaï divvāṇukāritti || 155 ||
taha suvaï suvīsatthō pavisittā paragihammi jaṁ ēsō |
taṁ nūṇaṁ bhaviyavvaṁ kēṇāvi hu kāraṇēṇittha || 156 ||
jaï ēsa annapurisō daïō vā tahavi iṇhi maha juttaṁ |
jaï puṇa ēyaṁ na kahēmi kahavi niyasāsuyāē vuttantaṁ |
ājammampi kalakaṁ sudūsahaṁ hōi tā majjha || 158 ||
ēvaṁ vicintiūṇaṁ uttariyā hammiyāō sā bālā |
sā saṇiyaṁ uṭṭhaviyā bhaṇaï kimāgamaṇakāraṇaṁ suṇhē! |
tattō ya vasumaīē jahaṭṭhiyaṁ sāhiyaṁ savvaṁ || 160 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ sudaṁsaṇāē na sambhavō atthi ittha annassa |
niddāvasaō hōjjā tuha jāō vibbhamō ēsō || 161 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca vasumaīē amba! sayaṁ cēva tā nirūvēsu |
ēvaṁ tīē bhaṇiyā sudaṁsaṇā lahuṁ gayā tattha || 162 ||
sammaṁ nirūviō sō niddāē pasuttaō tahiṁ purisō |
nāyaṁ sudaṁsaṇāē jaha ēsa na hōi maha puttō || 163 ||
dhāvaha dhāvaha lōyā! ēsa aüvvō narō kōvi || 164 ||
amha gharammi paviṭṭhō jārō cōrōvva nūṇa hōūṇa |
rē! lēha lēha dhāvaha kattha gaō kattha acchaï nilukkō |
miliō ya bhūrilōgō kiṁ kiṁ ēyanti ēva jampantō |
siṭṭhī samuddadattō bhaṇaï piē! kēṇa musiyā si? || 167 ||
sōvi hu sayaṇīyāō samuṭṭhiō kalayalaṁ nisāmittaṁ |
vajjaraï kēṇa ambē! musiyā, jaṁ ēvamullavasi? || 168 ||
na hu ittha kōvi dīsaï duṭṭhamaī kīsa ambi! uvviggā? |
ēvaṁ tu tēṇa bhaṇiyā sudaṁsaṇā ēvamullavaï || 169 ||
kō si tumaṁ kassa suō kīsa gihaṁ majjha āgaō pāva!? |
hā! dhiṭṭha! kiṁnimittaṁ ambitti mamaṁ samullavasi? || 170 ||
kīsa maha puttasējjāē ittha suttōsi naṭṭhamajjāya! |
kattha kaō mē puttō dhaṇavaïnāmō hayāsa! tumē? || 171 ||
ēvaṁ ca tīi niṭṭhuravayaṇāṇi nisamma vimhiō cittē |
sō purisō niyadēhaṁ puṇō puṇō aha pulōēi || 172 ||
ālōiūṇa suiraṁ niyadēhaṁ jāva sāmalamuhō sō |
buḍa buḍa iya avvattaṁ jāvaṁ dintōvva pavaravijjāē |
ullalaï ya puṇaruttaṁ daddura iva bhūmipaṭṭhammi || 174 ||
jāō khaṇēṇa dīṇō khayarakumārōvva naṭṭha varavijjō |
aha taṁ tārisarūvaṁ purisaṁ daṭṭhūṁ sudaṁsaṇā bhaṇaï |
pāviṭṭha! kiṁ na sāhasi kattha kaō maha suō tumaē? || 176 ||
sōvi ahōmuhavayaṇō hōūṇa ṭhiō na jampaī jāva |
annē bhaṇanti cōrō jaï tā sējjāē kiṁ suttō? || 178 ||
tā ēsa vasumaīē kaēṇa paradāriyāē āyāō |
annē bhaṇanti jārō jaï tā ambitti kiṁ bhaṇaï? || 179 ||
tā ēsa dhaṇavaïcciya vihiō kēṇāvi annaruvēṇa |
dēvēṇa dāṇavēṇa va kēlīē piēṇa mannāmō || 180 ||
annē bhaṇanti bhūō ēsa pisāuvva āgaō ēttha |
bhō bhō na ēvamēyaṁ bhaṇanti annē u kintu nisuṇēha |
ēmāi bahuvigappaṁ parōpparaṁ jā jaṇō samullavaï |
tāva ya piyasahi! dhāriṇi! nisuṇasu jaṁ tattha sañjāyaṁ || 183 ||
dēvēṇa tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ nisuṇaha ēyassa vaïyaraṁ bhaddā! |
ēsō hu pāvakārī sumaṅgalō nāma nahayarō āsi |
aha annayā kayāivi bhamamāṇō icchiēsu nayarēsu |
gayaṇaṭṭhiēṇa diṭṭhā imēṇa suiraṁ ca nijjāyā || 188 ||
daṭṭhuṁ imīē rūvaṁ khuhiyaṁ aha māṇasaṁ tu ēyassa |
vijjāharīhiṁ kiṁvā maha kajjaṁ kiṁva annajuvaīhiṁ |
ēvaṁ vicintiuṇaṁ avahariō dhaṇavaī imēṇaṁ tu |
sōvi hu dhaṇavaïvaṇiō viṇīyanayarīē pāviō varaō |
kā ēsā varanayarī kattha va sā mēhalāvaī nayarī |
kiṁ kēṇa va avahariō pēcchāmi va sumiṇayaṁ ēyaṁ? || 196 ||
ēvaṁ vicintayantō bāhiṁ nayarīē jāva paribhamaī |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ jāyatōsō kāūṇa payāhiṇaṁ tu tikkhuttō |
nāūṇa ya patthāvaṁ vihiyapaṇāmēṇa tēṇa saṁlattaṁ |
kēṇa ahaṁ avahariō bhavayaṁ! kiṁvā imaṁ khittaṁ? || 200 ||
kā vā ēsā nayarī ēvaṁ puṭṭhēṇa bhagavayā tassa |
dhaṇavaïṇō puvvuttaṁ savvampi hu sāhiyaṁ taïyā || 201 ||
mā bhadda! kuṇasu sōyaṁ ērisaō cēva ēsa saṁsārō |
paramatthaō ya dukkhaṁ jāyaï niyaduṭṭhakammuṇā jaṇiyaṁ |
havaï hu nimittamittaṁ sēsaṁ puṇa bajjhaatthammi || 205 ||
tā tēṇa nahayarēṇaṁ na majjhaparamatthaō kayaṁ dukkhaṁ |
tattō vilīṇakammō pāvihisi na ērisaṁ dukkhaṁ || 208 ||
iya kēvaliyā bhaṇiō paḍibuddhō dhaṇavaī imaṁ bhaṇaï |
icchāmō aṇusaṭṭhiṁ pavvajjaṁ dēha mē bhayavaṁ! || 209 ||
aha jāō sō samaṇō sāmannaguṇēhiṁ uvavēō || 210 ||
tēmāsiṁya ca kāūṇa aṇasaṇaṁ cattadēhō sō || 211 ||
sō haṁ bhō bhō bhaddā! samāgaō ēttha nayarīē || 213 ||
jāō ya majjha kōvō tavvasaō cintiyaṁ maē ēyaṁ |
mārēmi imaṁ pāvaṁ maha daïyāē saha pasuttaṁ || 215 ||
savvāō vijjāō jāō ya imō sabhāvatthō || 217 ||
tattō ya vasumaīē sahasā niddā maē khayaṁ nīyā |
ēīē vibuddhāē nāyaṁ jaha ēsa parapurisō || 218 ||
gantūṇa sāsuyāē siṭṭhā vattā imīi savvāvi |
tattō sudaṁsaṇāē daṭhṭhūṇa imaṁ kaō rōlō || 219 ||
paḍibuddhēṇa imēṇavi tēṇiha ambā sudaṁsaṇā bhaṇiyā |
daṭhṭhūṇa puvvarūvaṁ niyadēhaṁ vimhiō imō cittē |
maha vijjāē pabhāvō avahariō kēṇa ajjatti? || 221 ||
tahavi hu uppaïūṇaṁ jāhē na caēi tāhi vinnāyaṁ |
tēṇēva sabhāvatthō jāō na caēmi gayaṇamuppaïuṁ |
ēvaṁ piyasahi! dhāriṇi! sōuṁ tiyasassa bhāsiyaṁ tassa |
sēṭṭhī samuddadattō sudaṁsaṇā sāvi sē bhajjā || 225 ||
taha tēhiṁ tattha runnaṁ karuṇapalāvēhiṁ nēhabhariēhiṁ |
jaha sō samāgayajaṇō savvōvi hu rōviuṁ laggō || 227 ||
savvōvi hu saṁmiliō sabālavuḍ̣dhō jaṇō tattha || 228 ||
ēyassa paḍaü vijjū suttō mā ēsa bujjhaü pāvō |
hā! pāva! kiṁ na āsī khayarīō tuha sarūvajuttāō |
muddhāē vasumaīē jēṇa tumē khaṇḍiyaṁ sīlaṁ? || 231 ||
tā pāva! iṇhi pāvasu aṇajjakajjammi niraya! nillajja! |
ēyaṁ na hōi jōggaṁ nāmaṁ ēyassa duṭṭhacariyassa! |
pāvō amaṅgalō ēsa jēṇa ēyaṁ kayaṁ pāvaṁ || 233 ||
akkōsiō sa bahuhā sudīṇavayaṇō tahiṁ varaō || 234 ||
bhaddē! vasumaï! iṇhiṁ kō tuha hiyayassa ucchāhō? || 236 ||
jaṁ kiñci tuma sāmiya! āisasi tahiṁ samucchāhō || 237 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ surēṇa sundari! jaï ēvaṁ tā karēsu pavvajjaṁ |
jaïvi hu sundari! tumaē ayāṇamāṇāē ēyamāyariyaṁ |
tahavi hu imassa ōsahaṁ hōu pavvajjā || 239 ||
tattō ya vasumaīē tahatti bahu manniyaṁ tayaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
tīēvi ya āgamavihiṇā dinnā dikkhā vasumaīē || 242 ||
daṭṭhūṇa dīṇavayaṇō na māriyō kahavi hu dayāē || 243 ||
nēūṇa māṇusuttaragirissa paraō sa ujjhiō varaō |
aha sō tiyasō pattō niyayavimāṇammi vēgēṇa || 244 ||
aṇurāyavasā taṁ ciya jhāyantī suravaraṁ niē hiyaē |
aha annayā kayāivi vicchāyaṁ picchiūṇa niyadaïyaṁ |
bhayabhīyā sā dēvī taṁ dēvaṁ ēvamullavaï || 3 ||
sāmiya! kīsa sasaṅkō araïparaddhōvva dīsasi tumanti |
