taha kanta! ruivivajjiyadēhō dīṇōva kiṁ iṇhiṁ? || 4 ||
sukkaï kīsa akamhā kusumasamūhō sirammi sañjamiō? |
vasaṇāṇi tujjha sāmiya! sāmalavannāṇi kiṁ ahuṇā? || 5 ||
tharaharaï kīsa diṭṭhī kāmammi ya sịdhilaāyarō iṇhiṁ |
mōḍasi ya kīsa aṅgaṁ puṇō puṇō, dēva! vajjarasu? || 6 ||
aha candajjuṇadēvō ēvaṁ puṭṭhō piyāē vajjaraï |
kiṁ na yāṇasi sundari! jēṇa mamaṁ pucchasi imaṁ tu? || 7 ||
dēvassa cavaṇasamaē imāṇi jāyanti suyaṇu! liṅgāṇi! |
tā majjhavi cuisamaō āsannō vaṭṭaï iyāṇiṁ || 8 ||
ēvaṁ nisamma vayaṇaṁ dēvī aïvallahassa dēvassa |
aha annayā kayāivi sō dēvō tīi picchamāṇīē |
daṭṭhūṇa cuyaṁ dēvaṁ dēvī candappahā sudukkhattā |
hā! nāha! pāṇavallaha! mōttūṇa mamaṁ gaō kahiṁ dēva! |
tumaē rahiyā sāmiya! kaṁ saraṇamahaṁ pavajjāmi? || 12 ||
khaṇalavamēttampi tumaṁ viṇā maē nēva nāha! acchantō |
mōttūṇa mamaṁ iṇhiṁ kattha gaō lōyaṇāṇanda! || 13 ||
taṁ cēva majjha saraṇaṁ taṁ nāhō jīviyaṁ tumaṁ dēva! |
tumaē mukkā sāmiya! bhaṇa iṇhiṁ kattha vaccāmi? || 14 ||
hā! kattha gaō vallaha! ēttha aṇāhaṁ mamaṁ pamōttūṇaṁ |
kō maha saraṇaṁ iṇhiṁ sāmiya! tumaē pamukkāē? || 15 ||
tuha virahiyāē iṇhiṁ bhāvaï naraōvamō majjha || 16 ||
taṁ ciya imaṁ vimāṇaṁ rammaṁ maṇikaṇagarayaṇavicchuriyaṁ |
dhannāō nārīō jāō mayaṁ aṇusaranti bhattāraṁ |
ēmāi palavamāṇā sā dēvī haṇaï niyaya hatthēhiṁ |
mucchijjaï puṇaruttaṁ nīsāhārā ya paḍaï bhūmīē |
hā! nāha! kiṁ na pēcchasi vilavantiṁ jaṁ na dēsi ullāvaṁ |
kiṁ vā ruṭṭhō vallaha! kiṁ avaraddhaṁ maē tujjha? || 24 ||
iṇhiṁ kīsa akaṇḍē vilavantiṁ muñcasi mamaṁ tu? || 25 ||
hā! nāha! kiṁ na yāṇasi aïguruaṇurāyamōhiyā ēsā |
maha virahē kaha hōhī jēṇa akaṇḍē tumē mukkā? || 26 ||
iyaramahilavva piyasahi! vilavasi kiṁ ērisaṁ bahuhā? || 29 ||
piyasahi! na hu sāhārō bahuṇāvi hu vilaviēṇa jaṁ atthi |
jaï vilavasi sayahuttaṁ piṭṭasi dēhaṁ karēsi gurusōyaṁ |
tahavi hu na ēi daïō kālakayantēṇa jō nīō || 31 ||
tō ēyaṁ nāūṇaṁ nēhaṁ sịdhilēsu muñca gurusōgaṁ |
ēvaṁvihadukkhāiṁ tattha gayā nēva pāvisi avassaṁ |
ēvaṁ sayampabhāē bhaṇiyā candappahā tahiṁ dēvī |
tattha ya pēcchaï nayarē rāyagihē pavarabāhirūjjāṇē |
dhammaṁ vāgaramāṇaṁ suhaṅkaraṁ nāma kēvaliṁ tāhē |
vandiya suhaṅkaraṁ taṁ suhaṁ karantaṁ tu bhaviyasattāṇaṁ |
pattammi tammi ujjamaha savvahā mā pamāēha || 44 ||
karagahiyasalilasarisaṁ khaṇē khaṇē jhijjaē imaṁ āuṁ |
tamhā jiṇavaradhammē mā hu pamāyaṁ kuṇaha tumhē || 45 ||
jamhā pamāyamūlaṁ dukkhaṁ savvampi ēttha saṁsārē |
caüsuvi gaīsu niyamā tēṇa imō hōi mōttavvō || 47 ||
ēyavasagā ya sattā bhamanti bhavasāgarē ghōrē || 48 ||
mōttuṇa tā pamāyaṁ karēha varaüjjamaṁ jiṇindassa |
nāuṁ kahantaraṁ sā dēvī candappahā imaṁ bhaṇaï |
maha kittiyaṁ ca āuṁ iō cuyāē ya kattha maha jammō? |
daïēṇa tēṇa hōjja navā daṁsaṇaṁ majjha? || 52 ||
ēvaṁ ca pucchiō sō bahumāṇajuyāē tīē dēvīē |
bhayavaṁ suhaṅkarō aha ēvaṁ bhaṇiuṁ samāḍhattō || 53 ||
bhaddē! sō tuha daïō iha cēva ya bhārahammi vāsammi |
paliōvamāṇi aṭṭha ō tuha āu āsi samudiyaṁ maddē! |
iṇhiṁ tu vāsalakkhaṁ avasēsaṁ ciṭṭhaē āuṁ || 56 ||
punnammi vāsalakkhē caïūṇa tumampi tīi sẹ̄dhīē |
dhūyā hōhisi bhaddē! pavarā u piyaṅgumañjarīnāmā |
puvvadaïēṇa samayaṁ tattha ya tuha daṁsaṇaṁ hōhī || 58 ||
tattō ya bhaṇaï dēvī nāyavvō sō maē kahaṁ bhayavaṁ! |
kahavā pāṇiggahaṇaṁ hōhī maha tēṇa samayampi? || 59 ||
aha kēvaliṇā bhaṇiyaṁ nisuṇasu jattāē jiṇavarindassa |
sō cēva ya nāyavvō ēsō sō puvvavallahō majjha |
kāuṁ tīē rūvaṁ ēhī sō mittakajjēṇa || 62 ||
jō tattha kaṇagamālārūvō hōhī sa puvvadaïutti |
tayaṇantaraṁ ca hōhī pāṇiggahaṇampi tēṇa saha tujjha |
jāīsaraṇēṇa tumaṁ sumarissasi maha imaṁ vayaṇaṁ || 64 ||
ēvaṁ piyasahi! dhāriṇi! kēvalivayaṇaṁ nisamma sā dēvī |
saṭṭhāṇaṁ sampattā taṁ ciya dēvaṁ maṇēṇa cintēntī |
aha annayā kayāivi sāvi cuyā āuyakhayammi || 67 ||
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē | jā sā vasumaī ajjā dēvī candappahā ya suralōē |
sā haṁ piyaṅgumañjarināmā iha suyaṇu! sañjāyā || 68 ||
sambhariō sō dēvō pāṇappiō āsi jō saggē || 69 ||
cirapariciyassa piyasahi! gāḍhaṁ ukkaṇṭhiyā ahaṁ iṇhiṁ |
taṁ kaïya diṇaṁ hōhī jammi sasiṇēhaniddhadiṭṭhīē |
kaha sō mē daṭṭhavvō sigghaṁ kaha tēṇa saṅgamō hōhī |
piyasahi! nō saccaviyā tēṇa na sambhāsiyā bhaddē! || 73 ||
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ jāyaṁ kiṁ sōgakāraṇaṁ tujjha |
piyasahi! dhāriṇi! taṁ tuha nīsēsaṁ sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ || 74 ||
aha dhāriṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ kēvalivayaṇaṁ na annahā bhaddē! |
tā kīsa kuṇasi sōyaṁ ēvaṁ ēēṇa hōyavvaṁ? || 75 ||
hasiūṇa maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ēyanti natthi sandēhō |
navaraṁ aïukkaṇṭhā tuvaraï maha māṇasaṁ suyaṇu! || 76 ||
bhaṇaï lahu putti! majjasu bhuñjasu kuṇa pavarasiṅgāraṁ || 77 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca maē kiṁ ammi! kāraṇaṁ jaṁ aïppagē cēva |
jāyā bhōyaṇavēlā, ammāē taō imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ || 78 ||
tattha ya puravatthavvō vaccaï ṇhavaṇassa pēkkhaō lōgō |
tā hōsu lahuṁ paüṇā jiṇabhavaṇē jēṇa vaccāmō || 81 ||
ēvaṁ niyajaṇaṇīē vayaṇaṁ sōūṇa uṭṭhiyā jhatti |
ārụ̄dhā rahapavarē valiyā nayarassa abhimuhā jāva |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ saṁmuhamintaṁ turayā maha rahavarassa uttaṭṭhā |
ummaggēṇa payaṭṭhā bhaggō sō sandaṇō tāhē || 86 ||
bhūmīē ahaṁ paḍiyā mucchāē vigayacēyaṇā jāyā |
tēṇa paraṁ jaṁ jāyaṁ piyayama! tamahaṁ na jāṇāmi || 87 ||
navaraṁ diṭṭhō si tumaṁ vīyantō niyayaüttarīēṇa |
daṭṭhūṇa tumaṁ jāō garuō hiyayammi āṇandō || 88 ||
tattō majjha vigappō piyayama! ēsō maṇammi sañjāō |
ēyaṁ taṁ sañjāyaṁ kēvaliṇā jaṁ tayāiṭṭhaṁ || 89 ||
puvvabhavasaṅgaō sō tā nūṇaṁ ēsa vallahō majjha |
ramaï ya imammi diṭṭhī maṇaṁ ca āṇandamuvvahaï || 90 ||
amaēṇava saṁsittaṁ diṭṭhammi imammi maha sarīrampi |
tā maha pāṇapiō sō avassamēsotti jāva cintēmi |
tāva ya pariyaṇasahiyā samāgayā tattha maha dhāī || 92 ||
abhinandiūṇa tīē āpuṭṭhō tāhiṁ piyayama! tumanti |
ēvaṁ bhaṇiuṁ caliyā tattō ya maē vicintiyaṁ ēyaṁ |
punnēhiṁ piō diṭṭhō iṇhiṁ na caēmi chaḍḍēuṁ || 94 ||
ēyassa vayaṇapaṅkayapalōyaṇaṁ mōttu maha imā diṭṭhī |
aviya | ēvaṁvihē muhuttē nayaṇajuyaṁ milaï kassavi jaṇassa |
ēsā vi majjha dhāī caliyā ēyaṁ pamōttu maṇadaïyaṁ |
lajjāē vajjariuṁ ahampi sakkēmi nō kimpi || 97 ||
tā majjha imaṁ juttaṁ giṇhāmi imassa kiñci ābharaṇaṁ |
taṁ ciya palōiūṇaṁ jēṇa maṇaṁ nivvuiṁ kuṇaï || 98 ||
annaṁ ca | kila ēsa itthirūvō pāṇiggahaṇammi kaṇagamālāē |
ēhī, tattha ya hōhī puṇōvi kila daṁsaṇaṁ imiṇā || 100 ||
iya taïyā kēvaliyā āiṭṭhaṁ majjha tēṇa ēyassa |
taṁ cēva ya ābharaṇaṁ sābhinnāṇaṁ tahiṁ hōhī || 101 ||
ēvaṁ vicintiūṇaṁ muddārayaṇaṁ tu tumha hatthāō |
gahiyaṁ vallaha! taïyā niyayā ya samappiyā muddā || 102 ||
aha dhāriṇināmāē kannē hōūṇa majjha ullaviyaṁ |
ēyaṁ kēvalivayaṇaṁ nivvaḍiyaṁ tāva ikkaṁ tu || 104 ||
tā ēsa dēvajīvō puvviṁ jō āsi tujjha vallahaō |
ēvaṁ tīē bhaṇiē sarōsamēvaṁ maē bhaṇiyaṁ || 105 ||
huṁ huṁ diṭṭhā si tumaṁ dhāriṇi! avasarasu diṭṭhimaggāō |
iṇhiṁ na vallahō kiṁ puvvaṁ jaṁ āsi majjha vallahaō |
īsiṁ hasiūṇa taō kayañjalī dhāriṇī bhaṇaï || 107 ||
piyasahi! khama avarāhaṁ savvamasaccaṁ imaṁ maē bhaṇiyaṁ |
jaha puvvaṁ taha ahuṇāvi vallahō cēva tuha ēsō || 108 ||
kiṁ puṇa bhaṇāmi saccaṁ jaï daïō kīsa ujjhiuṁ caliyā? |
tā mā piyasahi! rūsasu ghaḍaï ciya maha imaṁ vayaṇaṁ || 109 ||
pattā gihammi kamasō atthamiō tāva sūrōvi || 110 ||
kahiō maha māūē taṁ sōūṁ harisiyā ēsā || 111 ||
tīēvi savvaṁ kahiyaṁ maha piuṇō asaṇivēganāmassa |
tattō ya harisiēṇa vajjariyaṁ tēṇa ēvaṁ tu || 112 ||
āsi maha garuyacintā dhūyā jaṁ purisavēsiṇī jāyā |
na ya icchaï kiñci varaṁ kahamēyamahaṁ karissāmi? || 113 ||
sundaramēyaṁ jāyaṁ jāīsaraṇaṁ imīē jaṁ jāyaṁ |
amhaṁ ciya abbhudaō abbhudaō ubbhinnē pāṇiyaṁ paḍiyaṁ || 114 ||
annaṁ ca | purisēhiṁ majjha siṭṭhaṁ hatthibhaē jēṇa mōiyā ēsā |
tassēva dēmi ēyaṁ jaï icchā atthi tammi ēāē? |
jōgo cciya sō kumarō imāi pavarāi majjha dhūyāē |
kintu nisuṇēsu sāmiya! rannō kaṇagappahassa ēyassa |
tā kaha ēhī ihaïṁ cittagaī pāṇigahaṇatthaṁ? , || 119 ||
dhūyā saṁyavarā jaï pēsijjaï tammi cēva nayarammi |
ēvaṁ na hōi piyayama! āṇandō majjha hiyayassa || 120 ||
jaō | ēsā ēkkā dhūyā vallahiyā tā imīē vīvāhaṁ |
jaha navi pēcchāmi ahaṁ tā kiṁ maha jīviēṇanti? || 121 ||
ēvaṁ campagamālā maha jaṇaṇī jāva tattha ullavaï |
tāva ya candaṇanāmō maha bhāyā āgaō bhaṇaï || 122 ||
kiṁ acchaha vīsatthā tumhē iha tāya! nivvicintatti |
ēyaṁ nayaraṁ tāva ya savvampi hu āulībhūyaṁ || 123 ||
tattō bhaṇiyaṁ piuṇā kēṇa va kajjēṇa putta! jāṇāsi? |
aha candaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ iya vattā tāva nayarammi || 124 ||
tassa ya bhayāu naṭṭhō rāyā kaṇagappahō tāva || 126 ||
sirigandhavāhaṇassa u khayarappahāṇassa sō gaō saraṇaṁ |
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē | amhampi tāya! iṇhiṁ visēsaō hōi nāsiyavvanti |
kaṇagappahassa rannō pavarō mantī jaō tāō || 129 ||
ēvaṁ ca puttavayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ tāhi asaṇiyavēgēṇa |
vijjāē varavimāṇaṁ viuvviyaṁ tāhiṁ majjha jaṇaēṇa |
ārōviyaṁ ca savvaṁ gharasāraṁ tattha purisēhiṁ || 131 ||
ēvaṁ ca majjha piyayama! dhāriṇīnāmāē sāhiyaṁ savvaṁ |
ahamavi tammi vimāṇē ārụ̄dhā pariyaṇēṇa samaṁ || 132 ||
tattō ya taṁ vimāṇaṁ uppaïyaṁ khaggasāmalaṁ gayaṇaṁ |
kaṇagappahassa rannō āvāsē tattha taṁ samōinnaṁ |
aviya | pēcchissaṁ kaïya ahaṁ kaïyā maha tēṇa saṅgamō hōhī |
rayaṇīēvi nō niddaṁ lahāmi tuha nāha! virahammi || 137 ||
daṭṭhūṇa asaṇivēgaṁ aha sō sañjāyapaharisō bhaṇaï |
saharisavayaṇēṇa maēvi tassa dinnā imā bhadda! || 140 ||
aha bhaṇaï asaṇivēgō sayamēva ya tattha gantumuciyamha |
tumha vayaṇāō sampaï visēsaō hōi gantavvaṁ || 142 ||
kintu nisuṇēsu kāraṇamamhaṁ gamaṇaṁ na hōi jaha uciyaṁ |
kaṇagappahassa raṇṇō vaṭṭaï visamā dasā jēṇa || 143 ||
tā tammi sasōgammi kaha gamaṇaṁ hōi maha uciyaṁ? || 144 ||
jē duhiyammi na duhiyā āvayapattē biijjayā nēva |
pahuṇō na tē u bhiccā dhuttā paramatthaō nēyā || 145 ||
ētthatthē tā sampaï nibbandhō tē na hōi kāyavvō |
tuha bhagiṇī puṇa ēhī laggadiṇē āulā jaïvi || 146 ||
amiyagaī bhaṇaï taō pēsēhi piyaṅgumañjariṁ tāva |
tattō jaṇaēṇa ahaṁ paṭṭhaviyā māulēṇa saha ēttha |
pattā ya kamēṇa ihaṁ miliyā tō kaṇagamālāē || 148 ||
ēvaṁ piyayama! ahayaṁ māulayagihammi ēttha āyāyā |
cintēmi kaïya hōhī laggadiṇaṁ majjha puṇṇēhiṁ? || 149 ||
jattha maē daṭṭhavvō sō hu jaṇō jīviyāō abbhahiō |
jāva ya kamēṇa vattē pāṇiggahaṇammi tāhē pikkhaṇaē |
nahavāhaṇassa puraō pāraddhē cintiyaṁ hi maē || 151 ||
ēsā hu kaṇagamālā sahijaṇamajjhammi dīsaï niviṭṭhā |
sō maha maṇavallahaō na kōvi iha dīsaē tā kiṁ? || 152 ||
kēvaliṇō taṁ vayaṇaṁ hōjjā aliyaṁ tu maha aünnēhiṁ |
nahi nahi, avaradīsāē avi uggamaï ravī kahavi || 153 ||
payalijja va mērugirī palayaṁ gacchējja udahiṇō savvē |
na ya kēvaliṇā bhaṇiyā bhāvā iha annahā honti || 154 ||
tā kiṁ nu kaṇagamālā ahavā sō hiyayavallahō majjha? |
ēvaṁ vicintiūṇaṁ samāgayā tāhi tujjha pāsammi |
tattō piyayama! tumaē muddāsahiyammi daṁsiē hatthē |
ēsō sō maha daïutti paccaō jhatti upannō || 157 ||
pēccha kaha ēsa ēvaṁ kāūṇavi vigayasayalaāsaṅkō |
kiñci uvāyaṁ tāhiṁ karēmi ēyassa mōyaṇaṭṭhāē |
ēvaṁ vicintiūṇaṁ vañciya taṁ sahiyaṇaṁ savvaṁ || 159 ||
kavaḍēṇa maē sāmiya! samāṇiō iha asōgavaṇiyaē |
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ taṁ savvaṁ sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ || 160 ||
aviya | jaïvi hu kannā piyayama! sajjhasabhariyā na sakkaē kahavi |
tahavi maē savisēsaṁ ṇiyacariyaṁ sāhiyaṁ imaṁ jamhā |
bhō cittavēga! ēvaṁ tīē vayaṇaṁ nisamma sahasatti |
sambhariyaṁ savvampi hu maēvi puvvōiyaṁ niyañcariyaṁ |
aha tīē saṁlattaṁ piyayama! kiṁ iṇhi kāyavvaṁ? || 164 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ viyāṇiyaṁ kulaharaṁ tu tē suyaṇu! |
tā vacca tumaṁ gēhaṁ ahamavi ittō palāissaṁ || 165 ||
paḍiyā hu kaṇagamālā maḍḍāē majjha ēttha vāvīē |
ēvaṁ kaē na kassa vi āsaṅkā hōi cittavēgammi |
annaṁ ca nisuyaṁ ca maē sundari! suranandaṇapuravarammi āgamma |
vaḍiyaṁ ca puravaraṁ taṁ rannā saṁmāṇiō ya puralōō |
tā tattha ahaṁ gantuṁ āṇāvissāmi tuha jaṇagaṁ || 169 ||
ēvaṁ ca kaē vallahi! salāhaṇijjaṁ tu hōi savvampi |
annaha puṇa vihiyammi ubhayakulaṁ maïliyaṁ hōi || 171 ||
tattō ya tīē bhaṇiyaṁ jamiha tumaṁ kiñci āṇavēsi maē |
taṁ savvaṁ kāyavvaṁ navaraṁ piya! suṇasu vinnattiṁ || 172 ||
jīviyasandēhēṇaṁ kahavi maē ajja nāha! sampattō |
mōttūṇa tumaṁ iṇhiṁ katthavi sakkēmi nō gantuṁ || 173 ||
tāvacciya maha jīyaṁ jāva tumaṁ nayaṇagōyarē vasasi |
tuha daṁsaṇarahiyā puṇa jhatti ya pāṇēhiṁ muñcāmi || 174 ||
jampi nimisanti nayaṇā ēttiyamēttampi dūsahaṁ mannē |
kiṁ puṇa jaṁ bahudivasē tuha virahē nāha! acchissaṁ? || 175 ||
tā nāha! jattha vaccasi aṇugantavvaṁ maēvi tatthēva |
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē kajjē jaṁ kāyavvaṁ tayaṁ bhaṇasu || 176 ||
annaṁ ca | saṭṭhāṇē pattāē pāṇiggahaṇaṁ bhavissaī majjha |
ēttō ya majjha jaṇaō bhaṇiōvi hu jaï na vaccaī kahavi |
tā maha kā hōjja gaī tumaē saha daṁsaṇaṇampi na hu hōjjā |
acchaü pāṇiggahaṇaṁ dūre cciya maha maṇāṇandaṁ || 179 ||
tā kiṁ bahuṇā vallaha! mēllāmi tumaṁ na tāva hatthāō |
annaṁ jaṁ kāyavvaṁ taṁ ciya maha āṇavēsutti || 180 ||
bhō cittavēga! ēvaṁ tīē bhaṇiē maēvi saṁlattaṁ |
jaï ēvaṁ tā sundari! sigdhaṁ paüṇā bhavēsutti || 181 ||
viyalaï jāva na rayaṇī pēkkhaṇagakkhittamāṇasō jāva |
nahavāhaṇapamuhō iha lōgō, tā vaccimō suyaṇu! || 182 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē ēsā paüṇā ciṭṭhāmi nāha! tuha puraō |
tattō uppaïō haṁ sahasā gayaṇammi saha tīē || 183 ||
jāva ya kittiyamēttaṁ khēttaṁ vaccāmi vallahāi saha |
tāva ya tīē bhaṇiyaṁ udarē pīḍā mamaṁ jāyā || 184 ||
thakkaṁ savvasarīraṁ hiyaē sūlaṁ sudūsahaṁ ēi |
tā sāmi! kuṇa parittaṁ sakkēmi na gantumahamiṇaṁhiṁ || 185 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ sundari! sukumāladēhiyā taṁ si |
rattīē nēva suttā vāyaï aïsīyalō vāō || 186 ||
tēṇa tuha udarapīḍā jāyā tā mā karēhisi visāyaṁ |
ēvaṁ bhaṇamāṇō haṁ ōyariō ēttha vaṇaniuñjammi |
ghasiūṇa araṇikaṭṭhaṁ aggī pajjāliō maē pacchā |
saṁsēviyaṁ sarīraṁ bahuhā tattō maē bhaṇiyaṁ || 189 ||
jāyā satthasarīyā sundari! vaccāmu iṇhi niyaṭhāṇaṁ |
tattō ya tīē bhaṇiyaṁ piyayama! ēvaṁ karēmotti || 190 ||
ēvaṁ dōvi jaṇāiṁ nīhariyāiṁ tu kayaligēhāō |
bhō cittavēga! tattō diṭṭhō sahasā tumaṁ ēttha || 191 ||
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ taṁ savvaṁ sāhiyaṁ maē ēyaṁ |
bhō suppaïṭṭha! ēvaṁ vajjariyaṁ cittagaïṇā ō || 193 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ nigghiṇahiyaō na atthi maha sarisō |
tā mitta! tuha saricchō nikkāraṇavacchalō jaē nannō |
taha jīviyampi dinnaṁ tumaē maha ērisaṁ karintēṇa |
tā mitta! tumaṁ mōttuṁ ubagārī natthi annotti || 197 ||
tattō ya cittagaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ kiṁ uvakayaṁ maē tujjha? |
taṁ cēva kayaṁ sukayaṁ pariṇāmē sundaraṁ jamiha || 198 ||
muharasiyaṁ pariṇāmē ya dāruṇaṁ sajjaṇā na saṁsanti |
ēyassavi maha sundara! paḍihāsaï na sundarō pariṇāmō |
tā bhadda! tumaṁ cintasu nitthārō kaha ṇu rāyāō? || 201 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ vicintiēṇaṁ tu ēttha kiṁ bahuṇā? |
taṁ cēva kiñci hōhī jaṁ diṭṭhaṁ mama punnēhiṁ || 202 ||
aïdullahāvi hu maē sampattā vihivasēṇa jaha ēsā |
bhaṇaï taō cittagaī ēvaṁ ēyaṁ tu nicchayamaēṇa |
tahavi hu na hōi juttā ēsā pāyappasāraṇiyā || 204 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ tu vavatthiyammi kajjammi |
jaṁ kāyavvaṁ sampaï taṁ cēva ya ittha sāhēsu || 205 ||
bhaṇaï taō cittagaī palāyaṇaṁ cēva sampayaṁ uciyaṁ |
niyanayarammivi gamaṇaṁ sampaï uciyaṁ na hōitti || 206 ||
mahaīṁ vēlā vaṭṭaï acchantāṇaṁ imammi ṭhāṇammi |
tā mā karēsu iṇhiṁ kālakkhēvaṁ mahābhāga! || 207 ||
taha kahavi hu kāyavvaṁ sarīrahāṇī na hōi jaha mitta! |
jalaṇappahēṇa samayaṁ ca saṅgayaṁ kaṭṭu asaṇivēgassa |
bhō suppaïṭṭha! ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa piyaṅgumañjarīi samaṁ |
cittagaī uppaïō pattō ya kamēṇa saṭṭhāṇaṁ || 210 ||
dakkhiṇadisāmuhō haṁ vaccāmi kamēṇa jāva gahaṇammi |
taṁ daṭṭhu maē bhaṇiyaṁ kiṁ mannē ērisaṁ imaṁ daïē! |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīē piyayama! vijjū ukkā va tāva navi hōī |
thirabhāvāō, navaraṁ hōjja surō suravimāṇaṁ vā || 218 ||
bhō suppaïṭṭha! ēvaṁ ullavamāṇāṇa amha sahasatti |
namiō ya bhaṇaï ēsō avi kusalaṁ tumha cittavēgatti? |
pariyāṇasi bhadda! mamaṁ navatti, tattō maē bhaṇiyaṁ || 220 ||
jāṇāmi kampi dēvaṁ sāmannēṇaṁ, visēsaō na puṇō |
bhaṇiyaṁ surēṇa tattō cirapariciyamavi na yāṇēsi || 221 ||
viṇayapaṇaēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ iha jammē paricaō na tāvatthi |
jaï navaraṁ annabhavē tumaē saha maha mahābhāga! || 222 ||
navaraṁ tumammi diṭṭhē diṭṭhī āṇandiyā maṇaṁ muiyaṁ |
jāṇāmi tēṇa kōvi hu puvvabhavē āsi sambandhō || 223 ||
ēvaṁ ca maē bhaṇiē payaḍīkāuṁ phurantatēillaṁ |
vajjaraï suravarō sō mitta! maṇiṁ gēṇha ēyanti || 224 ||
maṇiṇō samappaṇatthaṁ samāgaō suyaṇu! tuha samīvammi |
tamhā visaharamahaṇaṁ gēṇhasu pavaraṁ maṇiṁ ēyaṁ || 225 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ suravara! vajjarasu tāva maha ēyaṁ |
nikkāraṇā pavittī na hōi jaṁ uttamā binti || 226 ||
tā kēṇa kāraṇēṇaṁ majjha samappēsi divvamaṇimēyaṁ? |
puvvabhavē sambandhō tumaē saha āsi kō majjha? || 227 ||
tattō surēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ patthāvō vittharassa na hu ēsō |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca maē kiñciha majjha kattōvi āvayā hōhī |
bhaṇiyaṁ surēṇa sundara! tuha cariyaṁ savvamēva vijjāē |
tujjha aṇumaggalaggō āsannō cēva vaṭṭaï iyāṇiṁ |
tattā jīvantayarī hōhī tuha āvayā garuī || 232 ||
tā giṇha imaṁ sundara! divvamaṇiṁ pāṇarakkhaṭṭhā || 233 ||
jaï puṇa kahavi hu uvasamaï nēya tavvihiyavēyaṇānivahō |
tā ēsa maṇī sayayaṁ saṁnihiō bhadda! kāyavvō || 236 ||
sayamēva ahampi tumaṁ sundara! rakkhēmi tāō khayarāō |
tā taṁ paōyaṇamahaṁ jhaḍitti sampāḍiūṇa ēhāmi |
annaṁ ca tēṇa samayaṁ vijjābaladappiēṇa khayarēṇa |
mā kāhisi saṅgāmaṁ garuō vijjāhi tuha jaṁ sō || 239 ||
aïdukkaraṁ hi jaïvi hu ēyaṁ purusāhimāṇajuttāṇaṁ |
kāraṇavasēṇa tahavi hu juddhārambhō na kāyavvō || 240 ||
jaṁ tēṇa samaṁ jujjhē avassa tuha hōi pāṇacāutti |
tā maha vayaṇāu tumē vārahaḍī nēva kāyavvā || 241 ||
kiñca | saṅkuiya kēsarī jaṁ uppaïumaṇō gayassa vahaṇaṭṭhā |
laddhāvasarō pacchā sāhiyavijjō karijjaṁ jaṁ ruiyaṁ |
kiṁ bahuṇā? | ēso cciya divvamaṇī mandapabhāvāō tassa vijjāō |
ēvaṁ surēṇa bhaṇiē kāūṇaṁ añjaliṁ payattēṇa |
bahumāṇapuvvayaṁ aha divvamaṇī suravarēṇa maha sīsē |
baddhē maṇimmi sahasā garuyapamōō maṇammi sañjāō |
bhō suppaïṭṭha! naṭṭhaṁ bhaya asēsaṁ sarīrāō || 247 ||
sambhāsēuṁ hayagurubhayaṁ nēhasāraṁ mamaṁ sō | kantājuttaṁ vivihavayaṇālāvasambhāsaṇāē |
tattō dittībhariyagayaṇō nijjiyāṇaṅgarūvō | dēvō pattō turiyagamaṇō jhatti addaṁsaṇanti || 248 ||
ahayampi taō dakkhiṇadisāmuhō saha piyāē sañciliō |
cintēmi ya kiṁ kāhī khayarō nahavāhaṇō iṇhiṁ? || 1 ||
na hu sakkissaï kāuṁ avayāraṁ garuyarōsōvi || 2 ||
ahavā kiṁ maha imiṇā vicintiēṇēha phaggubhūēṇa |
hōhī kiñci mamaṁ ciya jaṁ diṭṭhaṁ pucvakammēhiṁ || 3 ||
divvamaṇiṇō pabhāvā saṁnijjhēṇaṁ ca tahaya dēvassa |
tāva ya maha daïyāē bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavēvirataṇūē || 5 ||
hā nāha! kōvi ēsō dīsaï ēntō 'ṇumaggamamhāṇaṁ |
tā piya! kimpi uvāyaṁ cintasu pīḍā na hōī jaha tumha |
jaï tā atakkiōvi hu ējja imō khayaravindapariyariō |
tā hōjja bhayaṁ garuyaṁ, vinnāē kiṁ bhayaṁ suyaṇu!? || 9 ||
dēvēṇa cēva kahiyaṁ āgamaṇamimassa tujjha paccakkhaṁ |
tā kiṁ ēyaṁ daṭṭhuṁ bhayāurā suyaṇu! sañjāyā? || 10 ||
dēvassa divvamaṇiṇō pabhāvaō suyaṇu! sundaraṁ hōhī |
mā mā kuṇasu visāyaṁ ēntaṁ daṭṭhūṇa ēyanti || 11 ||
annō na kōvi iṇhiṁ kāuṁ sakkijjaē uvāutti |
ēsō jaṁ sigghagaī āsannō vaṭṭaï iyāṇiṁ || 12 ||
kiṁ puṇa lōyaṇavisaē pattēhiṁ suyaṇu! amhēhiṁ || 13 ||
tā hōu piē! kiñcivi jaṁ diṭṭhaṁ majjha puvvakammēhiṁ |
navi kiñci sōiēṇaṁ iha labbhaï jīvalōgammi || 14 ||
ēvaṁ ca maē bhaṇiē muñcantī thūlaaṁsuyapavāhaṁ |
garuyabhayasōyataviyā sā bālā iya puṇō bhaṇaï || 15 ||
hā! nāha! pāṇavallaha! hayavihiṇā pāvakāriṇī ahayaṁ |
jaï taïyā maṇavallaha! pāṇaccāō maē kaō hontō |
tā kiṁ ērisagaruāvaīē taṁ nāha! nivaḍantō? || 17 ||
jaï gabbhāō paḍantā bālattē vāvi jaï mayā hontā |
tā kiṁ majjha nimittē hōjja imā āvayā tujjha? || 18 ||
ēsō muhamahurōvi hu parōpparaṁ amha garuyaaṇurāō |
iṇhiṁ ca tumaṁ sāmiya! kammaṁ avalambiūṇa khakkō si |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ mā sundari! kuṇasu kiñcivi visāyaṁ |
aviyāriya kayakajjaṁ ērisayaṁ hōi naṇu suyaṇu! || 21 ||
appabalaṁ ca parabalaṁ aṇavēkkhiya āḍhavēi jō kajjaṁ |
nīīē vaṭṭamāṇā maṇuyā na lahanti āvayānivahaṁ |
suyaṇu! maē kā nīī tumaṁ harantēṇa vihiyatti? || 23 ||
tā iṇhiṁ āvayāē suyaṇu! visāō na kāyavvō || 24 ||
kiñca | ēvaṁ ṭhiēvi sundari! aṇukūlō kahavi jaï vihī hōi |
baliō hu imō sattū tāva ya sajjhō na purisagārassa |
jaï tāva atthi punnaṁ kiṁ kajjaṁ suyaṇu! purisagārēṇa? |
aha natthi kiñci punnaṁ vihalō tā purisagārōvi || 27 ||
ēkkattō maha punnaṁ annattō dappiō imō sattū |
pēcchāmō tā sundari! kassa jaō hōjja ēyāṇa? || 28 ||
bhō suppaïṭṭha! pattō turiyagaī iha paēsammi || 29 ||
tāva ya turiyayaragaī pattō nahavāhaṇō maha samīvaṁ |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa rē! rē khayarāhama! kattha vaccasē inhiṁ? |
kāuṁ rāyaviruddhaṁ nāsantō kattha chuṭṭasē pāva!? |
rē! rē! kēṇa balēṇaṁ ērisakammaṁ tumē samāyariyaṁ? |
hariūṇa maha mahēlaṁ nāsantō kattha chuṭṭihisi? || 33 ||
rē mūḍha! kēṇa dinnā tuha buddhī ērisā ahammēṇa? |
ahavā kuviō daïvō purisaṁ kiṁ haṇaï laüḍēṇa? || 34 ||
kuviō tujjha kayantō tēṇa tumē ērisaṁ vihiyaṁ || 35 ||
jēṇa balēṇaṁ ēyaṁ rāyaviruddhaṁ tumē samāyariyaṁ |
taṁ kuṇasu iṇhi payaḍaṁ mā bhaṇihisi jaṁ na bhaṇiyanti || 36 ||
ēsō tuha tikkhēṇa sīsaṁ chindāmi addhacandēṇa |
jaï atthi pōrisaṁ kiñci hōsu tā jujjhasajjotti || 37 ||
bhō suppaïṭṭha! ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇaṁ tēṇa garuyarōsēṇa |
āyaḍ̣dhiūṇa dhaṇuhaṁ mukkō maha saṁmuhō bāṇō || 38 ||
aha sō dhaṇuhavimukkō vēgēṇāgamma majjha āsannē |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ sō khayarō vimhiyahiyaō sasaṅkiō kiñci |
jaï kahavi khuddavijjāpabhāvaō maha sarō paḍikkhaliō |
tahavi na chuṭṭasi iṇhiṁ aggēyāīṇa satthāṇa || 41 ||
ēvaṁ ca bhaṇantēṇaṁ tēṇaṁ āvāhiyāiṁ satthāiṁ |
tampi hu maha āsannē maṇippabhāvāō hōumasamatthaṁ |
pāsē sambhamiūṇaṁ vijjhāyaṁ jhatti tattō ya || 44 ||
aha tāṇi amōhāṇivi paḍihayasattīṇi daṭṭhu satthāṇi |
rē khayarāhama! dappaṁ mā hu karijjāsi niyacinttē || 47 ||
maha mantassa pabhāvā vijjāē vāvi ōsahīē vā |
jaō | mantēṇa va tantēṇa va hantuṁ sakkanti nēva ēyāiṁ |
kintu nisuṇēsi kāraṇamētēhiṁ jaṁ na nihaō taṁ || 49 ||
ēsō hu pāvakārī suhamaccūē na cēva jōggotti |
tā duhamārēṇa imō mārēyavvō tumē kumara! || 50 ||
iya majjha sikkhaṇatthaṁ haō tumaṁ nēva divvasatthēhiṁ |
na uṇō tuha vijjāhiṁ hammaï sattīō ēēsiṁ || 51 ||
tā iṇhi maha na chuṭṭasi pāyālaṁ jaïvi pavisasē mūḍha! |
mōrōvi ahava dhippaï hanta! taïjjammi uḍḍāṇē || 52 ||
rē khayarāhama! iṇhiṁ kattō maha jāsi diṭṭhipahapaḍiō? |
dduhamaccūē ēsō mārēmi tumaṁ na sandēhō || 53 ||
tattō mahantaviyaṇā pāubbhūyā mamaṁ taō dēhaṁ |
sāvi maha pāṇadaïyā garuyaṁ daṭhṭhūṇa āvayaṁ majjhaṁ |
hā ajjaütta! vallaha! ēya aṇatthassa kāriṇī ahayaṁ |
hā pāviṭṭhā taïyā kiṁ na mayā mayaṇapacakkhaṁ || 59 ||
hā kaha majjhanimittē piyayama! aïgaruya āvayaṁ pattō |
hā ajjaütta! iṇhiṁ tuha virahē natthi maha jīyaṁ || 60 ||
bhō bhō dhaṇadēva! imaṁ sōuṁ khayarassa bhāsiyaṁ tassa |
ētthantarammi ya mahaṁ ēsa vigappō samuppannō || 61 ||
mahilāpalāvasaddō puvviṁ jō āsi iha maē nisuō |
tattō ya purisasaddō tayaṇantaramēva jō maē nisuō |
ahavā kiṁ maē imiṇā vicintiēṇaṁ tu tāva nisuṇēmi |
jaṁ kiñci kahaï ēsō niyacariyaṁ cittavēgotti || 64 ||
tavvayaṇamahaṁ savvaṁ aha sō ēvaṁ samullavaï || 65 ||
bhō suppaïṭṭha ēvaṁ vilavantā bahuvihaṁ sudukkhattā |
bhō suppaïṭṭha! tāva ya tumampi iha āgaō paēsammi |
tā bhō tumaē dinnaṁ maha jīyaṁ ēttha natthi sandēhō |
maṇiṇō ya pabhāvāō na ya ḍakkō duṭṭhasappēhiṁ || 69 ||
annaha kaha maha jīyaṁ havijjaguruvēyaṇā paraddhassa |
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ kēṇa tumaṁ ērisāē mahaīē |
khittō si āvayāē taṁ savvaṁ sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ || 71 ||
iya bhō dhaṇadēva! tayā sōuṁ khayarassa bhāsiyaṁ tassa |
tattō ya maē ēyaṁ vicintiyaṁ niyayacittammi || 72 ||
pēccha narā vibuhāvi hu aṇurāyaparavasā visayagiddhā |
acchaü tā paralōgē ihēva pāvinti garuyadukkhāiṁ |
iha paralōē ghōrō rāgo cciya sayalajīvāṇaṁ || 75 ||
jaṁ vēinti asāyaṁ kattō taṁ handi! naraēvi? || 76 ||
naraē nēraïyā iva niccaṁ ciya dukkhiyā honti || 77 ||
rāgō hi dukkharūvō rāgō ciya sayalaāvayāhēū |
tāva ciya paramasuhaṁ jāva na rāgō maṇammi uccharaï |
ēmāi cintiūṇaṁ dhaṇadēva! maē imaṁ tu vajjariyaṁ |
bhō cittavēga! iṇhiṁ mā kīraü kōvi sōgotti || 81 ||
pattāē āvayāē tēṇa visāō na kāyavvō || 82 ||
tō bhaṇaï cittavēgō bhadda! visāō na kōvi maha annō |
ēkacciya maha cintā kuṇaï maṇē dūsahaṁ dukkhaṁ || 84 ||
sā kaha varaī hōhī nīyā nahavāhaṇēṇa ruyamāṇī |
jīvaï va navā iṇhiṁ daṭṭhuṁ maha tārisamavatthaṁ? || 85 ||
ēvaṁ ca jāva sāhaï sō khayarō majjha bhadda! dhaṇadēva! |
ētthantaraṁmmi nisuṇasu jō vuttantō tahiṁ jāō || 86 ||
ēkkō kamaladala 'cchō pihuvacchō suravarō tahiṁ sahasā |
daṭṭhuṁ samāgayaṁ taṁ viyasiyavayaṇō ya cittavēgō sō |
aha sō suhāsaṇatthō tiyasō saṁlavaï bhadda! tuha kusalaṁ? |
maṇiṇō ya pabhāvāō nitthinnā āvayā viulā! || 89 ||
tō bhaṇaï cittavēgō tumha pabhāvāō sampayaṁ kusalaṁ |
tā sampaï maha sāhasu mahantakōūhalaṁ ittha || 90 ||
puvvabhavē sambandhō tumaē saha āsi kō mamaṁ dēva!? |
kēṇa va kajjēṇa tumaṁ āsi gaō ucchugō taïyā? || 91 ||
tattō ya bhaṇaï tiyasō imēṇa kajjēṇa āgaō suyaṇu! |
jambuddīvē ihaïṁ ēravaē atthi āriē dēsē |
tīēvi suvikkhāō dhaṇabhūī nāma āsi satthāhō |
vimalaṁ sāvagadhammaṁ sammaṁ aha tāṇa pālayantāṇaṁ |
aha annayā kayāivi pahāṇa suviṇēhiṁ sūiyaṁ taṇayaṁ |
dhaṇavāhaṇābhihāṇō bīō kālēṇa sē suō jāō |
sōvi hu sudhammanāmō jāō aha aṭṭhavārisaō || 101 ||
tīē ya puravarīē viharantō annayā samōyariō |
dinnammi dhammalābhē guruṇā, sēsē muṇī namiuṁ || 106 ||
ēkkasi kaō pamāō jīvaṁ pāḍēi bhavasamuddammi |
bhīmō ya bhavō bahusō payāsiō tīē parisāē || 112 ||
saṁviggā sā parisā jahāgayaṁ paḍigayā savvā || 113 ||
icchāmi tumha mūlē niravajjaṁ giṇhiuṁ supavvajjaṁ |
bhaṇiyaṁ guruṇā ya taō hōu avigdhaṁ tuhēttha vatthummi |
ammāpiūhiṁ mukkō aha sō pavvāviō guruṇā || 116 ||
nāūṇa jōgayaṁ sē suharikkhē sūriṇā niyapayammi |
ahisittō sūrīvi ya saṁlihiyataṇū gaō mōkkhaṁ || 119 ||
mahayā vicchaḍḍēṇaṁ pariṇīyā sōhaṇammi sā laggē |
gāḍhaṁ visayāsattō gayaṁvi kālaṁ na yāṇāi || 125 ||
aha annayā sudhammō viharantō muṇivarō tahiṁ pattō |
sāhūhiṁ tattha vasahī vimaggiyā tāhi satthavāhēṇa |
piuṇā bhaṇiōvi daḍhaṁ na ē (hō?)i guruvandaō kahavi || 129 ||
jāyā ēsā cintā bhāyā mē rāgamōhiō varaō |
mahayā uvarōhēṇaṁ samāgaō vandiūṇa tō sūriṁ |
uvaviṭṭhō sē puraō aha sūri bhaṇiumāḍhattō || 134 ||
visaēsu daḍhaṁ sattā sattā bandhanti asuhakammāiṁ |
acchaü tā paralōē ihēva pāvinti guruyadukkhāiṁ |
baddhō vārībandhē phāsēṇa gaō gaō nihaṇaṁ || 139 ||
rasaṇindiyammi luddhō viddhō galaēṇa macchaō nihaō |
pañcidiyavasagāṇaṁ narāṇa puṇa kā gaī hōjjā? || 143 ||
tā pañcidiyavasagō visayasuhaṁ sēviūṇa mā bhadda! |
kijjaü dhammammi maī visayasuhaṁ ujjhiūṇa tā iṇhiṁ |
ēyaṁ guruṇō vayaṇaṁ nisamma dhaṇavāhaṇō imaṁ bhaṇaï |
icchāmi tumhavayaṇaṁ kiṁ puṇa nisuṇēha maha bhaṇiyaṁ || 146 ||
aïnēhaparā varaī khaṇamavi virahaṁ na sakkaē sọ̄dhuṁ |
daïyā 'ṇaṅgavaī maha tēṇa na sakkēmi taṁ mōttuṁ || 147 ||
tubbhampi vandaṇatthaṁ āgamaṇaṁ tēṇa hōi na majjha |
maha virahē sā varaī iṇhimpi hu acchaē kicchaṁ || 148 ||
tattō guruṇā bhaṇiyaṁ cañcalacittāṇaṁ mahiliāṇa kaē |
kō va sakannō purisō hārijjā appayaṁ bhad! || 149 ||
jō dhammammi pamāyaï, sō kāurisō na sappapurisō || 150 ||
bhayajaṇaṇīō, tāsuṁ kō va sakannō raïṁ kujjā? || 152 ||
rattāō haranti dhaṇaṁ pāṇēvi haranti taha virattāō |
annaṁ cintēnti maṇē niyanti annaṁ dhaḍēnti annēṇa |
calacittāṇaṁ tāṇaṁ kō nāma havijja vallahaō? || 154 ||
mārēnti paï jārassa kāraṇē tampi handi! annaṭṭhā |
vīsāsanti ya annaṁ sabbhāvaṁ nēya payaḍēnti || 155 ||
kiṁ bahuṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ jāō ya haṇanti niyayaputtampi |
kō nāma piō tāsiṁ havijja cavalāṇa mahilāṇa? || 156 ||
mahilāṇa kaē kō iha havijja sịdhilāyarō dhammē? || 157 ||
iya gurubhaṇiyaṁ sōuṁ vihasiya dhaṇavāhaṇēṇa saṁlattaṁ |
maha mahilā puṇa saralā païvvayā saccasīladayajuttā |
sarisā sā kaha hōjjā asuddhacariyāṇa annamahilāṇa? |
tattō guruṇā bhaṇiyaṁ maṇōharā tujjha jaïvi sā mahilā |
tahavi hu uvabhujjantā saraṇī sā narayanayarassa || 161 ||
jaha kimpāgaphalāiṁ bhuttāiṁ duhāvahāiṁ iha honti |
jaha visamīsaṁ sarasampi bhōyaṇaṁ jīviyaṁ haraï bhuttaṁ |
taha sundarāvi ramaṇī ramiyā naṇu dōggaïṁ dēi || 163 ||
bōhijjantō maṇayaṁ jāō aha payaṇurāgō sō || 165 ||
kiṁ nō sakkaï rāgō visaṁva duṭṭhassa sappassa? || 167 ||
bhayavaṁ! tāva na tuṭṭaï daïyāē uvari savvahā rāgō |
navaraṁ karēmi ēkkaṁ jaï juttaṁ tumha paḍihāi || 168 ||
ēvaṁ vavatthiyammi jaï jōggaṁ dēha majjha tō dikkhaṁ |
tīē adaṁsaṇēṇaṁ sakkēmi na jīviyaṁ dhariuṁ || 170 ||
tavvayaṇaṁ sōūṇa ya sudhammasūri vicintaē ēvaṁ |
pēcchaha aïdurantō rāgō kaha vilasaē lōē? || 171 ||
ēvampi tā dijjaü pavvajjā tāhi gahiyasuttatthō |
ēvaṁ ca tāṇa dōṇhavi parōpparaṁ jāva tuṭṭaï na rāgō |
tāva ya guruṇā bhaṇiyaṁ ēgantē bhāraīē mahurāē |
jaṁ puṇa sāhuṇi visaē saviyārapalōyaṇaṁ tu sāhussa |
taṁ bhadda! guruaṇatthassa kāraṇa vanniyaṁ samaē || 178 ||
iyaramahilājaṇēvi hu diṭṭhīpāō na hōi juttōti |
tā ujjhiya avivēyaṁ rāgaṁ avahatthiūṇa bhāvēṇa |
ēvaṁ guruṇā bhaṇiō saṁviggō sōvi cintaē ēvaṁ |
hī jīva! pāva! bhamihisi nārayatiriēsu dīharaṁ kālaṁ |
aṇurāgō tavvisaē tāēvi ya tassa uvarimmi || 185 ||
aha annayā kayāivi bhagiṇīē vasumaīē sañjuttā |
diṭṭhō ya tāhi ēgō mahilāsahiō narō u ummattō |
taṁ duṭṭhumaṇaṅgavaī suiraṁ pulaēi taṁ juyalaṁ || 189 ||
tattō tīē bhaṇiyaṁ bhagiṇīē sulōyaṇāē aṇuharaï |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca vasumaīē suiraṁ nijjhāiūṇa savisāyaṁ |
sacciya ēsā amhaṁ bhagiṇī ō sulōyaṇā nāma || 191 ||
ēyaṁ maha paccakkhaṁ savvampi hu sāsurē vasantīē |
ēsō gahagahiyanarō dīsaï sarisō u rāyaüttassa |
tā ēsō kaṇagarahō ēsāvi sulōyaṇā nūṇaṁ || 195 ||
kiṁ amhē pariyāṇaï, ahavāvia bhambhalā ēsā || 196 ||
tattō gantuṁ dōhivi mahuraṁ ābhāsiyāvi sā jāhē |
navi jāṇaï kiñci phuḍaṁ bōllaï ya bahuasambadhdhaṁ || 197 ||
bhaṇiō ajjāhiṁ gurū ēsā amhāṇa jiṭṭhabhagiṇī ō |
kiṁ hōi navā bhayavaṁ! jāyā ummattiyā kahavā? || 199 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ guruṇā tattō nāṇēṇa viyāṇiūṇa paramatthaṁ |
sacciya sulōyaṇā sā kaṇagarahō ēsa juvarāyā || 200 ||
jōgō maïmōhakarō sīsē khittō imāṇa suttāṇa |
tassa vasēṇaṁ dōṇhavi maïsaṁmōhō imāṇaṁ sañjāō |
rannā ya taō vijjā bahavē saddāviā tattha || 202 ||
na ya kēṇavi paüṇāiṁ kayāiṁ kālēṇa rakkhaganarāṇa |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca vasumaīē bhayavaṁ! ēyāṇa mūḍhacittāṇaṁ |
jaï pēcchaha uvayāraṁ, paḍijōgaṁ dēha cintēuṁ || 204 ||
daṭṭhūṇa bhagiṇijuyalaṁ sulōyaṇā vimhiyā imaṁ bhaṇaï |
kiṁ nāma imaṁ sumiṇaṁ kiṁvā maïvibbhamō ēsa? || 206 ||
sā kattha amha nayarī sā ya vibhūī ya tē alaṅkārā |
kaha dhūlighūsarāiṁ iha mhi ( mhō? ) sampāviyāinti? || 207 ||
dōnnivi gahiyavayāō kattha va bhagiṇīō majjha ihaïṁ tu? |
tā nūṇa indayālaṁ ēyaṁ ahavāvi sumiṇanti || 208 ||
tattō ya vasumaīē kahiyaṁ ummāyakāraṇaṁ savvaṁ |
jāva ya gurumāhappā naṭṭhō tumhāṇa ummāō || 209 ||
jaïyā ya tumaṁ bhaddē! chụdhā antēurammi juvarannā |
tā suyaṇu! na suviṇamiṇaṁ saccaṁ ciya jaṁ imaṁ diṭṭhaṁ |
ēsō sō amha guru sudhammanāmō mahāsattō || 213 ||
tattō saṁvēyakariṁ guruṇō sōūṇa dēsaṇaṁ pavaraṁ |
tiṇhampi hu bhagiṇīṇaṁ vōlīṇā vāsarā bahavē || 217 ||
muṇiṇō kaṇagarahassa u dhaṇavāhaṇasāhuṇō ya sañjāō |
aha annayā kayāivi thōvaṁ niyaāuyaṁ muṇēūṇaṁ |
jāō vimāṇasāmī dēvō u sasippabhō nāma || 222 ||
sāvi hu aṇaṅgavaïyā avigayarāgā carittu sāmannaṁ |
kaṇagarahō sō sāhū sulōyaṇāē samaṁ tu ajjāē |
kālaṁ kāuṁ dōnnivi uvannāiṁ tu bīyakappammi |
kaṇagarahō ō vihuppahanāmō iyarā sayampabhā nāma |
tatthēva kila vimāṇē dēvī candappabhā nāma || 230 ||
paliōvamāṇi aṭṭha u divvasuhaṁ tattha aṇuhavēūṇaṁ |
dēvō vijjuppahō sō caïūṇa imammi vēyaḍ̣dhē || 232 ||
ēvaṁ ci ṭhiē | jō dhaṇavāhaṇajīvō dēvō vijjuppahō ya diyalōē |
sō ya tumaṁ iha sundara! uppannō cittavēgotti || 234 ||
dēvīvi candarēhā tattō āukkhaē cuyā santī |
bhō cittavēga! puvviṁ tubbhaṁ jō āsi rāgasambandhō |
ruvaṁ balaṁ ca dittī riddhīvi ya āsi thēviyā tumha |
dēvabhavē tuha āuṁ vimajjhimaṁ thavēyaṁ āsi || 238 ||
bhō cittavēga! kiṁvā kahiēṇaṁ tēṇa tuha puraō? || 240 ||
kāūṇavi sāmannaṁ sarāgabhāvō tumē na jaṁ cattō |
tassa phalēṇaṁ ēsā dūsahā tuha āvayā jāyā || 241 ||
dēvabhavē tuha mittō candajjuṇanāmagō ya jō āsi |
caïūṇa sōvi tattō cittagaī ēttha sañjāō || 242 ||
vasumaïnāmā ajjā dēvī candappahā ya diyalōē |
sāvi ya piyaṅgumañjarināmā iha bhadra! uppannā || 243 ||
jaṁ puvvasaṅgaō sō cittagaī tēṇa tumha sañjāō |
tēṇaṁ uvāyapuvvaṁ ghaḍiyā sā tujjha kaṇagamālāō |
iṇhiṁ sakammvasaō jāō tuha tīi saha virahō || 245 ||
bhō cittavēga! bahuṇā kiṁvā bhaṇiēṇa ēttha annēṇa? |
jaṁ cēva āsi puṭṭhaṁ taṁ ciya tuha tāva sāhēmi || 246 ||
kaṇagarahō sō sāhū aïppiō āsi tujjha annabhavē |
tattō ya dēvalōē vihuppahō nāma jō dēvō || 247 ||
sō ya ahaṁ tuha vallahamittō ajjavi tattha vasāmi divammi |
kāraṇamitthamimaṁ tu paḍucca mē aïsaṅgayaō si tumanti || 248 ||
aha bhaṇaï cittavēgō suravara! maha kahasu kēṇa kajjēṇa |
taïyā maṇiṁ samappiya kattha gaō āsi turiyagaī? || 1 ||
tō bhaṇaï surō sundara! nisuṇasu ēyampi vajjarijjantaṁ |
ajja ahaṁ āṇattō sasippahēṇaṁ tu dēvēṇa || 2 ||
sō puvvavēriēṇaṁ diṭṭhō jhāṇammi saṇṭhiō tattha |
taṁ daṭṭhu kuviō sō kāhī aïgaruyaüvasaggaṁ || 4 ||
tā tassa rakkhaṇaṭṭhā sigdhaṁ vaccāhi tammi nayarammi |
tattō tahatti bhaṇiuṁ vēgēṇa samāgaō ahaṁ ihaïṁ |
ōhināṇēṇa maē nāyaṁ jaha ēsa sō hi vijjupahō |
ēvaṁ vicintiūṇaṁ tumha samīvammi āgaō ahayaṁ |
taïyā ya maṇī divvō samappiō jīvarakkhaṭṭhā || 9 ||
tattō ya gaō turiyaṁ ghaṇavāhaṇamuṇivarassa pāsammi |
diṭṭhō ya maē dēvō uvasaggaṁ tassa kuṇamāṇō || 10 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca maē rē! rē! tiyasāhama! kattha vaccasē iṇhiṁ |
pāviṭṭha! kattha vaccasi diṭṭhīmaggammi maha paḍiō? || 12 ||
ēvaṁ ca maē bhaṇiē bhavaṇavaī sō surō sasambhantō |
naṭṭhō sahasā tāva ya sukkajjhāṇē paviṭṭhassa || 13 ||
muṇiṇō mōhāvagamā uppannaṁ kēvalaṁ varaṁ nāṇaṁ |
sōuṁ dunduhisaddaṁ dēvā maṇuyā ya āgayā bahavē |
patthāvaṁ lahiūṇaṁ puṭṭhō sō kēvalī maē ēvaṁ |
bhayavaṁ! kiṁ avaraddhaṁ imassa dēvassa tumhēhiṁ || 16 ||
tō bhaṇaï muṇī nisuṇasu jaha vēraṁ āsi anna bhavē || 17 ||
pālēnti dēsaviraïṁ rajjadhuraṁ taha ya nīīē || 19 ||
vajjaraï natthi jīvō na ya savvannū na nēvvāṇaṁ || 20 ||
juvarannō paḍivayaṇaṁ jāhē na caēi kimpi sō dāuṁ |
jāō ya vilakkhō sō daḍhaṁ paüṭṭhō ya samarakēussa |
kaha ṇu mahāyaṇamajjhē ēēṇaṁ dharisiō ahayaṁ? || 23 ||
na ya kēṇaï puvvamahaṁ parāiō vāiṇā ihaṁ lōē |
pāvēṇa imēṇa puṇō sabhāē majjhammi kaha vijiō? || 25 ||
tā rayaṇīē bhavaṇē imassa gantūṇa gahiyakaravālō |
chindāmi uttimaṅgaṁ jēṇa maṇaṁ nivvuiṁ lahaï || 26 ||
purisēhiṁ tattha diṭṭhō vaccōharasaṇṭhiō sa duṭṭhamaī |
āyaḍḍhantō khaggaṁ gahiō baddhō ya sahasatti || 30 ||
juvarannā nāō sō nāhiyavāī sa ēsa kavilotti |
nūṇaṁ vāyammi jiō majjha vahaṭṭhā iha paviṭṭhō || 31 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ kumarēṇa taō jīvantō tāva iṇhi mukkō si |
mōttūṇa majjha dēsaṁ ṭhāēyavvaṁ tumē pāva! || 33 ||
iya bhaṇiō sō naṭṭhō gantūṇaṁ tāhi dūradēsammi |
aha annayā ya paümō puttaṁ ahisiñciūṇa rajjammi |
dōnnivi guruṇā sahiyā viharantā bahuvihēsu dēsēsu |
satthēṇa samaṁ caliyā rayaṇapuraṁ nāma varanayaraṁ || 36 ||
satthāō kahavi bhaṭṭhā dōnnivi aḍavīē mōhiyā muṇiṇō |
diṭṭhā ya pariyaḍantā kavilēṇaṁ kahavi paccabhinnāyā |
kuddhō ya daḍhaṁ ēsō daṭṭhūṇa muṇiṁ samarakēuṁ || 38 ||
cintēi tāhē kavilō imēṇa vāēvi nijjiō ahayaṁ |
nivvisaō āṇattō taïyā ya imēṇa pāvēṇa || 39 ||
tā kavaḍēṇaṁ kēṇavi vaïrassantaṁ karēmi iṇhimpi |
iya cintiūṇa vandaï tē muṇiṇō paramaviṇaēṇa || 40 ||
nīyā ya nijē gēhē visamīsaṁ bhattapāṇayaṁ dinnaṁ |
bhaṇiyā ya viṇayapuvvaṁ bhayavaṁ! ētthēva bhuñjēha || 41 ||
ēvaṁ bhaṇiyā tēṇaṁ suhabhāvā vīsamittu khaṇamēgaṁ |
cintēi taō kavilō hanta visēṇaṁ na kiṁ mayā ēē |
tā rayaṇīi avassaṁ mārēyavvō maē imō muṇḍō |
jīvantammi imammi natthi mamaṁ jēṇa santōsō || 46 ||
pattāē rayaṇīē sajjhāyaṁ kaṭṭu sāhuṇō suttā |
āyaḍ̣dhiūṇaṁ khaggaṁ jāva pahāraṁ karēi sāhussa |
ruṭṭhāē dēvayāē pahaō sō tēṇa khaggēṇa || 48 ||
tattō ya paümajīvō sāgaramēgaṁ tu āuyaṁ tattha |
candajjuṇē vimāṇē sasippahō nāma sō surō jāō |
dō cēva sāgarāiṁ sampunnaṁ āuyaṁ tassa || 53 ||
bhadda! vihuppaha! sampaï vimāṇasāmī u sō surō tumha |
abbhahiyaṁ aṇubhaviuṁ dēvabhavē aha cuō tattō || 55 ||
uppannō sō dēvō jāō ya kamēṇa dāraō tattō |
vaḍḍhantō ya kamēṇaṁ pattō aha jōvvaṇaṁ jaṇāṇandaṁ |
ahisiñciya taṁ rajjē jāō samaṇō piyā tassa || 58 ||
naravāhaṇaṁ tu puttaṁ rajjē ṭhaviūṇa pavvaïō || 59 ||
bhadda! vihuppaha! sō haṁ viharantō ajja iha purē pattō |
aha ēgarāiyāē ṭhiō ya paḍimāē aha ēttha || 60 ||
sōvi hu kavilō naraē aṇuhaviuṁ dāruṇaṁ mahaṁ dukkhaṁ |
kāūṇa ya bālatavaṁ bhavaṇavaī sō surō jāō || 62 ||
paramāhammiyadēvō uvaruddō nāma sō tahiṁ jāō |
sumarantō taṁ vaïraṁ samāgaō tēṇa maha vahaṭhṭhāē |
ēyaṁ vaïranimittaṁ samāsaō tuha maē siṭṭhaṁ || 64 ||
bhō cittavēga! tattō puṇaravi sō kēvalī maē puṭṭhō |
bhayavaṁ! kēttiyamāuṁ katthaṁ va maha hōjja uppattī? || 65 ||
kō va piyā maha hōhī bōhissaï kō jiṇindadhammammi? |
ēvaṁ ca maē bhaṇiṁō bhayavaṁ! sō bhaṇiuṁmāḍhattō || 66 ||
jaṇaṇīi samaṁ tattha ya avahariō puvvavēriyasurēṇa |
ēntēṇa maha samīvē divvamaṇī jassa ̣dhōiō tumaē |
so cciya paramatthapiyā bhavissaï tammi jammammi || 70 ||
iya kēvaliṇā bhaṇiē tahatti bahu manniūṇa tavvayaṇaṁ |
ti payakkhiṇiūṇa puṇō 'bhivandiō sō maē bhayavaṁ || 72 ||
tattō uppaïūṇaṁ samāgaō ēttha tuha samīvammi |
jaṁ taṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ taṁ savvaṁ sāhiyaṁ ēyaṁ || 73 ||
bhō cittavēga! sampaï kāyavvaṁ jaṁ maē tamāisasu |
tō bhaṇaï cittavēgō suravara! nisuṇēsu maha vayaṇaṁ || 74 ||
nahavāhaṇēṇa nīyā jā sā maha bhāriyā sudukkhattā |
bhuyagōhavẹ̄dhiyassavi na tārisaṁ āsi majjha maṇadukkhaṁ |
sā kaha ciṭṭhaï sampaï na navatti majjha sāhēsu? |
īsiṁ hasiūṇa taō dēvō vajjaraï bhadda! nisuṇēsu |
sā tuha bhajjā nīyā gaṅgāvattammi ruyamāṇī || 78 ||
sō maha daïō tāvaya bhīsaṇabhuyagēhiṁ gahiyasavvaṅgō |
aha kahamavi jaï jīvaï tahavi hu maha tēṇa natthisañjōgō |
tā sampaï maha juttaṁ mariuṁ gurusōyadukkhataviyāē |
suviṇēvi nēva annō purisō maha laggaē aṅgē || 82 ||
iya mantiūṇa tīē aïuggavisaṁ tu bhakkhiyaṁ sahasā |
tadavatthaṁ taṁ daṭṭhuṁ hāhāsaddō samuṭṭhiō tattha |
nāūṇa visaviyāraṁ mantē tantē paüñjaī vivihē |
na ya tīē kōvi guṇō jāō visaghāriyāē bālāē |
savvāyaralaggēhivi tēhivi paüṇā na sakkiyā kāuṁ |
tāhē mayatti kāuṁ mayakiccaṁ tīē kāūṇa || 87 ||
ēttiyamēttaṁ sāhaï sō dēvō jāva cittavēgassa |
dhaṇadēva! tāva nisuṇasu jaṁ saṁvittaṁ tahiṁ taïyā || 89 ||
gahiuvva rakkhasēṇaṁ pahaō iva mōggarēṇa garuēṇa |
daṭhṭhūṇa cittavēgaṁ tadavatthaṁ tāhē tēṇa dēvēṇa |
vihiō ya maē pavaṇō sukōmalō niyayaüttarīēṇa |
tāva ya surēṇa bhaṇiō mahilāmēttasya kāraṇē kīsa |
nahu harisō sañjōgē nēvaṁ visāōvi iṭṭhavirahammi |
kiñca | puvvabhavē jō tumaē aṇurāgō nēva ujjhiō taïyā |
riddhibalatēyahīṇō āsi tumaṁ taha ya ēttha jammammi |
tahavi hu ajjavi rāgaṁ tīē uvariṁ na muñcasē kīsa? |
aha bhaṇaï cittavēgō suravara! maha phuraï dāhiṇaṁ nayaṇaṁ |
pahasiyamuhō ya dīsasi tumanti tā kahasu paramarttha || 104 ||
kiṁ jīvaï sā bālā saccaṁ ciya ahava sā mayā varaī? |
jaï tāva tumaṁ mittō āsi mahaṁ annajammammi || 105 ||
daṁsijjaü sā sigghaṁ aha navi tā majjha jīviyaṁ natthi |
lajjāmi bahu bhaṇantō ēsō ciya nicchaō majjha || 106 ||
īsiṁ hasiūṇa taō dēvō vajjaraï bhadda! jaï ēvaṁ |
tā piṭṭhaō nirūvasu jēṇa tayaṁ pēcchasē daïyaṁ || 107 ||
ēvaṁ surēṇa bhaṇiō valiyaggīvaṁ nirūvaī jāva |
tāva ya vihūsiyaṅgī pēcchaï niyabhāriyaṁ sahasā || 108 ||
taṁ daṭṭhu cittavēgō sasaṅkiō niyamaṇammi vajjaraï |
suravara! sāhasu saccaṁ hāsaṁ mōttūṇa maha iṇhiṁ || 109 ||
kiṁvā sacciya ēsā nahavāhaṇaavahiyā mahaṁ daïyā |
maha āsāsaṇahēuṁ suramāyā aha tumē vihiyā? || 110 ||
jaï tāva visaṁ bhakkhiya maha virahē sā mayā sudukkhattā |
tā kaha iha jīvantī sampattā akkhayasarīrī? || 111 ||
tattō ya bhaṇaï dēvō sacciya ēsā, na hōi suramāyā |
avahariya sā maē ihāṇiyā tahaya nisuṇēsu || 112 ||
ōhinnāṇēṇa maē diṭṭhā tuha bhāriyā ēsā || 113 ||
kayamaraṇajjhavasāṇā tattō ya maē vicintiyaṁ ēyaṁ |
iya cintiya pattō haṁ gaṅgāvattammi tammi nayarammi |
visavēyavihuriyaṅgī diṭṭhā ya maē imā tattha || 115 ||
hantūṇa mantasattiṁ savvēsiṁ thambhiyaṁ maē u visaṁ |
tattō mayatti kaliuṁ mayakiccaṁ tīē kāūṇaṁ || 116 ||
tāhē avahariya visaṁ dhēttūṇa imaṁ samāgaō ihaï |
tujjha samīvē tāva ya ēsa vigappō mahaṁ jāō || 118 ||
sōuṁ imīi maraṇaṁ kiṁ mannē ēsa kuṇaï maha mittō |
kiṁ daḍharāgō ajjavi ahavāvi hu payaṇurāgotti || 119 ||
iya cintiūṇa ēsā addissā suyaṇu! tuha maē vihiyā |
nāūṇa nicchayaṁ tē iṇhiṁ puṇa payaḍiyā bhadda! || 120 ||
tā mā kuṇa āsaṅkaṁ sacciya ēsā u kaṇagamālatti |
iya bhaṇiē sō khayarō pahasiyavayaṇō daḍhaṁ jāō || 121 ||
aha paṇamiya taṁ dēvaṁ kayañjalī bhaṇaï cittavēgō sō |
aïnēhō dakkhinnaṁ ahō ṇu tē mittavacchallaṁ || 122 ||
tumaē dinnaṁ jīyaṁ maṇasantāvō tumē ya nivvaviō |
āulamaṇassa puvviṁ tumaē jaṁ kiñci majjha uvaïṭṭhaṁ |
savvaṁ bhariyaghaḍassava taṁ maha pāsēṇa bōlīṇaṁ || 125 ||
tujjha pabhāvā suravara! jāō haṁ satthamāṇasō iṇhiṁ |
kāyavvaṁ jaṁ kiñcivi sampaï āisasu taṁ savvaṁ || 126 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dēvēṇa taō havaï hu dēvāṇa daṁsaṇamamōhaṁ |
tō bhaṇasu bhadda! kiñciṁvi jēṇa tayaṁ tuha payacchāmi || 127 ||
tō bhaṇaï cittavēgō jaï ēvaṁ dēsu majjha taṁ kiñci |
nahavāhaṇakhayarō jaha na sakkaē maṁ parābhaviuṁ || 128 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dēvēṇa taō mahilāsahiyassa pahariō jaṁ sō |
tā sampaï asamatthō bhadda! tumaṁ sō parābhaviṁu || 130 ||
iya taïyā kēvaliṇā bhāvibhavaṁ majjha sāhayantēṇa |
sāmiṁ karēmi sampaï tumanti, kiṁ ēttha annēṇa? || 133 ||
majjha pabhāvāō tuha savvāō cēva khayaravijjāō |
hōhinti viṇayapaṇayā majjha pabhāvāō tuha bhadda! || 136 ||
ēvaṁ surēṇa bhaṇiō payajuyalaṁ paṇamiūṇa sē khayarō |
bahumāṇajuyaṁ tattō ābhāsittā mamaṁ tu sō khayarō |
dēvēṇa tēṇa sahiō saha mahilāē nahammi uppaïō |
tā bhō dhaṇadēva! maē ēēṇa kamēṇa pāviō ēsa |
tā dhaṇadēva! mahāyasa! gēṇhasu ēyaṁ tumaṁ maṇiṁ divvaṁ |
ēyaṁ nisamma vayaṇaṁ kusalō bhaṇiīsu bhaṇaï dhaṇadēvō |
bhō rāyasuya! jamēyaṁ tumaē saha daṁsaṇaṁ majjha || 145 ||
jaṁ ca imaṁ accataṁ vayaṇaṁ sabbhāvagabbhiṇaṁ bhadda! |
aha bhaṇaï suppaïṭṭhō nisamma dhaṇadēvabhāsiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
atthi ya ēyaṁ dhaṇadēva! kintu ahayampi ēyammi || 147 ||
tā bhō maha dhiihēuṁ kijjaü maṇigahaṇamaviyappaṁ || 148 ||
nāuṁ aïnibandhaṁ gahiō viṇiēṇa sō maṇī pavarō |
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ hōu avigdhēṇa tāva samaō sō |
ēvaṁ kayasambhāsō rayaṇiṁ gamiūṇa tassa gēhammi |
tavvēlasamuciyaṁ sō kāyavvaṁ kāuṁ niggaō tattō |
kahakahavi niyattēuṁ sasōyavayaṇaṁ tu pallīnāṁhaṁ taṁ |
sampattō naravāhaṇarannā bahu manniō taō tēṇa |
uttaraï ya païdiyahaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ taha ghēppaē ya paḍibhaṇḍaṁ |
ēvaṁ ca kaïvi māsā vōlīṇā tattha nayarammi || 158 ||
aha annayā ya nīō niyayagihē bhōyaṇassa kajjēṇa |
tattha ya gaēṇa diṭṭhā sirikantā pavararūvasampannā |
aha cintaï dhaṇadēvō tīē rūvēṇa akkhittō || 163 ||
jaï tāva imā kannā, dēnti ya jaï mē vimaggiyā ēē |
tā hōjja maha kayatthō daïyāē imāē maṇuyabhavō || 164 ||
kaha hōjja majjha ēsā maggāmi sayampi ahava annēṇa |
jaï dāhinti na majjhaṁ vimaggiyā, hōjja lahuyattaṁ || 165 ||
ahavā samāṇajāī dhaṇavantō vasaṇavajjiō taha ya |
ēsāvi jōvvaṇatthā tamhā dāhinti maha ēē || 166 ||
ēvaṁ vicintayantō kāūṇaṁ bhōyaṇaṁ tu dhaṇadēvō |
ēttō ya mayaṇavasagā sirikantā raṇaraṇēṇa abhibhūyā |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ sirimaïṇā sāgarasēṭṭhī tahēva siridattō |
dhārēnti dhāraṇāō kēvi hu kannammi dinti sē jāvaṁ |
kaluṇaṁ vilavaï jaṇaṇī sandhīraï sē piyā ēvaṁ || 176 ||
sundari! mā kuṇa sōyaṁ ēyaṁ nēmittiyaṁ tayaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
avisaṁvāī jaṁ sō sumaī nēmittiō tahā suyaṇu! |
ēvaṁ ca vaṭṭamāṇē jāhē na caïnti tattha gāruḍiyā |
tattō tīē visannō savvōvi hu pariyaṇō piyā bhāyā |
cintēnti ya kiṁ hōhī aliyaṁ nēmittiyāiṭṭhaṁ? || 180 ||
puṇaravi ya tammi nayarē ḍiṇḍimasaddēṇa savvagāruḍiyā |
vāhariyā na ya kēṇavi uṭṭhaviyā sappadaṭṭhā sā || 181 ||
dhaṇadēvō aha pēcchaï samāulaṁ pariyaṇaṁ savvaṁ || 182 ||
aha daṭṭhuṁ siridattaṁ pucchaï kiṁ mitta! āulā tubbhē? |
dīsaha viddāṇamuhā, aha siridattō imaṁ bhaṇaï || 183 ||
sirikantā maha bhagiṇī kannā sappēṇa ajja daṭṭhatti |
na u jīvāvaï kōvi hu tēṇamhē āulā mitta! || 184 ||
nēmittiēṇa puvvaṁ āiṭṭhaṁ āsi sappaḍasiyaṁ jō |
ujjīvissaï ēyaṁ hōhī ēyāē sō bhattā || 185 ||
ēyaṁ ca tassa vayaṇaṁ aliyappāyaṁ tu sampaïṁ jāyaṁ |
jaṁ sā ahiṇā ḍakkā na ya kōvi hu taṁ samuṭṭhavaï || 186 ||
dhaṇadēva! taō amhaṁ sampaï tuṭṭā ō jīviyavvāsā |
iya sōuṁ dhaṇadēvō saharisacittō samullavaï ēvaṁ |
mā kuṇa sōyaṁ sundara! na hōi aliyaṁ tayaṁ vayaṇaṁ || 188 ||
dē! picchāmō tāva ya tuha bhagiṇiṁ, tēṇa ēvamullaviē |
nīō tīē samīvē dhaṇadēvō bhaṇaï niyapurisaṁ || 189 ||
taṁ supaïṭṭhadinnaṁ āṇēsu maṇinti tāhē sō purisō |
ghittuṁ lahu divvamaṇiṁ samāgaō tassa pāsammi || 190 ||
vimalasalilēṇa sittō divvamaṇī tāhē tēṇa nīrēṇa |
tīē taṁ dēhagayaṁ sappavisaṁ maṇijalēṇa saṁsittaṁ |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ siridattō sāgarasiṭṭhī ya harisiyā dōvi |
pisuṇanti tujjha ēsā dinnā dhaṇadēva! sirikantā || 193 ||
tattō sōhaṇalaggē pariṇīyā ucchavēṇa mahayā u |
tīē sō aṇurattō visayasuhaṁ bhuñjaē tattha || 194 ||
jā tattha kaïvi māsē ciṭṭhaï sō tīē jōvvaṇāsattō |
tāva ya savvaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ vikkīyaṁ tassa purisēhiṁ || 195 ||
paḍibhaṇḍaṁ pihu gahiyaṁ saṁvụ̄dhā sayalasatthiyā tāhē |
taïyā pallīvaïṇā bhaṇiō u ahaṁ avassamēntēṇa |
āgantavvaṁ tumaē maha dhiihēunti tā iṇhiṁ || 200 ||
āsannā sā vaṭṭaï pallī tā sigghamēva gacchāmi |
sampattō aha pēcchaï sīhaguhaṁ savvaō daḍḍhaṁ || 202 ||
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ dhaṇadēvō ēvaṁ vajjaraï hā! kimēyanti |
aïvisamāvi hu pallī kēṇa imā handi! daḍḍhatti? || 207 ||
dhaṇadēva! ēhī ēttō ahayaṁ sō dēvasammotti || 208 ||
taṁ sōuṁ dhaṇadēvō purisaṁ paṭṭhaviya pāṇiyanimittaṁ |
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ sāhasu bhō! kēṇa vilasiyaṁ ēyaṁ |
sō kattha suppaïṭṭhō aha sō saṇiyaṁ samullavaï || 211 ||
ēttō taïyammi diṇē siddhapurāō samāgaō purisō |
ēgantammi ya siṭṭhaṁ tēṇa imaṁ pallināhassa || 212 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa, ēyaṁ sāhējjasu suppaïṭṭhassa || 213 ||
rajjasirīē ajōgō, taṁ cēva ya kumara! jōgō si || 216 ||
ēvaṁ ca jāva sāhaï sō purisō bhadda! pallināhassa |
sahasacciya sampattō samantaō vẹ̄dhiyā imā pallī |
nihayā bahavō bhillā vijiyā amhē parabalēṇaṁ || 220 ||
gahiūṇa taō sāraṁ savvaṁ ḍahiūṇa sīhaguhamēyaṁ |
ahayampi hu jujjhantō ēyamavatthantaraṁ ihaṁ pattō |
dhaṇadēva! nēva jāṇē kiṁ jāyaṁ suppaïṭṭhassa || 222 ||
ētthantarammi purisō salilaṁ dhittūṇa āgaō tattha |
dhaṇadēvō bhaṇaï taō piyasu jalaṁ dēvasamma! imaṁ || 224 ||
dhaṇadēvōvi hu aïgurusōgō ḍahiūṇa tassa taṁ dēhaṁ |
na ya katthaï uvaladdhaṁ karaṅkamēttampi pallināhassa |
tattō cintaï ēsō hā! dhī! vihiṇō vilasiyassa || 227 ||
nigghiṇakaṇagavaīē hā! hā! kaha dāruṇaṁ vihiyaṁ? || 228 ||
na ya najjaï kiṁ jāyaṁ mahāṇubhāvassa suppaïṭṭhassa |
kiṁ jīvaï ahava maō saṅgāmē ēttha jujjhantō? || 230 ||
ēmāi cintayantō dhaṇadēvō āgaō nijē satthē |
tuṭṭhāō jaṇaṇijaṇayā savvē āṇandiyā vayaṁsā sē |
bhaṇaï ya vayaṁsi! ukkaṇṭhiyāē diṭṭhā pabhūyakālāō |
aïsōhaṇaṁ hi jāyaṁ jaṁ sāsurayampi tuhavi ēttha || 235 ||
jaṁ tumaē diṭṭhāē diṭṭhaṁ mannāmi piiharaṁ savvaṁ |
iya bhaṇiuṁ dēvīē uciyapavittī kayā tīē || 236 ||
uvaviṭṭhāō dōnnivi kusalapavittī ya sāhiyā savvā |
gacchāmi iṇhi gēhē tattō kamalāvaī imaṁ bhaṇaï |
païdiyahaṁ aï! tumaē āgantavvaṁ maha samīvē || 238 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ sirikantāē ēvaṁ kāhāmi ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇaṁ |
aha annayā kayāivi riuṇhāyā bhattuṇā samaṁ suttā |
aha bhaṇaï maē piyayama! sumiṇē candō muhēṇa pavisantō |
diṭṭhō, taṁ daṭhṭhūṇaṁ sahasā buddhā taō ahayaṁ || 243 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ sundari! puttō bhavissaē tujjha |
bhaṇiyaṁ sirikantāē ēvaṁ piya! hōu vayaṇayaṁ saccaṁ |
tīē ciya rayaṇīē tīē kucchiṁsi gabbhasambhūī |
jātā kamēṇa jāva ya bōlīṇā dōnni māsā sē || 246 ||
taïyammi puṇō māsē dōhalaō tīē abhayadāṇammi |
jāō dhaṇadēvēṇavi siṭṭhē sō pūriō tīē || 247 ||
aha uvaciyagabbhā pūriē dōhalammī pasavaṇasamayammī āgayammī suhēṇa |
suhagahanivahammī uccaṭhāṇaṭṭhiyammī suhakaraṇamuhuttē dārayaṁ sā pasūyā || 248 ||
hasiūṁ rannā bhaṇiyaṁ na hōi kiṁ sēṭṭhiṇō imaṁ gēhaṁ? |
tahavi hu sēṭṭhī jaṁ bhaṇaï kiñci taṁ cēva amha kāyavvaṁ |
uvaviṭṭhō dēvijuō tattō ya vilāsiṇīhiṁ pavarāhiṁ |
viṇaya naēṇaṁ tattō dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ imaṁ tu vinnattō |
kāraṇavasēṇa kēṇavi sañjāyaṁ nēva taṁ majjha || 19 ||
tā dēvidaṁsaṇēṇaṁ ihēva kila piuharanti mannāmi |
tā jaï ittiyabhūmiṁ āgacchaï hōi tā laṭṭhaṁ || 20 ||
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bhaṇiē aha dēvī rāiṇā aṇuṇṇāyā |
pūiya bhaṇiyā dēvī suyassa nāmaṁ karēsutti || 22 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dēvīē taō siṭṭhiṇi! tuha cēva hōi uciyamiṇaṁ |
sirikantāē jaṇiō dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ tu bālaō ēsō |
aïsōhaṇaṁ hi nāmaṁ vihiyaṁ dēvīi iya bhaṇantēṇa |
dhannā majjha vayaṁsī jīē suō ērisō samuppannō |
jaṇamaṇanayaṇāṇandō maha puṇa ēyampi na hu jāyaṁ || 28 ||
kiṁ majjha jīviēṇaṁ kiṁvā maha vihalagavvarajjēṇa |
jā niyataṇayassa muhaṁ picchāmi na mandabhaggatti || 29 ||
tattha ya taṁ cintantī suyajammukkaṇṭhiyā sasōillā |
mattā va mucchiyā iva suttavva mayavva vigayasattavva |
rannā kayāi diṭṭhā puṭhṭhā kamalāvaī tāhē || 33 ||
dēvi! tumaṁ kiṁ vimaṇā dubbaladēhā ya dīsasē iṇhiṁ |
kiṁ vachiyaṁ na pujjaï sāhīṇē kiṅkarammi maē || 34 ||
piyayama! tuha ppasāyā sampajjaï vañchiyaṁ savvaṁ || 35 ||
taṁ natthi kimpi sōkkhaṁ tuha ppasāyāu jaṁ na mē pattaṁ |
dhannāu tāu nārīō ittha jāō ahō nisiṁ nāha! |
niyaya thaṇaṁ dhayantaṁ thaṇandhayaṁ handi! picchanti || 37 ||
tumaē mannāyāē na puṇō maha mandabhāgāē || 38 ||
tā dēva! dēsu puttaṁ aha navi tā natthi jīviyaṁ majjha |
tuṭṭaï thaṇōvi aha ēi khīramannā gaī natthi || 39 ||
tattō rannā bhaṇiyaṁ ētthatthē kuṇasu dēvi! mā sōgaṁ |
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ rāyā kāuṁ pūyaṁ jiṇindapaḍimāṇaṁ |
dēvō va dāṇavō vā jiṇasāsaṇabhattisañjuō kōvi |
jaha saṁnihiō siggha āgacchaü vañchiyaṁ dēu || 43 ||
niccaladēhō ciṭṭhaï rāyā jā tinni diyahāiṁ || 44 ||
nimisanti lōyaṇāiṁ tā kiṁ ēsō na hōi dēvotti |
na ya maṇuyāṇa sarīrē jāyaï ēvaṁvihā dittī || 46 ||
tā hōjja imō kō puṇa caraṇāvi mahiṁ phusanti nēyassa |
bhō amarakēunaravara! uggatavēṇaṁ kilāmiō si na kiṁ? |
ēvaṁ bhaṇamāṇō sō abbhuṭṭhiya rāiṇā bhaṇiō || 48 ||
kō si tumaṁ kattō vā samāgaō kahasu maha mahābhāga!? |
bhaṇiyaṁ surēṇa naravara! kahēmi kōūhalaṁ jaï tē || 49 ||
tattha maē sō bhayavaṁ āpuṭṭhō niyayavuttantaṁ || 51 ||
uppattī kattha mahaṁ cuyassa ēttō bhavissaē bhayavaṁ!? |
tattō jiṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ bharahammi ya hatthiṇapurammi || 52 ||
jō acchaï puttatthī pōsahasālāi pōsahammi ṭhiō |
tavvayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ samāgaō rāya! tuha samīvammi |
tā mā kuṇasu kilēsaṁ ahayaṁ hōhāmi tuha puttō || 54 ||
gēṇhasu kuṇḍalajuyalaṁ narinda! ēyaṁ taō u dēvīē |
jīē icchasi puttaṁ dāyavvaṁ tīi ābharaṇaṁ || 55 ||
iya bhaṇiuṁ kannāṇaṁ uttāriya kuṇḍalāiṁ divvāiṁ |
aha annayā ya dēvī riuṇhāyā rayaṇicarimajāmammi |
bhaṇiyā rannā sundari! kīsa akamhāō kampiyā taṁ si |
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ piyayama! sampaï sumiṇaṁ maē diṭṭhaṁ || 60 ||
kila kaṇagamaō kalasō majjha muhē pavisiuṁ viṇikkhantō |
kēṇāvi bhañjaṇatthaṁ nīō dūraṁ sa kuddhēṇa || 61 ||
puṇaravi bahukālāō kahavi hu laddhō sa khīrapaḍipunnō |
ēyaṁ sumiṇaṁ daṭṭhuṁ muhakaḍuyaṁ pariṇaīi sundarayaṁ |
jāō bhaēṇa kampō maha dēhē tēṇa naranāha! || 63 ||
taṁ sōūṇa narindō jāō sōgāurō daḍhaṁ hiyaē |
vajjaraï dēvi! suviṇaṁ lābhaṁ sūēi taṇayassa || 64 ||
sāhissaṁ mā kāhisi uvvēgaṁ kiñci hiyayammi || 65 ||
dhaṇadēvōvi hu rannō āsannō cēva uvaviṭṭhō || 68 ||
sammaṁ viṇicchiūṇaṁ suviṇasarūvaṁ kahēha bhō! tattaṁ |
iya bhaṇiyā tē rannā annōnnaṁ jāva cintinti || 70 ||
tāva ya dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ naranāha! dēsu avahāṇaṁ |
taō | aha aḍavīē diṭṭhō bhillavaī, tēṇa jaha ya sappēhiṁ |
jaha tēṇa niyayacariē siṭṭhē dēvassa āgamō āsi |
dēvēṇa kēvalī aha diṭṭhō ya kusagganayarammi || 73 ||
jaha bhāvibhavaṁ puṭṭhō kēvaliṇā jaha ya tassa āiṭṭhaṁ |
jaṇaṇīi samaṁ tattha ya avahariō puvvavēriyasurēṇa |
tā dēva! dēviudarē vihuppahō sō surō samuppannō |
hōhī, jaō na kēvalivayaṇaṁ iha annahā hōi || 77 ||
ēsō naridaṁ! suviṇayaparamatthō phuraï maha hiyaē || 79 ||
ēyaṁ dhaṇadēvassa ō vayaṇaṁ sōūṇa suviṇayannūhiṁ |
bhaṇiyaṁ ahō! aüvvaṁ ēyassa u buddhikōsallaṁ || 80 ||
susiliṭṭhō naṇu atthō nirūviō rāya! vaṇiyaüttēṇa |
iya bhaṇiē tē rannā tambōlapayāṇapuvvayaṁ savvē |
tattō rannā bhaṇiyaṁ iṇhiṁ dhaṇadēva! kimiha kāyavvaṁ |
kiṁ ēttha atthi kōvi hu paḍighāyavihī suduṭṭhasuviṇassa |
bhaṇiyaṁ dhaṇadēvēṇaṁ na annahā kēvaligirā ō || 85 ||
tahavi hu ēsa uvāō kīraï mā hōjja tēṇa paḍighāō |
pallīvaïṇā taïyā divvamaṇī jō samappiō majjha |
tā ēyaṁ dēvīē karaṭṭhiyaṁ dēva! kārēha || 88 ||
puvvaviruddhōvi surō haraṇē dēvīi hōjja asamatthō |
ēyassa pabhāvāō, aha kahavi karijja avaharaṇaṁ || 89 ||
tahavi hu avagārammī sakkissaï nēva vaṭṭiuṁ vaïrī |
nāuṁ imaṁ narēsara! mā sōgaṁ kiñcivi karēha || 90 ||
ēvaṁ kayammi naravara! savvampi hu sundaraṁ hōhī || 92 ||
iya bhaṇiuṁ dhaṇadēvō samappiuṁ aṅgulīyayaṁ niyayaṁ |
siṭṭhō samappiyaṁ taha dēvīē aṅgulīyaṁ taṁ || 94 ||
bhaṇiyā ya dēvī! ēyaṁ khaṇampi hatthāō nēva mōttavvaṁ |
aha sattamammi māsē jāō dēvīē dōhalaō || 97 ||
lajjāē taṁ kassavi jāhē na kahēi tāva kaïyāvi |
dēvi! tuha kiṁ na pujjaï dīsasi aïdubbalā jaō iṇhiṁ |
dēvīē tō bhaṇiyaṁ dōhalaō ēsa mē nāha! || 99 ||
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ sundari! kīraï ahuṇā duyaṁ ēyaṁ || 101 ||
tatthārụ̄dhō rāyā dēvī uṇa tassa ucchaṅgē || 102 ||
aha puravarāu bāhiṁ nīhariō kuñjarō kamasō || 106 ||
rē! lēha lēha dhāvaha ēsa gaō ēsa jāi puraotti |
rāyāvi hu jāhi kahavi hu dhariuṁ na caēi karivaraṁ taṁ tu |
tāhē bhaṇiyā dēvī ēsa gaō tāva ummiṭṭhō || 109 ||
aïvēgaō payaṭṭō cāijjaï kahavi nō niyattēuṁ |
tā uttarimō kahavi hu iyaraha aḍavīē pāḍēhī || 110 ||
kamalāvaīē bhaṇiyaṁ ōyariyavvaṁ kahaṁ nu naranāha! |
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ nisuṇasu picchasi vaḍapāyavaṁ puraō || 111 ||
ēyassa ya hēṭṭhēṇaṁ jāhī hatthī taō tumē dēvi! |
ēvaṁ ca jāva rāyā dēviṁ ullavaï tāva sō hatthī |
dakkhattaṇaō rāyā jhatti vilaggō ya tassa sāhāē |
laggasu laggasu dēvi! jhatti ēyaṁ bhaṇēmāṇō || 114 ||
aïvēgaō karissā ( ssa? ) adakkhayāē ya itthibhāvassa |
kayaajjhavasāyāvi hu na sakkiyā jāhi tattha laggēuṁ |
tāhē ya karivarō sō jhaḍatti tattō avakkantō || 116 ||
aha gurusōgō rāyā tahaṭṭhiō jā taō palōēi |
tā picchaï gayaṇēṇaṁ jantaṁ vēgēṇa taṁ kariṇaṁ || 117 ||
aha vimhiō maṇēṇaṁ cintaï rāyā ahō! mahacchariyaṁ |
puvvaviruddhasurō sō vilasaï nūṇaṁ imēṇa rūvēṇa |
na hu kēvaliṇā bhaṇiyā bhāvā iha annahā honti || 119 ||
paricattarajjacittō ciṭṭhaï jā kaïvi tattha divasāṇi |
aha rannā āpuṭṭhō samarappiō kahasu bhadda! vuttataṁ |
kiṁ diṭṭhō duṭṭhakarī dēvīvi vimōiyā tattō? || 125 ||
dīhaṁ nīsasiūṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ samarappiēṇa suṇa dēva! |
tattha ya bahuppayāraṁ gavēsamāṇēhiṁ dēva! amhēhiṁ |
diṭṭhō na sō karivarō nēva ya dēvī na ya paüttī || 127 ||
viyaratō saratīrē, iya tassa ō vayaṇayaṁ suṇēūṇa |
bhaṇiyaṁ daṁsasu bhaddaya! taṁ sigghaṁ saravaraṁ amha || 131 ||
aha tēṇa daṁsiyaṁ taṁ palōiyaṁ saravaraṁ samaṁ tēṇa |
na ya uvaladdhā dēvī niuṇampi gavēsamāṇēhiṁ || 132 ||
tā kiṁ tatthēva sarē gabhīranīrammi uvarayā dēvī |
aha tattō uttariuṁ pattā u kahimpi vasimammi? || 134 ||
ahavā sāvayapaürē vaṇammi kēṇavi viṇasiyā hōjja |
na ya jāṇāmō kiñcivi narinda! dēvīē vuttantaṁ || 135 ||
ēvaṁ ca jāva jampaï samarappiō patthivassa sē puraō |
bhaṇiyaṁ rannā kiṁ bhō! sō ēsō sumaïnēmittī? || 137 ||
jassāēsāu tayā dinnā naravāhaṇēṇa maha dēvī? |
pāsaṭṭhiēhiṁ siṭṭhaṁ, narinda! ēvanti, aha rannā || 138 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ pavisaü sigdhaṁ pucchāmō jēṇa dēvivuttantaṁ |
āpuṭṭhō, kiṁ dēvī jīvaï va navatti vajjarasu? || 140 ||
uvaōgaṁ dāūṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ aha sumaïṇā jiyaïti |
kaïyā samāgamō maha tīē, kiṁ vā havējja sē gabbhē? |
iya puṭṭhō naravaïṇā kayaüvaōgō puṇō bhaṇaï || 142 ||
jaïyā narinda! suviṇē giṇhasi visamaṭṭhiyaṁ kusumamālaṁ |
tattō ya māsamittē samāgamō tumha dēvīē || 143 ||
hōhī taṇaō tīē vijujjihī kintu jāyamēttō sō |
niyamāūē, naravara! ēvaṁ kila kahaï hu nimittaṁ || 144 ||
puṭṭhō puṇaravi rannā jaṇaṇiviuttō sa jīvihī kiṁ nō? |
katthavi vuḍ̣dhi jāhī, kaïyā va samāgamē tēṇa || 145 ||
aha sumaī bhaṇaï puṇō bahukālaṁ jīvihī sa tē puttō |
kattha ya vuḍ̣dhiṁ jāhī ēyaṁ puṇa nēva jāṇāmō || 146 ||
tattō ya sigghamēva hi samāgamō tumha taṇaēṇa || 147 ||
tavvayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ gayasōgō pahasiō bhaṇaï rāyā |
bhō! bhō! suvannalakkhaṁ sigghaṁ sumaïssa dēhasi || 148 ||
nīhariō rāyāvi hu maṇayaṁ jāō vigayasōgō || 150 ||
aha annayā ya rāyā suttō rayaṇīi pēcchaē sumiṇaṁ |
paḍiyā addhamilāṇā dhavalā kusumāṇa māliyā diṭṭhā |
daṭhṭhūṇamiṇaṁ sumiṇaṁ paḍibuddhō cintaē imaṁ rāyā |
ēyaṁ hi sumaïbhaṇiyaṁ diṭṭhaṁ sumiṇaṁ maē ajja || 153 ||
tā hōhī lahu iṇhiṁ majjha vayantassa uttaradisāē |
kahavi hu pamāyavasaō paḍiyā rannō camarahārī || 157 ||
aha rannā āṇattō purisō rajjuppaōgaō tattha |
ōinnō santamasē iō taō jāva gavisēi || 158 ||
tā ēgatthaniluṅkkaṁ picchaï juvaïṁ taḍīi agaḍassa |
kāsi tumaṁ iha sundari! ii puṭṭhā jā na dēi paḍivayaṇaṁ |
sampattā tēṇa taō ghittūṇaṁ tayaṁ kamēṇa nīhariō |
vajjaraï rāya! ētthaṁ annāvi hu acchaē juvaī || 161 ||
ābhaṭṭhāvi na bhāsaï bhaēṇa kampantataṇulayā varaī |
ēyaṁ nisamma rannō phuriyaṁ aha dāhiṇaṁ nayaṇaṁ || 162 ||
aha vimhiēṇa rannō vicintiyaṁ kiṁ havijja sā dēvī |
ahavā iha aḍavīē dēvīē sambhavō kattha? || 163 ||
ahavā kammavasāṇaṁ sattāṇaṁ navari ēttha saṁsārē |
bhaviyavvayāvasēṇaṁ natthi tayaṁ jaṁ na sambhavaī || 164 ||
jaï sā havijja dēvī tā sundaramēva, kāvi aha annā |
tahavi hu uttārijjaü karuṇāmūlō jaō dhammō || 165 ||
iya cintiuṇa rannā bhaṇiō purisō tayampi kaḍ̣dhēhi |
aha sō rajjūi puṇō purisō kūvammi ōinnō || 166 ||
bhaṇiyā ya suyaṇu! ahayaṁ rannō siriamarakēunāmassa |
jēṇuttārēmi lahuṁ ēyaṁ ca nisamma sā vayaṇaṁ || 168 ||
ārụ̄dhā mañcīē kamēṇa uttāriyā taō dēvī |
sāvi ya daṭṭhuṁ rāyaṁ rōvantī ghaggharēṇa saddēṇa |
nīyā niyayāvāsē dēviṁ daṭhṭhūṇa pariyaṇō savvō |
taïyā kariṇā nīyāē kiṁ tumē dēvi! aṇubhūyaṁ? || 172 ||
kaïyā va kahava paḍiyā bhīsaṇakūvammi ēttha aḍavīē? |
vaḍapāyavammi laggē dēvē taṁ vilaggiuṁ asattā haṁ |
aha sō girisariyāē visamataḍiṁ pāviūṇa sahasatti |
avahaï kōvi dēvō na jēṇa kariṇō vayanti nahē || 176 ||
iya vimhiyahiyayā haṁ puṇō puṇō jā mahiṁ palōēmi |
iya kaliuṁva sahāyā taruṇō vēgēṇa dhāvanti || 178 ||
avahatthiya tāhi bhayaṁ pahaō sō tēṇa kumbhayaḍē || 181 ||
aviya | maṇisañjuyakarapahaō vajjēṇiva tāḍiō gaïndō sō |
jā nivaḍaï vēgēṇa tāva ya hiṭṭhāmuhaṁ niyantīē |
aha tammi nīrapunnē aṇōrapārammi saravarē hatthī |
gayaṇāō nīsahaṅgō paḍiō buḍḍō ya jalamajjhē || 189 ||
maṇiṇō māhappēṇaṁ jalaüvariṁ cēva thakkā haṁ || 190 ||
tārisariddhijuyāvi hu khaṇēṇa ēgāgiṇī kahaṁ jāyā |
sō kattha bhiccavaggō sā ya sirī sō viṇīyaparivārō |
hōhāmi kahaṁ iṇhiṁ vihiyā ēgāgiṇī vihiṇā? || 193 ||
saraṇavihuṇā sōēṇaṁ tattha ahaṁ rōviuṁ laggā || 194 ||
ētthatarammi kēṇavi bhaṇiyā kiṁ suyaṇu! rōyasē karuṇaṁ? |
aha sō daṭṭhūṇa mamaṁ vimhiyahiyaüvva vēsarāhintō |
uttariya majjha calaṇēsu nivaḍiō bhaṇaï ēvaṁ tu || 197 ||
parijāṇasi bhagiṇi! mamaṁ siridattō haṁ kusagganayarāō |
satthēṇa samaṁ iṇhiṁ sampattō iha paēsammi || 199 ||
tā bhagiṇi! kēṇa vihiṇā jāyā ēgāgiṇī tumaṁ ēttha? |
iya bhaṇiyā tēṇa ahaṁ vigayabhayā jhatti sañjāyā || 200 ||
āsannaṁ khu kusaggaṁ kiṁ kāyavvaṁ tumē bhagiṇi!? || 202 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ kusagganayarammi vaccimō tāva |
aha tēṇa saharisēṇaṁ nīyā satthammi niyayaāvāsē |
sōvi hu satthō jāva ya lahuyapayāṇēhiṁ vayaï aṇudiyahaṁ |
avasaüṇēṇaṁ thakkō diyahē diyahē na jāyaē saüṇaṁ |
aha kalayalaṁ nisāmiya satthajaṇē tattha āulībhūē |
sajjhasabhariyā ahamavi paḍiyā aḍavīi jāva ikkallā |
khaṇamēgaṁ tatthacchiya vayāmi kila tammi satthaṭhāṇammi |
puṇaravi milāmi jēṇaṁ satthassa ahanti cintantī || 213 ||
jāva payaṭṭā gantuṁ tāva na jāṇāmi kattha gantavvaṁ |
kattō samāgayā haṁ kāē va disāē sō satthō || 214 ||
dūraṁ gantūṇa puṇō valiyā vaccāmi piṭṭhaōhuttaṁ |
aha bhayataralacchīē iō taō tattha paribhamantīē |
pahasamasụdhiyāi daḍhaṁ paē paē nīsahaṁ kaṇantīē |
jā pulaïyaṁ samantā tāva na dīsaï kahampi vasimanti |
aha taṁ aḍaviṁ suiraṁ palōyayantīi gāḍhatisiyāē |
kahakahavi hu sampattā tammi paēsammi kicchēṇa || 226 ||
pīyaṁ ca tattha salilaṁ uvaviṭṭhā taruvarassa hiṭṭhammi |
taō | phēkkāranti sivāō jaha jaha guñjanti sāvayā vivihaṁ |
taha taha bhaēṇa hiyayaṁ kampaē maha tattha rannammi || 228 ||
aha aḍḍharattasamaē jāyā udarammi dūsahā viyaṇā |
tavvasaō ya kaṇantī lulāmi bhūmīē jāva ahaṁ || 229 ||
tāva ya migīva rannē aïguru viyaṇāhi pīḍiyasarīrā |
mucchāviramē ya taō lulamāṇaṁ mahiyalammi taṁ bālaṁ |
kaṇṭhammi maē baddhaṁ suyassa ēvaṁ bhaṇantīē || 233 ||
ēyassa pabhāvāō mā maha taṇayassa kēvi aṅgammi |
vaṇavāsiṇīō! nisuṇaha bhō bhō vaṇadēvayāō! maha vayaṇaṁ |
jaï putta! imā rayaṇī hontā maha tammi hatthiṇapurammi |
kassa va na hōjja tōsō puttaya! tuha jammasamayammi || 238 ||
jāō si majjha puttaya! karēmi kiṁ mandabhaggā haṁ? || 239 ||
jāyammi tumē puttaya! rannampi hu sampayaṁ imaṁ vasimaṁ |
naṭṭhaṁ bhayaṁ asēsaṁ ucchaṅgagaē tumē vaccha || 240 ||
viyaṇāvigamāō tahiṁ samāgayā mē tahiṁ niddā || 242 ||
tattō khaṇantarāō paḍibuddhā jhatti mandabhaggā haṁ |
kēṇāvi hu ullaviyaṁ ēyaṁ saddaṁ suṇēūṇaṁ || 243 ||
niuṇaṁ jōyantēṇavi pabhūyakālāō pāva! diṭṭhō si |
ēyaṁ saddaṁ sōccā bhīyā, kō ēsa ēvamullavaï? |
iya cintiya jāva ahaṁ niyaücchaṅgaṁ palōēmi || 245 ||
tā natthi tattha puttō vicintiyaṁ tāhi hā! kimēyanti |
kiṁ kahavi hōjja paḍiō ahavā kēṇāvi avahariō? || 246 ||
kiṁvā sumiṇaṁ ēyaṁ kiṁvā maïvibbhamō mahaṁ ēsō? |
iō taō tattha gavēsayantī suyaṁ mahārāya! apāuṇantī |
sirammi vajjēṇava tāḍiyā haṁ ghasatti mucchāi vasaṁ gayatti || 248 ||
navaraṁ hayāsavihiṇā ēyaṁ maha annahā vihiyaṁ || 3 ||
kiṁ ajjavi na hu tuṭṭhō avahariō jēṇa maha puttō? || 4 ||
vaṇadēvayāō! tumhaṁ saraṇammi samāgayāē maha puttō |
hariō, tā kiṁ jujjaï ētthavi vēhā karēuṁ jē? || 5 ||
hā putta! kahamaraṇṇē mukkā haṁ saraṇavajjiyā tumaē |
nūṇaṁ niṭṭhurarūvaṁ saddaṁ sōūṇa jassa paḍibuddhā |
jassa pabhāvāō tayā sahasā gayaṇāō gayavarō paḍiō |
sōvi maṇī akayatthō jāō maha mandabhāgāē || 8 ||
jaṁ kaṇṭhanibaddhēvi hu tammī aṅkaṭṭhiōvi hā putta! |
aha addhapaharamēttē diyahē aïdukkhiyā ahaṁ tattha |
aïkaruṇaṁ kandantī iō taō jāva viyarāmi || 13 ||
daṭṭhuṁ mamaṁ ruyantiṁ vivihapalāvēhiṁ tattha vaṇagahaṇē |
mahuravayaṇēṇa tīē āpuṭṭhā suyaṇu! kīsa taṁ ruyasi |
kāuṁ tīi paṇāmaṁ tattō viyalantaaṁsuyāē maē |
aha tāvasīē bhaṇiyaṁ imassa jōgā na hōsi taṁ suyaṇu! |
tahavi hu kimittha kīraï sakammavasagammi jiyalōē? || 18 ||
sundari! kammavasāṇaṁ sattāṇaṁ iha bhavē vasantāṇaṁ |
ēvaṁvihadukkhāiṁ havanti jaṁ ēttha na hu cōjjaṁ || 19 ||
jaṁ kiñci asuhakammaṁ annabhavē sañciyaṁ tumē āsi |
tassa vivāgāō imaṁ samāgayaṁ suyaṇu! guruvasaṇaṁ || 20 ||
tā annabhavaviḍhattē dukkhammi samāgayammi kō sōgō? |
ēttō u samāsannē acchaï amhāṇa āsamō rammō |
āgaccha suyaṇu! aṇuciyamēyaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ jaō tujjha || 22 ||
vāyaï sīyalapavaṇō ēttha ō taṁ abhiṇavapasūyā si |
iya bhaṇiya tāvasīē nīyā haṁ āsamammi rammammi |
annammi diṇē nīyā tīē haṁ kulavaïsamīvē || 25 ||
vacchē! iha saṁsārē sulahāiṁ ērisāiṁ dukkhāiṁ |
jāyanti dūsahāiṁ jēṇaṁ ciya ēttha dusahadukkhāiṁ |
ēvaṁ bhaṇamāṇassa u kulavaïṇō tīi tāvasīi ahaṁ |
tō puccha icchiyatthaṁ bhaṇiyāē tāhi viṇayapaṇayāē |
puṭṭhō maē mahāyasa! kēṇa hiō nandaṇō majjha? || 30 ||
kiṁ jīvaï ahava maō pikkhissamahaṁ kayāivi navatti? |
aha bhaṇiyaṁ kulavaïṇā sammaṁ dāūṇa uvaōgaṁ || 31 ||
vacchē! ucchaṅgatthō tuha taṇaō avahiō u dēvēṇa |
aha kahavi vihivasēṇaṁ samāgaō tattha nahayarō ēkkō |
niyabhāriyāsamēṇō tēṇa ya puttotti sō gahiō || 34 ||
khayarassa tassa gēhē vuḍḍiṁ jāhī suhēṇa, tattō ya |
ēvaṁ ca tēṇa bhaṇiē paṇaṭṭhasōgā narinda! jāyā haṁ |
piya! kaïvayadivasāiṁ acchāmi tahiṁ tu āsamē jāva |
tā annadiṇē kulavaï mūlē dhammaṁ suṇintīē || 37 ||
kulavaïṇā sō puṭṭhō kō si tumaṁ āgaō kuō bhadda!? |
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kahēmi nisuṇēha bhayavaṁ! ti || 40 ||
siddhatthapurē rāyā suggīvō nāma āsi vikkhāō |
kaṇagavaī sē dēvī tīē suō surahanāmō haṁ || 41 ||
ahisittō avamanniya puttaṁ jiṭṭhaṁ tu suppaïṭṭhaṁ || 42 ||
aha annayā kayāivi khayavāhīē mayammi jaṇayammi |
tassa paē haṁ rāyā ahisittō mantivaggēṇa || 43 ||
kāūṇa ya saṅgāmaṁ ahiṭṭhiyaṁ appaṇā rajjaṁ || 45 ||
tassa bhaēṇa ahampi hu samāgaō puravarīē campāē |
tēṇavi niyadēsantē dinnaṁ gāmāṇa sahassayaṁ ēgaṁ |
tattha ya jaṇaṇīsahiō bhayavaṁ! acchāmi ahayanti || 47 ||
maha purisēhiṁ viluttō pattaṁ vittaṁ tahiṁ paüraṁ || 48 ||
annaṁ ca tattha pattā tukkhāraturaṅgamā bahuvihīyā |
bāhiṁ nīhariō haṁ kamēṇa turagē ō jāva vāhēmi |
aviya | jaha jaha ōkkhañcijjaï taha taha vēgaṁ pagiṇhamāṇēṇa |
ēvaṁ ca jāva sāhaï sō surahō kulavaïssa vuttanta |
turayamaṇumaggalaggaṁ tāva ya sinnapi sē pattaṁ || 52 ||
aha bhaṇiyaṁ surahēṇaṁ bhayavaṁ! vaccāmi niyayaṭhāṇammi |
jaṁ kiñci maē iṇhiṁ kāyavvaṁ taṁ ca āisasu || 53 ||
annaṁ ca bhadda! nisuṇasu ēsā rannō ya amarakēussa |
dūrē hatthiṇanayaraṁ sāvayapaürā ya duggamā aḍavī |
tēṇa na ēsā sakkaï parāṇiuṁ niyapurammi amhēhiṁ |
na ya kōvi tahārūvō annō iha āgaō satthō || 57 ||
ēsā sukumālataṇū acchaï kicchēṇa ittha vaṇavāsē |
tā jaï tumaṁ parāṇasi saṭṭhāṇaṁ hōi tā laṭṭhaṁ || 58 ||
aha surahēṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavaṁ! jaṁ bhaṇaha taṁ karēmitti |
bhaṇiyāṁ haṁ kulavaïṇā vacchē! surahassa bhāsiyaṁ nisuyaṁ? |
tā vaccasu saha imiyā annō puṇa dullahō satthō || 60 ||
aha cintiyaṁ maē kiṁ imēṇa saha hōi gamaṇamamhāṇaṁ |
juggaṁ, ahavā jāṇaï bhayavaṁ ciya ēttha jaṁ uciyaṁ || 61 ||
iya cintiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavaṁ! jaṁ bhaṇasi taṁ karēmitti |
jaï ēvaṁ tā vacchē! payaṭṭa, iha tēṇa bhaṇiyā haṁ || 62 ||
bahu manniya tavvayaṇaṁ tāhē caliyā narinda! tēṇa samaṁ |
jāva ya kamēṇa pattā ēttha paēsammi tāva surahō sō |
kimpi misaṁ kāuṇaṁ thakkō ētthēṇa raṇṇammi || 64 ||
āvāsiūṇa sinnaṁ diṇē diṇē ēi maha samīvammi |
daṁsēi ya bahumāṇaṁ, aha annadiṇammi ēgantē || 65 ||
ghittuṁ āharaṇāiṁ maha pāsē āgaō bhaṇaï ēvaṁ |
ēyāiṁ giṇha sundari! na sōhasē taṁ nirābharaṇā || 66 ||
ēyāiṁ kuō tumaē pattāiṁ suraha! majjha sāhēsu |
sō bhaṇaï suṇasu sundari! puvvaṁ maha bhillapurisēhiṁ || 68 ||
gahiō tahiṁ ca pattaṁ ēyaṁ tuha jōggamābharaṇaṁ || 69 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ maha santiyamēvamābharaṇamēyaṁ |
harisiyamuhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ jaï ēvaṁ tarihi sundarataranti |
tā gēṇha imaṁ sundari! imassa jōggā tumaṁ nannā || 71 ||
aha tassa duṭṭhabhāvaṁ annāūṇaṁ tayaṁ maē gahiyaṁ |
tattō ya païdiṇaṁ sō uvayaraï mamaṁ asuhabhāvō || 72 ||
āgacchaï ēgantē parihāsakahāō kahaï maha puraō |
aha annadiṇē piyayayama! pāvēṇaṁ tēṇa mayaṇamụ̄dhēṇa |
bahu manniya avivēyaṁ bhaṇiyā ēgantasaṇṭhiyā ēvaṁ |
niyaaṅgasaṅgamēṇaṁ sahalaṁ mama kuṇasu jīviyaṁ ajja |
tuha āyattā pāṇā savvassavi sāmiṇī taṁ si || 76 ||
tuha suyaṇu! kiṅkarō haṁ āṇākārī ya pariyaṇō savvō |
tavvayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ sahasā vajjēṇa tāḍiyāva ahaṁ |
hā! pāviṭṭhō ēsō balāvi sīlakhaṇḍaṇaṁ kāhī |
saraṇavihūṇāi mamaṁ, tā iṇhiṁ kiṁ karēmitti? || 79 ||
nibbhatthāmi girāhiṁ sampaï aïniṭṭhurāhiṁ jaï ēyaṁ |
tā ēsa amajjāyō iṇhimpi virūvayaṁ kujjā || 80 ||
tā sampaï mūyattaṁ juttaṁ avalambiuṁ taō pacchā |
iya cintiya tuṇhikā ahōmuhaṁ kāuṁ tattha khakkā haṁ |
sōvi ya daṭhṭhūṇa mamaṁ niruttaraṁ uṭṭhiō tattō || 82 ||
vañciya pāhariē haṁ nīhariyā tāō sinnāō || 84 ||
ghittūṇa ya ēgadisaṁ caliyā ghaṇataruvaṇassa majjhēṇaṁ |
vēgēṇa ya gacchantī ghaṇandhayārāē tīē rayaṇīē |
aviyāṇiyaparamatthā jhaḍatti paḍiyā ya ēttha kūvammi |
agaḍassa taḍiṁ pāviya tattha nilukkā ahaṁ rāya! || 89 ||
maraṇē uvaṭṭhiēvi hu sīlaṁ saṁrakkhiyanti tuṭṭhamaṇā |
gāḍhaṁ chuhābhibhūyā cattāri diṇāṇi ēttha kūvammi |
ajja puṇa kalayalēṇa sibiraṁ āvāsiyanti nāūṇa |
tattō kūvapaviṭṭhaṁ tumha naraṁ pāsiūṇa suṭṭhuyaraṁ |
bhīyāi pucchiyāivi na uttaraṁ kiñci mē dinnaṁ || 93 ||
puṇaravi ya tumha nāmaṁ sōūṇaṁ vigayaannaāsaṅkā |
kiṁ dēva! ittha kīraï sakammavasayāṇa navari jīvāṇa |
sakayaṁ suhamasuhaṁ vā ikkō aṇuhavaï vivihajōṇīsu |
māyā piyā ya bhattā bandhujaṇō vāvi na hu saraṇaṁ || 98 ||
rāgaddōsavasāē asuhaphalaṁ āsi jaṁ kayaṁ kammaṁ |
ēvaṁ gaēvi jaṁ dēvi! ēttha kūvammi nivaḍiyā ēvaṁ |
paḍikūḍakāriṇāvi hu vihiṇā vihiyaṁ tu ēttiyaṁ laṭṭhaṁ |
jaṁ akkhayadēhāē tumaē saha saṅgamō vihiō || 101 ||
ēvaṁ ca tassa rannō adiṭṭhadukkhassa dēvisahiyassa |
aha annayā kayāivi atthāṇagayassa rāiṇō tassa |
taṁ ca tisañjhaṁ niccaṁ palōyamāṇassa ēttiō kālō |
vōlīṇō na ya diṭṭhaṁ kiñcivi nēmittiyāiṭṭhaṁ || 109 ||
sōūṇa ya taṁ saddaṁ vimhiyaütphullalōyaṇēṇa maē |
kassa puṇa ēsa saddō samuṭṭhiō ēttha vaṇaniguñjammi |
paümacuyā iva lacchī naravara! varabāliyā ēkkā || 116 ||
bhaṇiyā maē sumahuraṁ kīsa tumaṁ suyaṇu! bīhēsi? || 120 ||
mā bhaddē! kuṇasu bhayaṁ thēvampi, hu jaṇayanivisēsō haṁ |
kā si tumaṁ kattō vā iha paḍiyā majjha sāhēsu? || 121 ||
aviya | saggāō nivaḍiyā kiṁ sāvappahayā suraṅgaṇā taṁ si |
sāhēsu suyaṇu! ēyaṁ mahantakōūhalaṁ imaṁ majjha |
iya sā bhaṇiyā bhūnāha! majjha paḍiuttaraṁ adāūṇa |
aha taṁ tahāvihaṁ pāsiūṇa paricintiyaṁ maē ēyaṁ |
taṁ ēyaṁ sañjāyaṁ jaṁ puvvaṁ sumaïṇā bhaṇiyaṁ || 126 ||
tattō ya sigghamēva hi puttēṇa samāgamō hōhī || 127 ||
tā kiṁ iha puṭṭhāē imāē, tāva sāhēmi |
avvō! hu avitahaṁ taṁ picchaha nēmittiyassa sumaïssa |
tā puttēṇa samāṇaṁ āsannaṁ daṁsaṇaṁ iṇhiṁ || 132 ||
tā bhō samantabhaddaya! sigghaṁ āṇēha bāliyaṁ tamiha |
tīē sarīrasōhaṁ picchiya rannā vicintiyaṁ avvō |
āgārō ciya sūyaï imīē sukulammi sambhūiṁ || 135 ||
vacchē! ujjhasu sōyaṁ cayasu bhayaṁ jaṇayanivisēsassa |
sāhijjaü maha ēyaṁ kammi purē taṁ samuppannā? || 137 ||
kassa va dhūyā kaha vā ihāgayā kaha va majjha ujjāṇē |
paḍiyā si nahayalāō sāhēsu savittharaṁ ēyaṁ || 138 ||
aha sā ēvaṁ bhaṇiyā gurusōyā sajjhasēṇa abhibhūyā |
aha puṇaruttaṁ rannā puṭṭhāē tīē kahavi saṁlattaṁ |
tāya! caēmi na vōttuṁ bahudukhaṁ niyayavuttantaṁ || 140 ||
tahavi hu alandhaṇīyā āṇā tāyassa tēṇa sāhēmi |
atthi puraṁ supasiddhaṁ tattha ya naravāhaṇō puhaïnāhō |
rayaṇavaī sē dēvī tīē dhūyā ahaṁ tāya! || 142 ||
thūlaṁsuē muyantī nihuyaṁ rōuṁ pavattā sā || 144 ||
bhaṇiyā vacchē! mā ruya na hōi dīvantaraṁ imaṁ suyaṇu! |
hatthiṇapuraṁ hi ēyaṁ ēsō rāyā amarakēū || 146 ||
kamalāvaī ahampi hu, sahōyarō hōi tuha piyā majjha |
sō savvō surasundari! tuha guṇanivahaṁ maha kahintō || 148 ||
ēvaṁ surūvakaliyā ēvaṁ piuṇō ya vacchalā bāḍhaṁ |
tā mā kuṇasu visāyaṁ ēyampi ya piuharaṁ nijaṁ tujjha |
muhasōyaṁ dāūṇaṁ nīyā dēvīē mandirē niyaē |
vilavaï khaṇēṇa vihasaï rōvaï khaṇēṇa mūyalliyā hōi |
aha taṁ vigatayāṇandaṁ picchiya kamalāvaī vicintēi |
tahavi hu raïṁ na pāvaï ēsā cintāē susaï aṇudiyahaṁ |
tā mannē kā cintā jīē ēsā u parihāi || 157 ||
jaï tā māupiūṇaṁ sumaraï tā kiṁ kahēi na hu majjha? |
ēgantaṁ jaha sēvaï vihaḍiyacakkāiṁ jaha ya mēllēi |
taha mannē pēmmagahō vilasaï ēvaṁvihāhiṁ ciṭṭhāhiṁ |
tā jaha ēsā majjhaṁ tahaṭṭhiyaṁ sāhaï sarūvaṁ || 160 ||
tā tassa pāvaṇammivi kōvi uvāōvi labbhaē nūṇaṁ |
na ya ēsā vajjarihī puṭṭhāvi jahaṭṭhiyaṁ majjha || 161 ||
vāmasahāvō mayaṇō akkhijjantō na pāyaḍō hōi |
tahavi hu lahāmi kēṇavi handi! uvāēṇa bhāvamēīē |
iya cintiya āṇattā niyacēḍī haṁsiyā nāma || 163 ||
jaṁ āṇavēsi sāmiṇi! iya bhaṇiuṁ haṁsiyā gayā jhatti |
surasundari! tuha cariyassa nisuṇaṇē atthi kōugaṁ majjha |
kaha kēṇa kiṁ nimittaṁ avahariyā kiñca aṇubhūyaṁ? || 167 ||
surasundarīē bhaṇiyaṁ tāēṇavi āsi pucchiyā ēva |
kiṁ puṇa lajjāē maē na sakkiyaṁ tattha vajjariuṁ || 168 ||
kiñca | maha cariyaṁ summantaṁ jaṇēī pāsaṭṭhiyāṇavi dukkhaṁ |
tahavi hu tumaē puṭṭhā vayaṁsi! kōūhalēṇa garuēṇa |
tassa ya rannō mittō kumārabhāvammi kahavi sañjāō |
dinnā niyayā bhagiṇī rayaṇavaī nāma ēyassa || 179 ||
ēkkacciya dhūyā haṁ jāyā jammammi majjha tāēṇa |
gāhāviyā kalāō jāyā ya kamēṇa takkusalā || 183 ||
aviya | vittē naṭṭē gīē pattacchējjē ya hatthakaṇḍēsu |
jāyā viyakkhaṇā haṁ buddhīē suragurussa sāricchā |
ēkkammi paē laddhē sēsaṁ ūhēmi laddhīē || 185 ||
ambāē tāyassa ya sayalassa ya pariyaṇassa āṇandaṁ |
kuṇamāṇā sampattā kamasō haṁ jōvvaṇaṁ paḍhamaṁ || 186 ||
daṭhṭhūṇa jōvvaṇaṁ maha tāō cintāurō daḍhaṁ jāō |
kō aṇurūvō hōhī bhattā iha majjha dhūyāē? || 187 ||
aha annayā ya sumaī nēmittī āgaō tahiṁ rannā |
puṭṭhō maha dhūyāē kō hōhī bhadda! bhattārō? || 188 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa naravara! vijāharacakkavaṭṭiṇō ēsā |
aha annayā ya ahayaṁ pariyariyā bahuvihāhiṁ cēḍīhiṁ |
parijaviya kiñci mantaṁ uppaïumaṇā pasāraï bhuyāō |
taṁ daṭṭhuṁ vimhiyā haṁ sampattā tīi antiyaṁ turiyaṁ |
bhaṇiyā ya maē sundari! kā si tumaṁ kiñca kuṇasi imaṁ? || 194 ||
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ bhaddē! āyannasu, girivarammi vēyaḍ̣dhē |
rāyā ya bhāṇuvēgō atthi purē kuñjarāvattē || 196 ||
tassa ya dō bhagiṇīō sahōyarāō ya aīva iṭṭhāō |
paḍhamā ō bandhudattā rayaṇavaī nāma bīyā u || 197 ||
tīē dhūyā ahayaṁ nāmaṁ ca piyaṁvayā majjha || 198 ||
annāvi mahādēvī tāyassa u atthi kaṇagamālatti |
tīē ya atthi puttō nāmēṇaṁ mayarakēutti || 199 ||
sō maha aīva iṭṭhō virahaṁ na sahāmi tassa nimisampi |
sampaï puṇa tāēṇaṁ dinnāō tassa vijjāō || 200 ||
vijjāṇa sāhaṇatthaṁ pasattakhittammi sō gaō vijaṇē |
vaṭṭaï bīō māsō vijjāō tassa sāhayantassa |
ahamavi tassa viōgē tarāmi nō jāva acchēuṁ || 202 ||
tā pucchiūṇa jaṇagaṁ caliyā haṁ tassa darisaṇanimittaṁ |
pamhuṭṭhamahannāē tēṇa ya na caēmi uppaïuṁ || 204 ||
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ taṁ ēyaṁ sāhiyaṁ suyaṇu! tujjha |
puṇaruttampi hu pạdhiē sambharaï na majjha taṁ payaṁ kahavi |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ piyaṁvaē! atthi tīi vijjāē |
ēsō kappō jaṁ kila sāhijjaï handi! annassa! || 207 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ piyaṁvayāē sāhijjaï natthi kōvi dōsotti |
jaï ēvaṁ tā sāhasu mā (mē) kahavi payaṁ uvalabhijjā || 208 ||
ēvaṁ ca maē bhaṇiē samāṇasiddhitti tīi bhaṇiūṇa |
ṭhāūṇa kannamūlē pạdhiyā saṇiyaṁ tu sā vijjā || 209 ||
tattō citantīē lahumēva maē tayaṁ payaṁ laddhaṁ |
lahiūṇa tīē siṭṭhaṁ bhavaï imaṁ kiṁ nu ēvanti? || 210 ||
calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ maha hōsi taṁ guruṇī || 211 ||
jīē vijjhā dinnā, tā maha sāhēsu tujjha kiṁ nāma? |
ēttha purammī kassa va dhūyā taṁ sukayapunnassa? || 212 ||
majjha sahīē bhaṇiyaṁ bhaddē! naravāhaṇassa naravaïṇō |
ambāē majjha puvviṁ vajjariyaṁ āsi, majjha lahubhagiṇī |
bhūmicaramittassa u rannō maha bhāuṇā dinnā || 216 ||
tā māusiyādhūyā bhagiṇī taṁ hōsi majjhaṁ candamuhi! |
iya jampiūṇa dinnaṁ tīē maha sāiyaṁ garuyaṁ || 217 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ āgacchasu bhagiṇi! majjha gēhammi |
itthatthē nibbandhaṁ mā kāhisi ucchugā ahaṁ iṇhiṁ |
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvanti ya kintu pucchāmi || 220 ||
kiñcivi, taṁ maha sāhasu, tīē bhaṇiyaṁ tu puccha, sāhēmi |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca maē bhaddē! kakkhāē gōviē ēttha? || 221 ||
cittapaḍē kiṁ acchaï lihiyaṁ, cittammi kōugaṁ majjha |
tā daṁsijjaü ēyaṁ jaï jōggaṁ daṁsiuṁ bhagiṇi! || 222 ||
viyasiyamuhāi tīē pasāriuṁ daṁsiō paḍō amha |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tīi isō maē sahatthēṇa lihiutti || 223 ||
tattha ya paḍammi lihiyaṁ daṭhṭhūṇamaṇaṅgasaṁnibhaṁ taruṇaṁ |
amaēṇava sittā haṁ jāō hiyayassa āṇandō || 224 ||
suttāva mucchiyā iva mattā iva vigayacēyaṇā jāyā |
nāūṇa majjha bhāvaṁ vasantiyāē sahīi saṁlattaṁ |
kō ēsa taē lihiō piyaṁvaē! lōyaṇāṇandō? || 228 ||
bhaṇiyamaha kumuiṇīē vasantiē! kiṁ tuhittha pucchāē? |
īsiṁ hasiūṇa taō sirimaïyāē sahīē saṁlattaṁ |
sampaï raīē sahiō ēsō mayaṇotti kiṁ na pulaēsi? |
payaḍā raīvi ēsā āsannā cēva ēyassa || 231 ||
taṁ sōuṁ savvāhiṁ sahatthatālaṁ tu pahasiuṁ bhaṇiyaṁ |
ēvaṁ ēyaṁ sirimaï! sammaṁ hi viṇicchiyaṁ tumaē || 232 ||
kattō āsannattaṁ jēṇa kayā haṁ raī tumaē? || 234 ||
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ mā sahi! rūsasu, diṭṭhammi jēṇa ēyammi |
cittammi raī jāyā tēṇa raī taṁ maē bhaṇiyā || 235 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca maē kiṁvā asamañjasabhāsiṇīhiṁ ēyāhiṁ |
tāva ya, piyaṁvaē! kahasu ēsa kō vā taē lihiō? || 236 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ piyaṁvayāē bhāyā maha ēsa mayarakēutti |
rūvēṇa jō aṇaṅgō sūrō cāī kalākusalō || 237 ||
kaïyāvi cittaphalaē kaïyāvi paḍammi tassa paḍirūvaṁ |
lihiūṇa maē appā viṇōiō ēttiyaṁ kālaṁ || 238 ||
sampaï puṇa asamatthā sahiuṁ virahaṁ imassa caliyā haṁ |
tā bhagiṇi! muñca vaccāmi jēṇa pāsammi tassēva || 239 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca sirimaīē ēvaṁ jō garuyaguṇagaṇāvāsō |
cittagaēṇavi tāva ya āṇandō sahijaṇassa sañjaṇiō |
iṇhiṁ paccakkhampi hu daṁsijjaō amayabhūō sō || 241 ||
aviya | jaï tāva kāvi hu ahaṁ tā 'vassaṁ tassa saṅgamēṇa suhaṁ |
kāyavvaṁ bhagiṇīē aṇukūlō jaï vihī hōhī || 243 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca maē tāva ya ēyāō havantu aliyabhaṇirīō |
aïniuṇaṁ kilaṁ citta amhē kōūhalēṇa pulaēmō |
aha kumuiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ēyanti natthi sandēhō |
tā sahi! tumampi ēvaṁ cittaṁ lihiuṁ samabbhasasu || 246 ||
appēsu paḍaṁ ēyaṁ piyaṁvaē! jēṇa cittamabbhasaï |
tuha bhagiṇī, aha tīē samappiō kumuiṇīi paḍō || 247 ||
sambhāsiuṁ tāhiṁ piyaṁvayā sā taō mamaṁ uppaïyā nahaggē |
sahīhi juttā bahukēliyāhiṁ ahampi pattā niyamandirammi || 248 ||
bhaṇiyāō ya sahīō vaccaha savvāō niyayagēhēsu |
maha kuṇakuṇāi sīsaṁ sīyanti ya savvaaṅgāiṁ || 2 ||
jaragahiṁyava sarīraṁ tā sōvissaṁ khaṇantaraṁ ēgaṁ |
tattō ya kumuiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ karēsutti || 3 ||
īsiṁ hasiūṇa taō vajjariyaṁ sirimaīē kiṁ bhagiṇi! |
sahasā jāyamasatthaṁ tuha dēhaṁ, kāraṇaṁ bhaṇasu? || 4 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ vasantiyāē sirimaï! taṁ cēva vēccayaṁ muṇasi |
tā cintēsu sayaṁ ciya rōgassa nidāṇamēyassa || 5 ||
aha sirimaīi majjhaṁ saṁ dhāṇāiṁ niēva sāsūyaṁ |
bhaṇiyaṁ na kimpi tāva ya lakkhijjaï bajjhavittīē || 6 ||
aviya | duvihā saṅkhēvēṇaṁ sārīrā ' 'gantuyā ya rōgatti
aha vāyapittasimbhubbhavā ya, iha ādimā nēyā || 7 ||
sārīriyarōgāṇaṁ na lakkhaṇaṁ kiñci dīsaï imīē |
aha laliyāē bhaṇiyaṁ tā kiṁ sigghaṁ na kīraē ēyaṁ |
vāhī uvikkhiō jaṁ na hōi iha sundarō bhaddē! || 12 ||
tō sirimaïē bhaṇiyaṁ lakkhēmō amhi kēvalaṁ vāhiṁ |
na uṇō paüṇīkāuṁ sattā aha māhavī bhaṇaï || 13 ||
lakkhaï jō kira vāhiṁ paüṇampi hu sō karissaē pattaṁ |
jēṇiha diṭṭhā cōrā paharayamavi dēha sō nūṇaṁ || 14 ||
nihuyaṁ hasiūṇa taō savvāhivi saharisaṁ samullaviyaṁ |
sirimaï! iṇhi na chuṭṭasi amha sahiṁ jaṇasu paüṇanti || 15 ||
annaṁ, sa tujjha jaṇaō suprasiddhō mantajāṇaō suyaṇu! |
tā vāhiūṇa mantaṁ paüṇaṁ surasundariṁ kuṇasu || 16 ||
aha sirimaīi bhaṇiyaṁ jaï maha jaṇaō viyāṇaī mantē |
tā kiṁ maha, jaï miṭṭhaṁ khīraṁ tā kiṁ nu chāṇassa? || 17 ||
kimpuṇa bhaṇāmi ikkaṁ jaï maha ēsā na rūsaē sahiyā |
ēsa aüvvō vāhī na phiṭṭaē mantamēttēṇa || 18 ||
aha kumuiṇīē bhaṇiyaṁ kiṁ puṇa kōvassa kāraṇaṁ ēttha? |
sāhēsu nivvisaṅkā vigamō vāhīē jaï hōi || 19 ||
tō sirimaīē bhaṇiyaṁ jō sō cittammi vilihiō diṭṭhō |
sō jaï navaraṁ vējjō vāhiṁ avaṇijja ēiē || 20 ||
aha cittapaḍaṁ sahasā pasāriyaṁ pūiūṇa tō bhaṇaï |
kumuiṇiyā! jaï ēvaṁ, tā ēyaṁ handi! vinnavaha || 21 ||
īsiṁ hasiūṇa taō savvahivi saharisaṁ samullaviyaṁ |
dakkhinnanihi! mahāyasa! cittaṭṭhiya! suṇasu amha viṇṇattiṁ |
tuha daṁsaṇāō ēsā amha sahī āurā jāyā || 23 ||
tā taha karēsu sundara! jaha ēsā hōi vigayavāhīyā |
huṅkāraṁ mōttūṇaṁ tāhiṁ sakōvaṁ maē imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ |
kiṁ vāvi acittēṇaṁ vinnaviēṇaṁ guṇō imēṇaṁ tu |
cittagaō nahi katthavi kōvi hu uppāyaē vāhiṁ || 26 ||
aha sirimaīē bhaṇiyaṁ tuha cittagaō imō hu jēṇēva |
tēṇēva ya accittā vihiyā surasundari! tumanti || 27 ||
dīhaṁ nīsasiūṇaṁ tāhē saṇiyaṁ maē samullaviyaṁ |
jaï ēyampi viyāṇasi tā kiṁ na sampāḍasi jhati? || 28 ||
iya bhaṇiūya ahōmuhavayaṇā vilihāmi jāva mahivaṭṭhaṁ |
tāva ya sahatthatālaṁ hasiuṁ tīē samullaviuṁ || 29 ||
tā taha karēmi sampaï jaha savvaṁ sōhaṇaṁ hōi || 30 ||
iya bhaṇiuṁ cittapaḍaṁ gahiuṁ pāsammi sā gayā jhatti |
maha jaṇaṇīē tattō siṭṭhō savvōvi vuttantō || 31 ||
tīēvi gantuṁ rannō siṭṭhō savvōvi vuttantō || 32 ||
aha tāō taṁ cittaṁ palōiüṁ harisiō imaṁ bhaṇaï |
ahavā na rāyahaṁsa mōttuṁ annattha ramaï varahaṁsī |
taha bhāṇuvēgakhayarō amha samīvammi ēi aṇavarayaṁ |
iya naravaïṇā bhaṇiē pahasiyavayaṇāē majjha jaṇaṇīē |
bhaṇiyā sirimaī gantuṁ sāhijjaü majjha dhūyāē || 36 ||
mā surasundari! iṇhiṁ uvvēvaṁ kuṇasu niyayacittammi |
siddhaṁ samīhiyaṁ tuha iya bhaṇiyā sirimaī tāhē || 37 ||
majjha samīvē pattā siṭṭhō savvōvi puvvavuttantō |
cintēmi kahaya hōhī taṁ diyahaṁ jattha sō maē sakkhā |
taṁ cēva cittakammaṁ ālihamāṇā ya aṇudiyahaṁ || 40 ||
jāva ya kaïvi diṇāī ṭhiyā ahaṁ saṇṭhavijjantā || 41 ||
parivāiyā u ēgā āsīvāyaṁ karēttu amhāṇaṁ |
jaharuiyaṁ uvabhujjaï iṭṭhaṁ rāmijjaē imaṁ sāraṁ |
jamhā na kiñci vijjaï annaṁ ihalōgavaïrittaṁ || 44 ||
jamhā jīvapayatthō vijjaï annō na dēhavaïrittō |
paccakkhaṁ mōttūṇaṁ na ya annaṁ atthi iha pamāṇaṁ tu |
santēvi pamāṇattē na sijjhaï tēṇa jīvotti || 47 ||
paccakkhapuvvagaṁ jaṁ aṇumāṇaṁ iha, na tēṇa taggahaṇaṁ |
na ya vijjaï taggahaṇē liṅgampi aṇindiyattaṇaō || 48 ||
na pamāṇaṁ vibuhāṇaṁ kaha tēhiṁ bhavijja tassiddhī? || 49 ||
tā pañcabhūyasamudayarūvō jīvō na tēsiṁ vigamammi |
tassābhāvammi kuō paralōgō jēṇa ya tadatthaṁ || 50 ||
mụ̄dhēhiṁ sayaṁ naṭṭhēhiṁ taha paraṁ nāsayantēhiṁ || 51 ||
bhakkhaha sarasaṁ maṁsaṁ piyaha suraṁ vigayaāsaṅkā || 52 ||
iya tīē buddhilāē vayaṇaṁ sōūṇa kugaïsañjaṇagaṁ |
bhaṇiyaṁ maē ahammē! mā mā ēvaṁ samullavasu || 53 ||
kō va sakannō ēyaṁ tuha bhaṇiyaṁ saddahējjāvi? || 54 ||
jaṁ bhaṇasi natthi jīō annō dēhāō, aṇuvaṁlabhāō |
jaṁ jaṁ tumaṁ na picchasi taṁ taṁ jaï natthi tā phuḍaṁ muddhē! |
aha sayaladēsakālubbhavā narā nēya taṁ palōinti |
ēyaṁ ca kaha ṇu najjaï durahigayā annacittā jaṁ? || 58 ||
kiñca | jo cciya imaṁ vigappaï tuha dēhē handi! natthi jīvotti |
paccakkhamēva ēgaṁ jaṁ ca pamāṇaṁ, na juttamēyampi |
tēhi paṇīyaṁ satthaṁ tēsiṁ āṇāi jaṁ ca annēhiṁ |
tammi ya bhaṇiō jīvō annabhavō tassa hōi paralōgō |
tabbhaṇiyaṁ tā juttaṁ kāuṁ savvaṁ hiyatthīṇaṁ || 64 ||
amha sahīē saddhiṁ ajjavi vāyaṁ karēsi dussīlē! |
tā vaccasu saṭṭhāṇaṁ diṭṭhaṁ paṇḍiccayaṁ tujjha || 68 ||
iya hasiyā sā ruṭṭhā phurantaaharā viṇiggayā tattō |
ahamavi sahijaṇajuttā suhēṇa jā tattha acchēmi || 69 ||
tā annadiṇē rāyā samāgaō majjha māugēhammi |
bhaṇiō ambāē kiṁ dīsaha cintāurā tubbhē? || 70 ||
tāēṇa taō bhaṇiyaṁ sammaṁ hi viyāṇiyaṁ tumē dēvi! |
jā puvvaṁ kila tīē paüṭṭhacitāē ālihiyaṁ || 72 ||
surasundarīi rūvaṁ cittapaḍē tāhi taṁ gahēūṇaṁ |
taṁ daṁsiya naravaïṇō vajjariya tīē duṭṭhahiyayāē |
naravara! amhē puhaïṁ hiṇḍāmō tumha kajjēṇa || 74 ||
jaṁ rayaṇaṁ puhaīē picchāmō taṁ ca tumha sāhēmō |
naravāhaṇassa rannā dhūyā surasundarī imā kannā |
kō tīē niravasēsaṁ lihiuṁ sakkijja taṇurūvaṁ? || 76 ||
savvaṁ ciya sō thērō jēṇēsā nimmiyā payāvaïṇā |
kahamannahā na vihiyā suhakhāṇī attaṇō bhajjā? || 77 ||
mannē vihiṇā vihiyā ēsā naṇu hatthabhallivva || 79 ||
annaṁ ca jō imīē pāṇiggahaṇaṁ karissaī purisō |
sō bharahaddhanarīsō hōhī purisō na sandēhō || 80 ||
tā naravara! tuha jōggā sā kannā na uṇa annassa || 81 ||
aha bahudaviṇaṁ dāuṁ pahaṭṭhavayaṇēṇa tēṇa sā rannā |
bhaṇiyā bhayavaï! siṭṭhā jaṁ kannā sōhaṇaṁ vihiyaṁ || 82 ||
ēyaṁ ca majjha sundari! siṭṭhaṁ savvampi cārapurisēhiṁ |
aha tēṇa majjha pāsē paṭṭhaviō rayaṇacūḍotti || 83 ||
nāmēṇa niyayamantī tēṇa ya āgamma maggiō ahayaṁ |
bhaṇiyō ya maē ēsō nēmittiyasumaïvayaṇaō bhadda! |
hōhī khayarassa piyā tassēva ya tēṇa dāyavvā || 85 ||
annaṁ, sō tuha sāmī thērō tā kintha tassa kannāē? |
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ mā ēvaṁ bhaṇasu naranāha! || 86 ||
guruāyarēṇa ahayaṁ paṭṭhaviō tēṇa dēsu niyadhūyaṁ |
ēīē adāṇēṇaṁ picchāmi na sundaraṁ tumha || 87 ||
tattō ya maē gāḍhaṁ kuddhēṇaṁ ērisaṁ samullaviyaṁ |
tāva ya na dēmi dhūyaṁ jaṁ ruccaï taṁ kuṇējjāsu || 88 ||
