tā gacchasu niyapahuṇō sāhijja jahaṭṭhiyaṁ imaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
gihamāgayassa kō puṇa tuha daṇḍō kīraü iṇhiṁ? || 89 ||
aha tēṇa tattha gantuṁ kahiē sō niyabalēṇa gāraviō |
tā dēvi! nimittēṇaṁ imēṇa cintāurō ahaṁ jāō |
ambāē taō bhaṇiyaṁ piyayama! kiṁ ēttha cintāē || 94 ||
dijjaü kayasaṁmāṇō saṭṭhāṇaṁ jēṇa sō jāi || 95 ||
iharā pabhūyasēnnō appabalāṇaṁ sa amha dēsassa |
mantīhivi dēvī! imaṁ vimantiyaṁ āsi navari mantissa |
maïsāgarassa ēsō na sundarō bhāviō mantō || 97 ||
jaṁ tēṇa imaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ āgacchaü tāva sō kusaggammi |
iha āgayassa jamhā maraṇaṁ sē sumaïṇā siṭṭhaṁ || 98 ||
annaṁ ca tassa rannō niggamaṇē āsi maṅgulā saüṇā |
ajayāvahā ya savvē saṇiccharāī gahā dhaṇiyaṁ || 99 ||
iha āgayammi tammī vijaō amhaṁ parājaō tassa |
tā dēva! nivvisaṅkā acchaha kiṁ annamantēṇa? || 100 ||
rōhagasañjuttī uṇa kīraü gāmāvi tassa jē maggē |
tē uvvasantu khippaṁ tiṇaghāsāī ya ujjhantu || 101 ||
iya dēvi! mantivayaṇaṁ kāriya savvampi āgaō ēttha |
aha haṁsiṇi! jā kaïvi hu suhēṇa vaccati tattha divasāiṁ |
taō | pihiāiṁ gōurāiṁ jalēṇa paripūriyāō parihāō |
saṁsaïyā sāmantā nāyarayā āulā daḍhaṁ jāyā |
ēvaṁ haṁsiṇi! jāē samantaō āulammi nayarammi |
rayaṇīē kēṇāvi hu hīrantaṁ appayaṁ pulōittā |
hā ammi! tāya! kōvi hu dēvō vā nahayarō va maṁ haraï |
dhāvaha dhāvaha suhaḍā! imāō mēllāvaha mamanti || 112 ||
ēmāiṁ vilavamāṇā bhaṇiyā haṁ tēṇa suyaṇu! mā bhāhi |
nō tujjha kiñci virūvaṁ karēmi pāṇappiyā taṁ si || 113 ||
hariyā si kīsa sundari! bhayabhīyā ēvamullavasi? || 114 ||
bhuñjihisi maē saddhiṁ bhōē kiṁ ruyasi uvviggā? || 115 ||
ēyaṁ ca tassa vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ harisiyā ahaṁ cittē |
kiṁ nāma majjha daïō ēsō sō mayarakēutti? || 116 ||
bhāyā piyaṁvayāē jassa tayā cittavilēhiyaṁ rūvaṁ |
sō ajjavi vijjāō sāhaï tā āgamō kaha ṇu tassa? |
kaha maha ittiyapunnā jaṁ sō dīsijja paccakkhaṁ? || 118 ||
ēmāiṁ cintayantī nīyā haṁ tēṇa katthavi paēsē |
ētthantarammi rayaṇī khayaṁ gayā sāhiuṁva paramatthaṁ |
sammaṁ niyaccha vacchē! na hōi sō vallahō ēsa || 120 ||
jāē pabhāyasamaē diṭṭhō sō sāmalēṇa dēhēṇa |
tattō gurusōgāē vicintiyaṁ hā! na sō ēsō || 121 ||
cittagaēṇa imassa jō sāricchaṁ natthi thēvampi || 122 ||
tā kiṁ karēmi iṇhiṁ saraṇavihūṇā paravvasā ahayaṁ |
iya cintatīē tayā bhaēṇa kampō samuppannō || 123 ||
kiṁ suyaṇu! tumaṁ bīhasi bhūyapisāuttisaṅkirī majjha |
nisuṇasu jō haṁ jēṇa va hariyā kajjēṇa ya mayacchi! || 125 ||
tattha ya rāyā sirigandhavāhaṇō āsi vikkhāō || 126 ||
bīō ya mayarakēū taïō puṇa mēhanāutti || 127 ||
nahavāhaṇōvi sāhiyavijjō aha jōvvaṇaṁ tu sampattō |
avahariuṁ pariṇīyā ruṭṭhō ēsō taō tassa || 129 ||
aṇumaggaṁ gantūṇaṁ baddhō sō nāgiṇīē vijjāē |
sayamēva nahayarindā savvēvi hu paṇaïmuvagayā tasya |
iya muṇiuṁ maha jaṇaō saṁviggō bhaṇiumāḍhattō || 133 ||
picchaha bhō! maṇuyāṇaṁ maṇōrahā annahā visaḍḍhanti |
vihiṇō vasēṇa navaraṁ annaha kajjāṇa pariṇāmō || 134 ||
taṁ puṇa annaha jāyaṁ tā kiṁ kajjaṁ imēṇa rajjēṇaṁ |
saṁsārō hu asārō ghōrā aïdāruṇā ya narayammi! |
cavalō indiyagāmō rāgaddōsā ya dujjayā lōē |
vañcaṇaparā ya jīvā duṭṭhakasāēhiṁ tāviō lōō |
asuhaphalō gharavāsō maṇuyattaṁ taha ya nō sulahaṁ || 141 ||
payaīē calā lacchī pēmmaṁ suviṇōvamaṁ lōē || 142 ||
mōttūṇaṁ jiṇadhammaṁ jiyāṇa saraṇaṁ jaō nannaṁ || 145 ||
kaha sēvaṁ kāhāmō sampaï bhiccassa niyayassa? || 147 ||
ēvaṁ ca ṭhiē kāraṇavasēṇa kēṇaï pabhāyasamayammi |
taṁ si taō avahariyā mēttalasarasalliēṇa maē || 152 ||
tā mā rōvasu sundari! pāṇāṇavi sāmiṇī tumaṁ majjha |
iya cintiuṁ payattā hāhā! maha pāvapasarassa || 154 ||
majjha kaēṇaṁ tāō pāraddhō garuyasattuṇā tāva |
dhā! maha! jīēṇaṁ na tāyaāsāsaṇaṁ na piyalābhō |
maṇavallahassa tassa u lābhēṇa havijja ahava suhiyā haṁ |
maha pāvapariṇaīē ēttō ēkkampi nō jāyaṁ || 157 ||
ēvaṁ vicintayantī bhaṇiyā haṁ tēṇa tāva ētthēva |
ciṭṭhaü tumaṁ jāva ahaṁ āsannē vaṁsigahaṇāmmi || 158 ||
iya bhaṇiūṇa gaō sō ahamavi gurusōyatāviyā tattha |
vihiṇā viḍambiyā haṁ jīvantī iya vicintēntī || 166 ||
gantuṁ tassa samīvē gahiūṇa phalaṁ muhammi pakkhittaṁ |
iya bhaṇiūṇa sasōyaṁ khaṇantaraṁ jāva tattha acchāmi |
tāva ya guruvisaviyaṇāē vibbhalā mahiyalē paḍiyā || 168 ||
tattō ya akahaṇīyaṁ pāviyavatthantaraṁ tayā bhaddē! |
jāṇāmi nēva kiñcivi taduttaraṁ jaṁ mahaṁ jāyaṁ || 170 ||
khaṇamēttaṁ tēna ciya majjha sarīraṁ pasiñcamāṇassa |
taṁ daṭṭhu cintiyaṁ mē kiṁ mannē indajālamēyanti? |
kiṁ vāvi annajammō uyāhu kiṁ suviṇayaṁ ēyaṁ? || 177 ||
kiṁvā maïsaṁmōhō kiṁvāvi hu saccamēva ēyanti? |
ahavā nahi nahi ēyaṁ kattō maha ittiyā punnā? || 178 ||
jaṁ sō maṇavallahaō dīsijja jaṇō imēhiṁ nayaṇēhiṁ |
jaṁ sē ucchaṅgagayā imassa puṇa sambhavō kattha? || 179 ||
ēsō hu rayaṇadīvō bhagiṇī ya piyaṁvayā ahaṁ tujjha |
ēvaṁ ca tīē bhaṇiē ēsōcciya sotti harisiyā cittē |
ētthantarammi ēgō khayarō āgamma bhaṇaï kayaviṇaō |
tavvayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ piyaṁvayaṁ ṭhāviuṇa maha pāsē |
tāva ya piyaṁvayāē puṭṭhā kaha suyaṇu! ēttha taṁ pattā |
kīsa va visamuvabhuñjiya appā vasaṇammi pāḍiō bhīmē? |
tattō ya maē tīē puvvuttaṁ sāhiyaṁ savvaṁ || 187 ||
aha sāvi maē puṭṭhā cittapaḍaṁ appiūṇamamhāṇaṁ |
taïyā kattha gayā taṁ kiṁvā aṇuciṭṭhiyaṁ tumaē? || 188 ||
kaha vā uvabhuttavisā bhīmaarannammi pāviyā ahayaṁ? |
kaha vā duṭṭhampi visaṁ khaṇēṇa dēhāō avaṇīyaṁ? || 189 ||
ētthāgayatāēṇaṁ bhaṇiyā haṁ putti! ciṭṭhasu ihēva |
hōsu paḍicārigā iha tāva tumaṁ mayarakēussa || 192 ||
jaṁ āṇavēi tāutti jampiyaṁ tāhē ēttha dīvammi |
pulayantēṇa ya nāyaṁ ēsō sō mayarakēunāmotti |
avvō! pamāyavasaō kaha varaō māriō niravarāhō? |
dhī! dhī! annāṇassa u niratthayaṁ pāvamāyariyaṁ || 205 ||
ēmāi cintayantō puṇō puṇō appayaṁ ca nindantō |
jā vayaï thōvabhūmiṁ tā phuriyaṁ dāhiṇaṁ nayaṇaṁ || 206 ||
kiṁ mannē maha sūyaï sunimittamimanti cintaï jāva |
tāva visarukkhamūlē diṭṭhā taṁ nivaḍiyā suyaṇu! || 207 ||
daṭhṭhūṇa tumaṁ sundari! sittō amaēṇava kumārō || 208 ||
avvō! kaha ṇu mayāvi hu āṇandaṁ dēi majjha hiyayassa? |
tā kiṁ imā mayacciya kiṁvā sajiyatti jāva pulaēi |
aïtivvavisaviyārā jāyā ō acēyaṇā imā bālā |
tō nēūṇa saṭṭhāṇaṁ karēmi ēīi tēgicchaṁ || 211 ||
iya cintiya surasundari! gahiūṇa tumaṁ samāgaō ēttha |
siṭṭhō puvvuddiṭṭhō vuttantō tēṇa maha savvō || 212 ||
kāhāmi santikammaṁ vigdhajayaṭṭhā ya mantajāvaṁ ca |
ētthantarammi ya maē samappiyaṁ aṅgulīyayaṁ tassa |
sāhēmi tāva sundari! uvaladdhā cēyaṇā tumaē || 218 ||
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ taṁ savvaṁ sāhiyaṁ maē ēyaṁ |
tā surasundari! siddhaṁ samīhiyaṁ tujjha savvampi || 219 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ēyanti kintu nisuṇēsu |
piyadaṁsaṇēvi jāē ajjavi sōgāuraṁ daḍhaṁ hiyayaṁ |
piyasahi! maha santāvō tēṇajjavi bāhaē dēhaṁ || 222 ||
tā kaha aṇukūlattaṁ vihiṇō maha mandabhāgāē? || 223 ||
tāva ya kayakāyavvō samāgaō tīē sō bhāyā || 224 ||
bhaṇiyā ya tēṇa kimiyaṁ piyaṁvaē! ruyaï tujjha piyabhagiṇī |
tīēvi savvaṁ sōyassa kāraṇaṁ tassa akkhāyaṁ || 225 ||
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ sundari! mā rūya avassamajjēva |
jīvantē maï sundari! kō tuha jaṇayaṁ parābhavējjati? |
tā gacchissaṁ sampaï bāhusahāō ahaṁ tattha || 227 ||
sahiyā piyaṁvayāē tatthēva ṭhiyā ahampi taddivasaṁ |
kiṁ ajjavi maṇadaïō sahasā hantūṇa taṁ durāyāraṁ |
vōlīṇammi ya divasē rayaṇiṁ savvampi bhagiṇisahiyā haṁ |
kiṁ puṇa na āgaō sotti jāva ciṭṭhāmi uvviggā || 232 ||
tāva ya kharapharusagiraṁ tajjitō bhīsaṇō sarūvēṇa |
ā pāvē! jaṁ taïyā parapurisāsattamāṇasāē tumē |
maha vihiyaṁ gurudukkhaṁ tassa phalaṁ tēṇa pāviyaṁ tāva |
ēvaṁ bhaṇamāṇō sō haṁsiṇi! ghittuṁ mamaṁ bhayuppitthaṁ |
nēūṇa dūradēsaṁ mukkā gayaṇāō tēṇa pāvēṇa |
daïvavasēṇa ya paḍiyā layāviyāṇammi tammi ujjāṇē |
diṭṭhā samantabhaddēṇa tāhi puṭṭhā ya vuttantaṁ || 242 ||
kiṁ indayālamēyaṁ kiṁvā sumiṇanti kattha vā pattā |
kattha gaō vēyālō piyaṁvayāē ya kiṁ jāyaṁ? || 243 ||
maṇavallahassa imiṇā havējja vihiyaṁ asōhaṇaṁ kiñci |
mannē tēṇēva lahuṁ na āgaō tammi sō dīvē || 244 ||
kiṁvā majjha nimittaṁ samāgaēṇaṁ havijja vihiyaṁ tu |
tattō ya āṇiyā haṁ bhūvaïpuraō samantabhaddēṇa |
sajjhasasōēhiṁ tahimpi tārisaṁ kiñci nō kahiyaṁ || 247 ||
iya payaḍiyaṁ gujjhaṁ nēhasārāi tujjhaṁ niyacariyamēvaṁ haṁsiē! savvamēyaṁ |
aïgaruyasiṇēhā sāhiyaṁ vittharēṇaṁ paṇayaparavasāē pucchiyaṁ jaṁ taïtti || 248 ||
aha haṁsiyāē bhaṇiyaṁ avvō! aïdūsahaṁ samaṇubhūyaṁ |
ēvaṁvihadukkhāṇaṁ na ya uciyā hōsi piyasahi! tumanti |
kiṁ puṇa kīraï vihiṇō vicittacariyassa lōyammi? || 2 ||
niccaṁ suhōciyampi hu bahuvihadukkhāṇa kuṇaï āvāsaṁ |
iya surasundari! vihiṇō vicittayaṁ jāṇiūṇa uvvēvaṁ |
thēvampi hu mā kāhisi, kō ṇu guṇō tassa karaṇēvi || 4 ||
annaṁ ca jārisāiṁ tuha dēhē lakkhaṇāiṁ dīsanti |
annaṁ ca maēvi suyaṁ kusagganayarāō āgayanarēṇa |
hantūṇa ya taṁ sattuṁ rannō naravāhaṇassa pāsammi |
āgamma tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ nihaō sattū tuha narinda! || 12 ||
pāsē piyaṁvayāē tuha dhūyā acchaï suhēṇa || 14 ||
iya bhaṇiūṇa gaō sō rannā uṇa harisiēṇa niggantuṁ |
tā surasundari! piyasahi! tatthatthē kuṇasu mā cintaṁ || 16 ||
jamhā sō tuha jaṇaō tujjha piēṇēva nibbhaō vihiō |
jāyaṁ havijja aha kāraṇantaraṁ kimpi tujjha daïyassa |
tavvasaō sō piyasahi! na āgaō jhatti taṁ dīvaṁ || 18 ||
aha haṁsiyāē savvaṁ gantuṁ kamalāvaīē dēvīē |
siṭṭhaṁ tīēvi rannō jahaṭṭhiyaṁ sāhiyaṁ savvaṁ || 20 ||
vaccanti vāsarāiṁ suhēṇa jā kaïvi, tāva annadiṇē |
bhō bhō dhaṇadēva! tumaṁ āsi gaō siṁhaladdīvaṁ || 25 ||
tā kaha ṇu lahu niyattō kusalaṁ pōyassa kiñci nō jāyaṁ |
sigghaṁ jaṁ si niyattō mahantamacchērayaṁ ēyaṁ || 27 ||
jaha tattha gaō sigghaṁ samāgaō ēttha nayarammi || 28 ||
kamasō ya sayalabhaṇḍaṁ caḍāviyaṁ jāhi tattha bōhitthē |
ārụ̄dhō haṁ tattō vēlāē samāgayāē gahirāē |
jā vaccaï kaïvi hu jōyaṇāṇi vēgēṇa naranāha! || 47 ||
bāhāhiṁ kaha samuddaṁ aṇōrapāraṁ imaṁ taraī? || 49 ||
gantūṇa tēhiṁ bhaṇiō sō purisō bhadda! ittha āruhasu |
iya bhaṇiyō ārụ̄dhō samāgaō tāhi amha bōhitthē |
diṭṭhō ya maē naravara! taruṇanarō sō mahābhāgō || 52 ||
kiṁ bahuṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ aṇuharaē naravarinda! sō tumha |
diṭṭhammi tammi diṭṭhī amhaṁ sittavva amaēṇa || 54 ||
tā hōjja kiṁ nu ēsō jō taïyā aḍavipaḍiyāē || 55 ||
ahavā kiṁ maha imiṇā vicintaēṇēha tāva pucchāmi |
kō kattha kaha va ēsō paḍiō ya samuddamajjhammi? || 57 ||
iya cintiūṇa ya maē abbhaṅguvvaṭṭaṇāiyaṁ tassa |
puṭṭhō suhāsaṇagaō kaha ṇu tumaṁ dhīra! ēttha bhīmammi |
rayaṇāyarammi paḍiō kattha va tumhāṇa āvāsō? || 59 ||
tattō ya tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ nisuṇasu dhaṇadēva! vajjarijjantaṁ |
ēgaggamaṇō hōuṁ ētthatthē kōugaṁ jaï tē || 60 ||
tīē ya ahaṁ puttō maṇadaïō mayarakēunāmotti |
kamasō ya vaḍḍhamāṇō pattō haṁ jōvvaṇaṁ paḍhamaṁ || 63 ||
ēttō ya atthi nayaraṁ vēyaḍ̣dhē uttarāē sẹ̄dhīē |
sō maha piuṇō mittaṁ ahampi aïvallahō tassa || 65 ||
aha annayā kayāivi pattassa purammi camaracañcammi |
pīīi cittagaïṇā dinnā maha rōhiṇī vijjā || 66 ||
sā sattahiṁ māsēhiṁ tatthēṇa ṭhiēṇa sāhiyā vijjā |
tattō sāhiyavijjō sampattō niyapurē ahaṁ piuṇā |
picchaha kaha bālēṇavi raüddarūvāvi rōhiṇī vijjā |
ajjavi vijjāō kila sāhiumasamatthaō imō bālō |
iya cintāē na dinnā vijjāō imassa addēhiṁ || 70 ||
tā jaï imēṇa paḍhamaṁ raüddaruvāvi sāhiyā ēsā |
kā gaṇaṇā annāsimpi sāhaṇē hōjja ēyassa? || 71 ||
jamhā pamāyaōvi hu jāyāi imāi jāyaē vigdhaṁ |
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ piuṇā samappiyaṁ majjha aṅguliyaṁ || 78 ||
tayaṇantaraṁ samīrō sugandhagandhō ya vāiō maüō |
paviralaphusiyaṁ gandhōdagaṁ ca paḍiyaṁ tahiṁ divvaṁ || 85 ||
divvā ya kusumavuṭṭhī dasaddhavannā samantaō paḍiyā |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tāhiṁ amhē vijjāō tujjha siddhāō || 88 ||
agghāīyaṁ tāsiṁ pattēyaṁ jīi jaṁ uciyaṁ || 89 ||
vēyaḍ̣dhāō tāva ya tāōvi samāgaō tattha || 91 ||
kāuṁ jiṇassa pūyaṁ vihiṇā jiṇavandaṇaṁ ca kāūṇa |
vaccāmi jāva thōvaṁ bhūbhāgaṁ tāva picchāmi || 100 ||
ghittūṇa cavalayāē jhaḍatti chinnā kuḍaṅgī sā || 101 ||
tattha ya puvvapaviṭṭhō āsī khayarō u mayarakēutti |
sahasā sīsaṁ tassa ō jhaṁratayaṁ ruhirapabbhāraṁ || 103 ||
hā hā! ahō! akajjaṁ kayanti paridēviyaṁ bahuhā || 104 ||
avvō! pamāyavasaō vihiyā hiṁsā maē imā jāō |
tattō ya kimpi hōhī viggha maha mandabhaggassa? || 105 ||
tahavi hu vigghajayaṭhṭhā juttaṁ maha jāvapūyāiṁ || 106 ||
iya cintiya caliō haṁ aha phuriyaṁ dāhiṇēṇa nayaṇēṇa |
kiṁ mannē maha sūyaï sunimittamimanti cintintō || 107 ||
kaïvi hu payāṇi jāva ya vayāmi dhaṇadēva! tattha vaṇagahaṇē |
suttaṁva mucchiyaṁ piva sarīrasōhāē sūiyaṁ tivvaṁ |
tāva ya vivēyarahiyaṁ thaṇajuyalaṁ kāmuē daḍhaṁ dahaü |
pattasavaṇāṇa tumhaṁ nayaṇāṇa na hōi juttamiṇaṁ || 114 ||
iya bhaṇamāṇaṁ mannē jhīṇaṁ majjhaṁ tu tīi bālāē |
garuō sihiṇāṇa bharō vōḍhavvō kaha maïtti cintāē |
aṇurāillaṁ tīē bhaṇa kassa na cōraē cittaṁ? || 120 ||
iya taṁ sahasā daṭṭhuṁ diṭṭhī āṇandiyā daḍhaṁ majjha |
piyapaṇaïṇivva tāhē nirūviyā sā maē vigayaciṭṭhā |
niyaaṅguliṁ khivittā tīē vayaṇaṁ nirūviyaṁ jāva |
ēyaphalaviyārāō jāyā ō acēyaṇā imā nūṇaṁ |
tā nēuṁ saṭṭhāṇaṁ karēmi ēīi parikammaṁ || 124 ||
vijjāharassa kassavi dhūyā ēsā havijja iha pattā |
jaṁ puṇa acchipphuraṇaṁ maha hōhī bhāriyā tēṇa || 127 ||
na ya āsi majjha puvviṁ daṭhṭhūṇa imaṁ jahā jāō || 128 ||
tā nūṇaṁ bhaviyavvaṁ imāē sutaṇūē majjha daïyāē |
aha āsi tattha bhagiṇī piyaṁvayā aṇṇajaṇaṇī dhūyā mē |
puvvuddiṭṭhaṁ kahiyaṁ vuttantaṁ tāhi sē bhaṇiyā || 131 ||
tassalilaṁ pāintō tīē aṅgāiṁ tahaya siñcantō |
bhaṇiō piyaṁvayāē ēsā maha hōi bhagiṇitti || 134 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ maē kahaṁ puṇa katthavi diṭṭhā imā taē puvviṁ? |
rayaṇavaī u kusaggē daïyā naravāhaṇassa naravaïṇō |
tīē ēsā dhūyā kannā surasundarī nāma || 136 ||
tattha ya diṭṭhā ēsā vijjāē payaṁ tahiṁ ca vīsariyaṁ |
taha cittapaḍē lihiyaṁ rūvaṁ daṭṭhūṇa tumha ēyāē |
aviya | aïsundarotti mudiyaṁ daïō hōjjatti khijjiyaṁ bahuhā |
jaï tāva daṁsaṇampi hu hōjja kayatthatti nīsasiṁya || 140 ||
jaï tāva kāvi hu ahaṁ tā 'vassaṁ tassa saṅgamēṇa suhaṁ |
kāyavvaṁ bhagiṇīē iya bhaṇiyā ahaṁ ihaṁ pattā || 141 ||
ēmāi jāva sāhaï piyaṁvayā tīi puvvavuttantō |
tīē thuiṁ pạdhittā ussaggaṁ kariya taha saüssāsaṁ |
jāva ya samāgaō haṁ puṇaravi ya piyaṁvayā pāsammi |
rūyamāṇī sā diṭṭhā puṭṭhā ya piyaṁvayā mayā tāhē |
acchaï imīi jaṇaō tēṇa imā ruyaï sōgēṇa || 148 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyā sāhīṇē kiṅkarammi ēyammi |
kō tuha piyaraṁ sundari! sakkēi parābhavēuṁ jē? || 149 ||
jāvā gacchāmi ahaṁ hantuṁ sattuñjayaṁ durācāraṁ |
aha kōūhalavasaō gayaṇatthō pēcchiuṁ payattō haṁ |
aviya | appēha majjha kasiyaṁ kavayaṁ maha dēha sundaraṁ vapharaṁ |
aha khuppaü nīsēṇīṁ pāyārē ghaḍaü sūyariyā || 157 ||
dahaha tamaṅgāvaraṇaṁ chuhēha parihāsu pattharē paürē |
jantēhiṁ suraṅgāhi ya kasiyāhi ya viddavijjantā || 170 ||
iya paribalēṇa sahasā parāiē picchiūṇa purasuhaḍē |
bhaṇiō ya imō rē! rē! diṭṭhō taṁ ajja kālēṇa || 172 ||
jō maha daïyājaṇayassa paribhavaṁ kuṇasi akayavērassa |
purisō bhavasu iyāṇiṁ jaï saccaṁ suhaḍavāyamuvvahasi |
ghittūṇa tayaṁ kēsēsu jhatti aha matthayaṁ chinnaṁ || 174 ||
aha luyasīsaṁ daṭhṭhūṇa sāmiyaṁ paribalaṁ sasambhantaṁ |
aha taṁ sutikkhasaraniyara dhōraṇiṁ vañciuṁ payattēṇa |
tā accha niruvviggō ahayaṁ puṇa jāmi rayaṇadīvāō |
āṇēttu tumha dhūyaṁ jēṇa samappēmi sigghanti || 178 ||
pattō imaṁ paēsaṁ tāva ya sahasā maē diṭṭhō || 179 ||
rē! rē! taïyā jaṁ dinnamāsi daïyāvahāraō dukkhaṁ |
vaïrassa tassa antaṁ karēmi, diṭṭhō kahiṁ jāsi? || 183 ||
rē vaïriya! bālattē jīvantō tāva kahava chuṭṭō si? |
iṇhi nō puṇa chuṭṭasi chụdhō bhīmammi jalahimmi || 184 ||
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ sahasā pattō addaṁsaṇaṁ sa vēyālō |
puṇaruttajavijjantī jāva na sā vahaï nahagamā vijjā |
tāhē nāyaṁ nūṇaṁ hariyāō majjha vijjāō || 186 ||
kōvi hu ēsa payaṇḍō vaïrī asurotti cintayantēṇa |
ēvaṁ narinda! sāhaï jāva ya sō majjha niyayavuttantaṁ |
nijjāmaēṇa tāva ya sabhayaṁ ēvaṁ samullaviyaṁ || 188 ||
bhō bhō nāviyapurisā! sakannadhārā samujjayā hōha |
khalasaṅgayaṁva jaṁ kuṇaï saṅkhayaṁ jhatti vaḍḍhantaṁ || 190 ||
katthaï jhāṇōvagayā jhāyaï sā jōgiṇivva nikkampā |
katthaï kantāragayā thērī iva mandayaṁ vayaï || 202 ||
ummattiyavva tattō iō taō sāyarammi bhamamāṇā |
avvō! kaha ṇu akaṇḍē jāō dhaṇapariyaṇaviṇāsō? || 218 ||
kaha sō mahāṇubhāvō hōhī bhaggammi jāṇavattammi? |
ēmāi cintayantō kaïvi hu divasāṇi jāva acchāmi |
bhō dhaṇadēva! mahāyasa! uvviggō kīsa acchasē ēvaṁ? |
aha kayaabbhuṭṭhāṇō avagụ̄dhō tēṇa sāyaraṁ ahayaṁ |
bhaṇiō ya mamaṁ parijāṇasīha kiṁvā na taṁ bhadda! || 224 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ajjavi sammaṁ na yāṇimō dēva! |
tā sāhijjaü amhaṁ kō si tumaṁ kattha diṭṭhō vā? || 225 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ dēvēṇa taō āsi taē hatthiṇāurē nayarē |
jō ya tayā aḍavīē satthavilōvammi suppaïṭṭhassa |
parahiyaraēṇa tumaē arahaṁ dēvō susāhuṇō guruṇō |
jassāsi taē taïyā sō haṁ bhō! dēvasammajiō || 232 ||
tattō ya maē bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ ēyanti kintu pucchami |
ṭhāṇammi kammi acchaï tumhē sāhēha maha ēyaṁ | || 234 ||
aha suravarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ nisuṇasu mērussa dakkhiṇadisāē |
nāmēṇa daübhāsō tassa ya siharammi atthi varabhavaṇaṁ |
tattha ya vasāmi ahayaṁ sāmāṇiyadasasahassa pariyariō |
lavaṇasamuddē annāvi atthi sivayā ō rāyahāṇī mē |
sivayāi tīi bahusō acchāmi ahaṁ aṇēyadēvīhiṁ |
tā bhadda! tuha pasāyāō ērisī pāviyā maē riddhī |
āyāō tuhadaṁsaṇakaṅkhī, bhaṇa jaṁ maē kiccaṁ? || 243 ||
tā kīsa na gēṇhāmō jiṇadikkhaṁ iya vicintēntō || 244 ||
bhaṇiō puṇōvi dēvēṇa hōi dēvāṇa daṁsaṇamamōhaṁ |
tattha ya gayassa hiyaïcchiyampi hōhī mahābhāga! || 246 ||
ēvanti maē bhaṇiē divvavimāṇaṁ viuvviyaṁ sahasā |
raṇayanivahaṁ taddīvatthaṁ aṇēyapayārayaṁ naravara! varaṁ ghēttuṁ majjhaṁ samappiya sāyaraṁ |
sivagapahuṇā sammaṁ divvē vimāṇavarē ṭhiō gayapurapuraṁ tēṇāṇīō khaṇēṇa taō ahaṁ || 248 ||
ēvaṁ ca jāva sāhaï dhaṇadēvō naravaïssa vuttantaṁ |
hā! maha imassa dukkhāgarassa hiyayassa vajjaghaḍiyassa |
assōyavvaṁ sōccāvi phuṭṭaē jaṁ na saïkhaṇḍaṁ || 2 ||
kiṁ dhariēhiṁ iṇhiṁ imēhiṁ pāṇēhiṁ dukkhanilaēhiṁ? |
saï daṁsaṇēvi nēhassa pagarisō daṁsiō taē nāha! |
kaha hōhisi nāha! tumaṁ jāṇavivattīē jalahimmi? || 5 ||
hā! kaha sasaṅkakaranimmalaṁ muhaṁ nāha! tuha palōissaṁ |
jaṁ ērisēva nisuē ajjavi jīvāmi pāvā haṁ || 7 ||
hā! puttaya! aḍavīē taïyā maha jāyamittaō hariō |
iṇhimpi akayadaṁsaṇa! kattha gaō maha aünnāē? || 10 ||
dhannā ēsā jīē tāva ya tuha putta! pulaïyaṁ vayaṇaṁ |
hā! hā! ahaṁ ahannā jāē jāōvi na hu diṭṭhō || 11 ||
jaṁ taïyā kulavaïṇā āiṭṭhaṁ, hōjja kiṁ nu taṁ aliyaṁ |
kīsa visannō naravara! vilavasi kiṁvā tumaṁ dēvi! || 16 ||
kiṁ taṁ visumariyaṁ bhē nēmittiyasumaïṇā jamāiṭṭhaṁ |
tattō sigghaṁ hōhī samāgamō tumha niyayaputtēṇa |
tā mā tūraha sampaï milihī sō natthi sandēhō || 18 ||
jaṁ sō jahatthavāī sumaī uvaladdhapaccaō bahusō |
tā mā kuṇaha visāyaṁ jāēvi hu jāṇabhaṅgammi || 19 ||
ēvaṁ ca samāsāsaï dhaṇadēvō jāva niuṇavayaṇēhiṁ |
kiṁ kiṁ imanti jampanti jāva atthāṇasaṇṭhiyā lōyā |
bhaṇaï ya kayappaṇāmō purassa puvvuttarē disābhāē |
taṁ sōūṇa narindō sāṇandō vandiuṁ caliō || 27 ||
dēvi! tumampi hu paüṇā sahiyā surasundarīē hōhitti |
laddhūṇavi taṁ dulahaṁ micchattāīhiṁ mōhiyā bahavē |
na kuṇanti parattha hiyaṁ visayāmisalōluyā jīvā || 33 ||
mụ̄dhā tumhē dhuttēhiṁ vañciyā natthi kōvi jaṁ jīvō |
jō paralōyaṁ gacchaï suhaduhabhōttā amuttō vā || 36 ||
tavvasagā puṇa kālaṁ kāuṁ nivaḍanti ghōranaraēsu |
tattha ya tē uvavannā paramāhammiyasurēhiṁ virasantā |
vōlijjanti rasantā hā! hā! māyatti jampantā || 46 ||
kiṁ bahuṇā | acchinimīliyamittaṁ natthi suhaṁ dukkhamēṁva santattaṁ |
tattō lahanti jaï kahavi dullahaṁ māṇusattaṇaṁ jīvā |
tatthavi jāyaï dukkhaṁ sārīraṁ māṇasaṁ vivihaṁ || 53 ||
pavisanti visamavivaraṁ laṅghati ya jalanihiṁ dīṇā || 55 ||
vivihāvayāhi ya tahā kō puṇa taṁ vanniuṁ taraï? || 57 ||
ghippanti jarāi taō marēnti tattō sunivvinnā || 58 ||
jaï kaïvi hu dēvattaṁ pāvinti tahimpi jāyaē dukkhaṁ |
parariddhiṁ pēcchantā bhiccā viva sāmiēṇa āṇattā |
jāyanti cavaṇasamaē dēvāvi hu dukkhiyā dhaṇiyaṁ || 60 ||
taṁ natthi kimpi ṭhāṇaṁ aṇantukhattō na jaṁ ēntaṁ || 61 ||
tā bhō dēvāṇupiyā! karēha jiṇadēsiyaṁ dhammaṁ || 62 ||
sō duvigappō bhaṇiō jaïdhammō taha gihatthadhammō ya |
jīvāiṇō payatthā tattaṁ puṇa hōi vinnēyaṁ || 64 ||
bandhō mukkhō ya tahā tattāṇi imāṇi nava honti || 65 ||
suhumā bāyara bēindiyā ya tēindiyā ya caürindī |
dhammā 'dhammā ' 'gāsā tiyatiyabhēyā ya tahēva kālō ya |
tiṇṇi ya āuṇi tahā bāyālaṁ punnapagaḍīō || 68 ||
nāmassa caüttīsaṁ tiṇha ya ēkkikka pāvāu || 69 ||
indiya kasāya avvaya kiriṇā paṇa caüra paṇa ya paṇavīsā |
jōgā tinnēva bhavē bāyālaṁ āsavō bhaṇiō || 70 ||
samiī guttī dhammō aṇuppēhaparīsahā carittaṁ ca |
aṇasaṇabhēyāi tavō bārasahā tēṇa nijjarā bhaṇiyā |
ēēsiṁ saddahāṇē arihaṁ dēvō susāhuṇō guruṇō |
kāyavvā jēṇa dayā chaṇhavi puḍhavāiyāṇa jīvāṇa |
tiṇamittampi adinnaṁ na ya ghittavvaṁ asuddhacittēṇa |
samiīu pañca guttīu tinni niccaṁ ca sēviyavvāō |
saddāisu visaēsuṁ rāgaddōsā na cēva kāyavvā |
abbhasiyavvō viṇaō pāvā sacchandayā na kāyavvā |
khantī maddava ajjava muttī tavasañjamē ya bōddhabvē |
saccaṁ sōyaṁ ākiñcaṇaṁ ca bambhaṁ jaïdhammō || 86 ||
majjaṁ visayakasāyā niddā vigahā ya pañcamī bhaṇiyā |
kīrantō jaïdhammō khippaṁ mōkkhammi nēi naranāha! |
pañca ya aṇuvvayāiṁ guṇavvayāiṁ ca honti tinnēva |
patthāvaṁ nāūṇaṁ rannā sūrī imaṁ puṭṭhō || 92 ||
vuḍ̣dhiṅgaō sa kattha va bhayavaṁ! kaïyā va amha sō milihī? |
aha kēvaliṇā bhaṇiyaṁ kahimō āyannasu narinda! || 95 ||
tīē ambaḍavaṇiṇō mahilā nāmēṇa atthi acchuttā |
tīē kamēṇa jāyā vararūvā tinni puttāō || 97 ||
dāṇarayā santuṭṭhā suhēṇa acchanti tē vaṇiṇō || 99 ||
aha annayā kayāivi lacchī vaṇṭhēṇa ninnanāmēṇa |
patthēi ya taṁ bahusō sā puṇa taṁ nēcchaī maṇēṇāvi |
aha annayā talāē tōyanimittaṁ gayā lacchī || 101 ||
bhillēhiṁ samaṁ jujjhammi māriō ninnaō rannē || 103 ||
gahiyābharaṇā lacchī mukkā bhillēhiṁ tattha aḍavīē |
hiṇḍantī tattha mūḍhadisā asiyā sīhēṇa chuhiēṇa || 104 ||
aha sā malhaṇapattī sarassatī mōhilēṇa vaṇiēṇa |
aha malhaṇēṇa rannō gantuṁ siṭṭhammi tammi vuttantē |
jambuddīvē ētthaṁ atthi purī mēhalāvatī nāma |
bhīmarahō tatthāsī rāyā kusumāvalī u sē dēvī |
kaṇagarahō sē nāmaṁ vihiyaṁ uciyammi samayammi || 110 ||
juvarāya paē ṭhaviō bhujaï māṇussaē pavarabhōē |
tīi nayarīi ibbhā sahōyara dōnni āsi satthāhā |
sāgaradattō ya tahā samuddadattō ya supasiddhā || 113 ||
aha sō ninnayavaṇṭhō nihaō bhillēhiṁ tattha aḍavīē |
sōvi hu malhaṇajīvō kālaṁ kāūṇa āupajjantē |
ēttō ya atthi nayarī vijayā tatthēva ēravaē || 117 ||
tīē samiddhijuttō dhaṇabhūī nāma āsi satthāhō |
aha candaṇōvi vaṇiō mariuṇa taō sudhammanāmassa |
tatthēva ya ēravaē supaïṭṭhapurammi āsi haridattō |
ibbhō tassa ya mahilā viṇayavaī viṇayasañjuttā || 120 ||
puttō uṇa vasudattō aha sā lacchī tayā ō aḍavīē |
viṇayavaīē dhūyā jāyā ō sulōyaṇatti nāmēṇa |
sāvi hu candaṇabhajjā kālaṁ kāūṇa sampayā tattō |
ēvaṁ ca tāō tinnivi vasēṇa bhaviyavvāyāi ēgattha |
aviya | jēṭṭhā sulōyaṇā sā pariṇīyā ninnavaṇṭhajīvēṇa |
tīē uṇa sō na tahā, ēvaṁ vaccanti divasāiṁ || 131 ||
kayaünnā sā jīē ēsō daïotti cintēi || 134 ||
kāvi hu cumbaï bālaṁ annā sahiyāi laggaē galaē |
annā karēi gīyaṁ kāvi hu uccaṁ samullavaï || 139 ||
ēvaṁ ca samayaṇāhiṁ pulaïjjantō sa nayaranārīhiṁ |
puṭṭhō aṇēṇa sumaī bālavayaṁsō vayasaṁ! kassēsā |
sāgaradattasuyassa ō iya bhaṇiē sumaïṇā kamasō || 146 ||
kiṁ majjha vibhūīē kiṁvā antaürēṇa rajjēṇa? |
jō tīē muhakamalē chappayalīlaṁ na pāvēmi || 148 ||
jaïvi hu lōyaviruddhaṁ sukuluppannāṇa ērisaṁ kajjaṁ |
tahavi hu tīē viuttō sattō dhariuṁ na jīyampi || 149 ||
jaï tāva sāvi icchaï khivāmi antēurē niyaē || 150 ||
iya cintiūṇa tēṇaṁ paḍuyā pavvāiyā samāṇattā |
taha kuṇasu tumaṁ bhayavaï! jaha sā maē paṇaïṇī hōi || 151 ||
tīēvi gantu viyaṇē taha sā ābhāsiyā suniuṇāē |
uvviggā viva dīsasi kīsa tumaṁ putti! kēṇa bhē kajjaṁ? |
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavaï! maha hiyayaṁ dullahaṁ jaṇaṁ mahaï |
jaha kāvi sāramēī icchaï sīhēṇa saṅgamamalajjā |
taha cēva ahaṁ bhayavaï! saṅgaṁ icchāmi kumarēṇa || 155 ||
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ idampi putti! āṇēmi mantasattīē |
kittiyamēttaṁ ēyaṁ maha mantō jattha vipphuraï || 156 ||
mā putti! kuṇa visāyaṁ jāvaṁ mantassa taha payacchissaṁ |
ajjavi ya kumārēṇaṁ jaha saṅgō jāyaē tujjha || 157 ||
taha kāyavvaṁ bhayavaï! na hōi jaha majjha lāghavaṁ lōē |
iya bhaṇiūṇaṁ tīē dinnā muttāvalī niyayā || 158 ||
pavvāiyāē tattō gantuṁ kumarassa sāhiyaṁ savvaṁ |
na ya icchaï taṁ mōttuṁ tāhē nāūṇa tassa nibbandhaṁ |
rannā paürā bhaṇiyā asamatthā amhē kumarassa || 162 ||
sāmēṇa tā na muñcaï daṇḍō kumarammi tīraï na kāuṁ |
tā khamaha ēkkamēyaṁ avarāhaṁ amha kumarassa || 163 ||
cintēi na rajjaṭhiiṁ na nīi bāhiṁ na dēi atthāṇaṁ |
aha annayā kayāivi paribhūyā hanti jāyakōvāē |
tassa ya vasēṇa dōnnivi sahasā ummattayāṇi jāyāṇi |
tēvi hu karinti kiriyaṁ bhūyavigārotti mannantā || 171 ||
aviya | kāuṁ sarīrarakkhaṁ gāḍhaṁ gahiūṇa kēvi muddāsu |
ālihiya mañja 'lēsuṁ kēvi hu viṇivēsiūṇa uvaüttā |
pāraddhāō na uṇō kōvi guṇō tāṇa sañjāō || 175 ||
bhañjittā niyalāiṁ nihuyaṁ ciya niggayāiṁ nayarīō |
iya naravara! saṁsārē suhiō hōūṇa jāyaē duhiō |
rāyāvi bhamaï bhikkhaṁ suvaï mahīē nirāvaraṇō || 178 ||
hiṇḍanti tāiṁ bhikkhaṁ gihē gihē dukkhataviyāiṁ || 179 ||
picchasu naravara! jāyaṁ taṁ mihuṇaṁ kammadōsēṇaṁ || 181 ||
ēyaṁ ca tāva ēvaṁ, ēttō u purīē vijayanāmāē |
ēttō ya dhaṇavaīvi hu vasumaïyāē siṇēhajuttāē |
jaha sō mōhilavaṇiō rannā nivvāsiō sadēsāō |
kāuṁ dhaṇavaïrūvaṁ uvabhuttā tēṇa vasumaī muddhā |
avahariya tēṇa mukkō ihēva bharahē viṇīyāē || 190 ||
ēvaṁ ca aṇaṅgavaī vasumaïajjāi saṁyuyā tattha |
aha annayā kayāivi viyārabhūmiṁ gayāhiṁ ēyāhiṁ |
ajjē! vasumaï! ēsā bhagiṇīi sulōyaṇāi aṇuharaï |
bhaṇiyaṁ ca vasumaīē suiraṁ nijjhāiūṇa savisāyaṁ |
ēsō sō kaṇagarahō ēsāvi sulōyaṇā nūṇaṁ || 199 ||
tattō gantuṁ dōhivi mahuraṁ ābhāsiyaṁ tayaṁ juyalaṁ |
uggāyaï hasaï naccaï bōllaï asamañjasaṁ bahuyaṁ || 200 ||
aïsayanāṇī ya guru puṭṭhō ummāyakāraṇaṁ tāhiṁ |
bhaṇiō ajjāhiṁ guru bhayavaṁ! jaï atthi kōvi paḍijōgō |
tā ēyāṇa paüñjaha jaï picchaha kiñciṁ uvagāraṁ || 203 ||
aha tāṇa vasumaīē siṭṭhō savvōvi puvvavuttantō |
paradārapasattēṇaṁ jaṁ pāvaṁ cikkaṇaṁ taē baddhaṁ |
ēttōvi aṇantaguṇaṁ kaḍuyavivāgaṁ phalaṁ tu paralōē |
aha aṇasaṇēṇa sūri kālaṁ kāūṇa bīyakappammi |
ghaṇavāhaṇōvi mariuṁ jāō sāmāṇiō surō tassa |
ēttō ya sō subandhū daïyāi guruvirahasōyasaṁsattō |
taō | niyayagharammi na ciṭṭhaï hiṇḍaï ujjāṇakāṇaṇaïsu
kattha gayā kēṇa hiyā kīsa nilukkā si jampantō || 221 ||
kaha ruṭṭhā maha sundari! jēṇa na daṁsēsi appayaṁ sigghaṁ |
huṁ huṁ diṭṭhā diṭṭhā pasīya maha dēsu paḍivayaṇaṁ || 222 ||
jaṁ jaṁ picchaï lōyaṁ taṁ taṁ pucchaï, taē piyā diṭṭhā? |
tattha ya sē kulavaïṇā maṇayaṁ sañjāyasatthacittassa |
niyadhammō parikahiō tassavi sō pariṇaō tāhē || 226 ||
cintēi kattha vaïrī sā vā maha duṭṭhamahilatti? || 230 ||
dussīlā sā pāvā aṇurattaṁ taha mamaṁ pariccaïya |
āsattā kaṇagarahē sacciya tā vaïriṇī paḍhamaṁ || 231 ||
tārisadukkhaṁ dinnaṁ taïyā maha jēhiṁ duṭṭhasīlēhiṁ |
iṇhiṁ gantuṁ dōnnivi hantavvāiṁ maē tāiṁ || 232 ||
iya cintiūṇa vēgēṇa āgaō rōsaphuraphurantō sō |
kiṁ bahuṇā bhaṇiēṇaṁ nigghiṇahiyaēṇa tēṇa asurēṇa |
sāvi hu pabhāyasamaē kāussaggē ṭhiyā suhajjhāṇē |
iya bhaṇiya tēṇa samayaṁ gāḍhaṁ bandhitu jaliyadaṇḍēhiṁ |
haṇiūṇa takkhaṇēṇaṁ sāvi taō māriyā tēṇa || 245 ||
iya bhō naravara! daṭṭhuṁ rāgaddōsāṇa dāruṇavivāgaṁ |
vahaṁ vihāyā ' 'su pahiṭhṭhamāṇasō muṇīṇa sō ambarisī surāhamō |
kayatthamappāṇa maṇē gaṇantō jahāgayaṁ tāhi gaō saṭhāṇayaṁ || 248 ||
aha sō kayasamaṇavahō aṁvarisī muiyamāṇasō tattha |
iha bharahē vippasuō uvavannō duggaō nāma || 4 ||
tatthavi sumariyavaïrō uvaōgaṁ dēi tāṇa dōṇhampi |
ēvaṁ vaccaï kālō narinda! sēsāuyassa aha tassa |
īsāṇakappavāsī vihuppahō sō surō taō caviuṁ |
āgamma taō turiyaṁ ahiṭṭhiō tēṇa kuñjarō sahasā |
iya cintēntō naravara! kayakiccō sō surō gaō ṭhāṇaṁ |
aha puṇaravi sō dēvō vaïraṁ sariūṇa nigghiṇasahāvō |
niuṇaṁ jōyantēṇavi pabhūyakālāō pāva! diṭṭhō si |
naravara! sō tuha puttō hariō surakālabāṇēṇa || 21 ||
gahiūṇa ya taṁ bālaṁ cintēi surō kiliṭṭhapariṇāmō |
mārēmi imaṁ sattuṁ iṇhiṁ maliūṇa hatthēhiṁ || 22 ||
khaṇḍāṇi ahaṁ kāuṁ karēmi kiṁvā disābaliṁ ahavā |
acchōḍēmi silāē tilaṁ tilaṁ kiṁ nu chindāmi? || 23 ||
ēvaṁ hi kaē ahavā na hōjja viyaṇā pabhūyakālīyā |
tā gantūṇaṁ katthavi muñcāmi amāṇūsammi ṭhāṇammi |
sō tuha puttō naravara! surōvi pattō niyaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ || 26 ||
naravara! acchaü ēyaṁ kahēmi annaṁ kahantaraṁ tāva |
nāmēṇa cittavēgō ēttō dēvīvi candarēhā sā |
ēttō ya puvvabhaṇiō sulōyaṇāiṇa āsi jō māyā |
vasudattō nāmēṇaṁ sōvi hu bhamiūṇa saṁsārē || 31 ||
nahavāhaṇotti nāmaṁ variyā aha tassa kaṇagamālā sā |
hariūṇa ya pariṇīyā chalēṇa sā cittavēgēṇa || 33 ||
nahavāhaṇēṇa baddhō sō khayarō nāgiṇīi vijjāē |
iya naravara! saṁsārē annāṇandhēhiṁ ēttha jīvēhiṁ |
bhagiṇīvi ahilasijjaï dhūyā suṇhā va jaṇaṇī vā || 36 ||
bhagiṇīvi hōi bhajjā, piyāvi puttō, suyāvi jaṇaṇitti |
ēyaṁ ca tujjha naravara! dhaṇadēvēṇēva sāhiyaṁ puvvaṁ |
bahuvihavijjāhiṁ samaṁ jāō khayarāhivō taō ēsō |
bhuñjaï daïyāē samaṁ vēyaḍ̣dhē tattha visayasuhaṁ || 39 ||
candappahāvi dēvī jāyā ya piyaṅgumañjarī tassa |
bhajjā sō tīi samaṁ bhuñjaï māṇussaē mōē || 41 ||
tassa ya uttarasẹ̄dhī samayaṁ vijjāhiṁ cittavēgēṇa |
dinnā siṇēhasāraṁ iya tē acchanti vēyaḍ̣dhē || 42 ||
aha annayā kayāī sahiō daïyāē kaṇagamālāē |
vandittu paḍiniyattō piccaï taṁ bālayaṁ tattha || 45 ||
daṭṭhūṇa aṅgulīyaganivēsiyaṁ taṁ maṇiṁ sa vimhaïō |
bhaṇaï ya piē! sa ēsō divvamaṇī suravaradinnō || 47 ||
jassa pabhāvāu tayā bhuyaṅgaparivẹ̄dhiōvi na maō haṁ |
tā kēṇa ēsa baddhō imasma bālasma galayammi? || 48 ||
baddhō havējja tattō kēṇavi hariūṇa iha mukkō || 49 ||
tā gēṇha piē! ēyaṁ hōu aputtāē ēsa tuha puttō |
sōcciya nūṇaṁ hōhī surajīvō ēsa uppannō || 50 ||
gahiūṇa tayaṁ naranāha! dōvi pattāiṁ niyayanayarammi |
jāō u kaṇagamālāi guttagabbhāi sampayaṁ puttō |
vijjāharindabhavaṇē ēvaṁ vaḍḍhaï narinda! tuha puttō |
ēttō ya tassa dēvī sayampabhā dēvalōgāō || 53 ||
aha kamasō vaḍḍhantī ēsāvi hu jōvvaṇaṁ pattā || 54 ||
hariūṇa jēṇa nīyā taïyā khayarēṇa rayaṇadīvaṁmi |
sō ya sulōyaṇajammē haridattō āsi sē jaṇaō || 55 ||
iya piccha viruvattaṁ bhavassa dukkhāgarassa naranāha! |
icchaï bhōē bhōttuṁ jaṇaō dhūyāē saha jattha || 56 ||
avahariuṁ vijjāō chụ̄dhō jalahimmi tuha puttō || 57 ||
surasundarimpi tattō jāyapaōsō sa jāva gayaṇēṇa |
avaharaï tāva naravara! sañjāō cavaṇasamaō sē || 58 ||
tassa ya cuyassa ēsā paḍiyā gayaṇāō ēttha ujjāṇē |
diṭṭhō piyaṁvayāē aha nīō tēṇa saṭṭhāṇaṁ || 60 ||
taṁ jaṁ tumaē puṭṭhaṁ taṁ ēyaṁ sāhiyaṁ naravarinda! |
milihī puṇa ajjēva ya viyālasamayammi sō tujjha || 61 ||
sōūṇa sūrivayaṇaṁ rāyā surasundarī ya dēvī ya |
pattā ya gurupamōyaṁ parisā savvāvi saṁviggā || 62 ||
tattō rannā bhaṇiyaṁ jāva ya puttēṇa saṅgamō tāva |
kāhāmi taō sahalaṁ maṇuyattaṁ tuha pāsammi || 63 ||
kiṁ jāyaṁ tumhāṇaṁ kahavā samaṇattaṇaṁ pattaṁ? || 65 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ guruṇā nisuṇasu taïyā samaraṅgaṇammi jujjhantō |
diṭṭhō ya taṁ paēsaṁ samāgaēṇaṁ sucittavēgēṇaṁ |
vihiō ya takkhaṇaṁ ciya ōsahisāmatthaō ahaṁ sattha |
pannattīnāmēṇaṁ vihiṇā sā sāhiyā maē tattha |
siddhatthapurē jāō rāyā haṁ tāhi dhaṇadēva! || 70 ||
parivāliūṇa rajjaṁ kaïvi hu varisāṇa kōḍikōḍīō |
kāūṇa ya sēlēsiṁ khaviuṁ cattāri sēsakammāiṁ |
sō amha guru pattō nivvāṇaṁ bhadda! dhaṇadēva! || 74 ||
iya supaïṭṭhasūrī jāva ya parikahaï niyayavuttantaṁ |
iya nayarē ajjēva ya iya tumha piyaṁ nivēēmi || 78 ||
dinnaṁ aṅgavilaggaṁ pabhūyadavvaṁ ca sē rannā || 79 ||
paṇamiya sūriṁ rāyā puraṁ paviṭṭhō sapariyaṇō tāhē |
annaṁ ca ēvamāī karēha kārēha paüralōēṇa |
iya tē rannā bhaṇiyā savisēsaṁ kariumāḍhattā || 87 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ piyaṁvayāē atthi tumaṁ tāva tēṇa ukkhittā |
vēyālēṇa ahaṁ puya paḍiyā mucchāi bhūmīē || 90 ||
hā! kattha gayā bhagiṇī kīsa na sō āgaō bhāyā? || 91 ||
nūṇaṁ tēṇa pisāēṇa hōjja vihiyaṁ asōhaṇaṁ kimpi |
ēmāi cintayantī gavēsiuṁ tāhi laggā haṁ || 92 ||
aha tattha rayaṇadīvē samantaō hiṇḍiūṇa gayaṇatthā |
ukkhiviūṇa tattō nīō jiṇamandirammi aha tammi |
puṭṭhō ya kaha ṇu paḍiō samuddamajjhammi, aha tēṇa || 95 ||
kahiō aha maha tēṇavi bhaṇiyaṁ surasundarī kattha? || 96 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ maēvi bhāōya pisāyarūvēṇa sāvi avahariyā |
iya sōuṁ gurumōggarahaüvva sō mucchiō sahasā || 97 ||
tāhē gantuṁ tāyassa sāhiō nahayarēhiṁ vuttantō |
taṁ sōuṁ gurusōgō tāōvi samāgaō tattha || 99 ||
kahakahavi hu saṇṭhaviuṁ nīō vēyaḍḍhapavvaē kumarō |
iya bhaṇiuṁ paṭṭhaviyā bahavē vijjāharā ō tāēṇa |
vaccanti jāva tāva ya annammi diṇammi tattha purē || 103 ||
tassa ya vandaṇahēuṁ viṇiggaō kumarasañjuō tāō |
jāyanti na jīvāṇaṁ jē ō adinnaṁ na giṇhanti || 109 ||
dhammōvagaraṇavajjaṁ pariggahaṁ jē kayāi na dharēnti |
tē bhavajalahiṁ tariūṇaṁ janti ayarāmaṇaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ || 111 ||
patthāvaṁ nāūṇaṁ kumarēṇa muṇī imaṁ puṭṭhō || 112 ||
bhayavaṁ! vijjācchēō kīsa kaō majjha tēṇa dēvēṇa? |
sariūṇa ya puvvabhavaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kumarēṇa ēvamēyanti |
hariūṇa kattha mukkā bhayavaṁ! surasundarī tēṇa? || 115 ||
tattō muṇiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ cuyassa dēvassa tassa hatthāō |
hatthiṇapurammi acchaï sampaï sā tujjha kumara! jaṇaṇīē |
kiṁ maha na hōi jaṇaō ēsō jaṇaṇīva kaṇagamālatti |
kiṁ kumara! taṁ na sumarisi jaṁ taïyā dēvabhāvammi || 119 ||
tumaē ciya maha siṭṭhaṁ avahariō puvvavēriyasurēṇa |
ēyaṁ taṁ sañjāyaṁ tā puṇaravi putta! tāō vijjāō |
sāhēsu, cayasu sōgaṁ niyayapaē jēṇa ṭhāvēmi || 121 ||
iya surasundari! jāva ya tāō vajjaraï tāva sahasatti |
jāṇasi kumāra! sō haṁ puvvabhavē āsi tuha jaṇaō || 124 ||
bhīmarahō nāmēṇaṁ majjha ya aïvallahō tumaṁ āsi |
niuṇaṁ gavēsiōvi hu jāhē sampāviō na tumaṁ || 126 ||
tāhē tuha lahubhāyaṁ vajjarahaṁ ṭhāviūṇaṁ rajjammi |
kāūṇaṁ pavvajjaṁ sōhammē suravarō ahaṁ jāō |
jāō ya uciyasamaē nāmaṁ ca kayaṁ pahaṅkarō majjha |
naṭṭhā bhaēṇa jaṇaṇī timāsajāyaṁ mamaṁ ghittuṁ || 131 ||
pattā vijayapurammī rannō saṅkhassa bhāuṇō pāsē |
jōvvamapattō ya ahaṁ saṅkhēṇa samaṁ gaō tattha || 132 ||
kāūṇa ya saṅgāmaṁ vimalaṁ haṇiūṇa samaramajjhammi |
campāē niyarajjē jāō rāyā ahaṁ tāhē || 133 ||
balagavviō ya ahayaṁ samayaṁ hatthīhiṁ tattha khēllāmi |
tēṇa ya majjha pasiddhī jāyā savvēsu dēsēsu || 135 ||
rajjaṁ pabhūyakālaṁ ahampi campāi tattha kāūṇaṁ |
jāō samaṇō tattō abhiggahō ērisō maē gahiō |
aha annayā kayāivi viharantō hatthisīsaē pattō |
taṁ katthaṁ balaṁ sampaï gaïndapaḍipēlliṇēkkarasiyaṁ tē? |
iya bhaṇamāṇā tāhē hantuṁ uddhāiyā savvē || 141 ||
daṭṭhūṇa ya tē kuviō ahampi annāṇadōsēṇa || 142 ||
ghēttūṇa khambhamēgaṁ tattō uddhāiō iya bhaṇantō |
rē! rē! sīhassa balaṁ khaṇḍijjaï kiṁ siyālēhiṁ? || 143 ||
jaïvi ahaṁ kisadēhō tahavi hu gammō na tumha tā hōha |
hayamahiē tē kāuṁ pacchāyāvāō aṇasaṇaṁ kāuṁ |
lajjāē duccariyaṁ na ya taṁ siṭṭhaṁ gurujaṇassa || 145 ||
tattō appaḍikkantō khaṇḍiyacaraṇō maō taō kumara!
uvavannō dharaṇindō sampaï sō haṁ ihāyāō || 146 ||
tā mā kuṇasu visāyaṁ maē vidinnāō tujjha sijjhantu |
iya tavvayaṇaṁ sōuṁ mahāpasāutti jampiuṁ kumarō |
tō bhaṇaï mayarakēū na tāva pariṇēmi annakannāō |
jāva na sā pariṇīyā dhūyā naravāhaṇanivassa || 152 ||
tō bhaṇaï bhāṇuvēgō iṇhiṁ gantuṁ kusagganayarammi |
tō bhaṇaï mayarakēū ēvaṁ sigghaṁ karēsu, amhēvi |
iya bhaṇiē uppaïō gayaṇēṇaṁ bhāṇuvēgō sō || 155 ||
aha mayarakēu-rāyā bhaṇiyō tāēṇa putta! ajjēva |
gantuṁ rannō siṭṭhaṁ aha rāyā harisa-paḍihatthō || 159 ||
aha amarakēu rāyā taṇayaṁ āliṅgiūṇa sasiṇēhaṁ |
āliṅgiō ya bahusō ya cumbiō uttimaṅgammi || 169 ||
jaṇaṇīi putta! hiyayaṁ jīvaï jā tujjha virahammi || 170 ||
tō bhaṇaï mayarakēu kiṁ kīraï amba! viviha-laliyassa |
vihiṇō paravvasāṇaṁ jāyaï jaṁ ērisaṁ dukkhaṁ || 171 ||
taṁ kimpi āsi taïyā tēsiṁ taṇayassa saṅgamē sōkkhaṁ |
kahiṁupiṁ jaṁ na tīraï saṅkāsaṁ muttisōkkhēṇa || 174 ||
maggantāṇavi puvviṁ na ya dinnā anna-rāīṇa || 176 ||
santtujaya-ruddhassiha maha dinnaṁ jēṇa jīviyaṁ taïyā |
surasundarīvi dinnā tassa maē kimiha pucchāē? || 178 ||
tēṇavi bhaṇiyaṁ nara-vara! iō diṇāō taïjja divasammi |
ērisa-guṇa-sañjuttaṁ annaṁ laggaṁ na labbhaē sigghaṁ |
rannāvi taō bhaṇiyaṁ āsannamiṇaṁ tu kahamēttha || 181 ||
tō bhāṇuvēga! sahasu kō kīraï iha uvāutti? || 182 ||
aha tēṇavi paḍibhaṇiyaṁ gammaü naranāha! hatthiṇapurammi |
tattha ya sampattāṇaṁ savvampi hu sundaraṁ hōhī? || 183 ||
aha amarakēū rāyā tēsiṁ kāūṇa sayala-paḍivattiṁ |
dinnaṁ ca mahā-dāṇaṁ paürāī bhōjiō lōō || 189 ||
uvaviṭṭhā aha guruṇā kahiō jiṇadēsiō dhammō || 194 ||
aha vandiūṇa sūriṁ dēvī kamalāvaī imaṁ bhaṇaï |
bhayavaṁ! annammi bhavē āsi kayaṁ ki maē pāvaṁ? || 195 ||
jō sō 'varakaṅkāē ammaḍa vaṇiotti āsi mē kahiō |
sō bhamiūṇa bhavōhaṁ maru-dēsē harisaūya gāmammi |
mēharō ajjuṇa nāmō ihēva bharahammi uvavannō || 198 ||
acchuttāvi hu tattō bhamiuṇa bhavēsu viviha-rūvēsu |
mahilā ajjuṇagassa u bandhusirī nāma uvavannā || 199 ||
pattē pāusa-kālē paḍiē aha paṇiyammi paürammi |
tattha ya ēgō kamalō sagabbha hariṇīē saṅgaō vasaï |
aha annayā paviṭṭhaṁ khittē daṭṭhūṇa hariṇajuyalaṁ taṁ |
naṭṭhō sāraṅgōvi hu puṇō puṇō ajjuṇaṁ niruvintō |
karuṇāparēṇa nīyā hariṇīvi hu ajjuṇēṇa niyaṭhāṇaṁ |
hariṇīi vaṭṭiyaṁ taṁ dinnō ya thaṇō taō tassa || 207 ||
bandhusirīē bhaṇiyaṁ maha hōi khillaṇaṁ ēyaṁ || 208 ||
tattō ya vāma-pāē baddhaṁ taṁ kōmalāi rajjūē |
hariṇīvi vigaya-viyaṇā bhaēṇa naṭṭhā tayaṁ mōttuṁ || 209 ||
miliyā kamalassa taō puṇō puṇō ēi tammi ṭhāṇammi |
sisu-nēhāō, na puṇō alliyaï bhaēṇa sā tattha || 210 ||
na caraï taṇaṁ na ya piyaï pāṇiyaṁ bhamaï khijjantī || 211 ||
bīyadiṇēvi hu hariṇiṁ durụdhullanti tahēva daṭṭhūṇaṁ |
aha sō bandhaṇa-mukkō gantuṁ māūṇa sabhaya-nēhāē |
miliō daṭṭhūṇa tayaṁ sāraṅgī nivvuyā jāyā || 213 ||
bandhusirīvi hu tattō nibaddha-maṇuyāuyā mayā pacchā |
iha uppannā bhaddē! dēvī kamalāvaī taṁ si || 215 ||
jāyā ya tumha dōṇhavi puvvabhavabbhāsaō garuya-pīī |
kamalō hariṇīē samaṁ viōiō jaṁ ca tattha khaṇamēgaṁ |
takkammudayā rannō jāō tumhaṁ saha viōgō || 217 ||
jaṁ ca kaō ēṇīē virahō līvēṇa aṭṭha pāhariō |
tattha ya taē nibaddhaṁ kammaṁ suya-viraha-dukkha-phalaṁ || 218 ||
udayāō tassa jāō virahō taṇaēṇa jāya-mēttēṇa |
khīṇaṁ ca tayaṁ sampaï aṭṭhahiṁ lakkhēhiṁ varisāṇaṁ || 219 ||
iya nāūṇa vivāgaṁ pamāya- nivvattiyassa kammassa |
iya guru-vayaṇaṁ sōuṁ parisā savvāvi tattha saṁviggā |
tattō ya amarakēū puttaṁ ahisiñciūṇa rajjammi |
aṇusāsiūṇa puttaṁ āpucchittā ya pariyaṇaṁ sayalaṁ |
rannā saha pavvaïyā khayara-narindāṇa dasa sahassāō |
tā bhaṇaï mayarakēū caraṇaṁ paḍivajjiuṁ asattō mhi |
gihi-pāuggaṁ dhammaṁ tā bhayavaṁ! amha sāhēsu || 233 ||
nisiranti jē na daṇḍaṁ tēvi hu pāvinti nivvāṇaṁ || 234 ||
thūlamasaccaṁ bhāsaṁ maṇa-vaï-kāēhiṁ jē na kappēnti |
tō bhaṇaï mayarakēū hōmi samatthō imaṁ kāu || 239 ||
viṇayaṁ guruṇa sammaṁ vēyāvaccaṁ ca savvēvi || 243 ||
akkhaliyaṁ ca vihāraṁ viyarittā muṇi-jaṇassa dēsēsu
annampi ēvamāiṁ visiṭṭha-lōyassa saṁmayaṁ jaṁ jaṁ |
niya-niya kālē savvaṁ taṁ taṁ kamasō pakuvvamāṇassa |
aha annayā kayāivi rayaṇīē rāiṇā saha pasuttā |
kila kōvi kasiṇa-sappō ḍasiūṇa mamaṁ narinda-sañjuttaṁ |
maha udarammi paviṭṭhō ēyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa paḍibuddhā || 27 ||
bhīyā jāva vicintaï na sundaraṁ handi! sumiṇamēyanti |
cī-vandaṇaṁ karittā paccakkhāṇaṁ ca taduciyaṁ kāuṁ |
tā vaḍhasu kiñci paṇhōttaranti, aha nara-vaī bhaṇaï || 41 ||
kō jāi nahē, ahilasaï kiṁ jaṇō, kattha vaccaï sasaṅkō? |
païdiyahaṁ saï kammi va surasundarī! salahijjaē pīī? || 42 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ rannā turiyaṁ laddhaṁ paṇhōttaraṁ imaṁ dēvi! |
tā bhaṇasu tumaṁ sampaï dēvīē tāhi saṁlattaṁ || 44 ||
kō tīsāē paḍhamō kammi va rāyā viṇassaï viṇaṭṭhō |
kiṁ sakkayaṁ vōlīṇaṁ kassa va daïō tuhaṁ nāha! || 45 ||
āmantijjaü lacchī kā vā gēyammi sūsarā hōi |
tumaē vidinna paṇhōttarassa tantāvalī kā vā? || 46 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ rannā avvō! dēvī paṇhōttarēsu aïkusalā |
jaṁ tantāvaliyāvi hu vihiyā paṇhōttaraṁ jhati? || 47 ||
vatthaṁ duhāṇulōmēṇa taha ya paḍilōmaō bhavē vatthaṁ |
aṇulōmēṇa samatthaṁ caüha kayaṁ dēvi tī-taṁ-tē || 48 ||
kiṁ savva-jaṇō icchaï sakkandaṇa-paharaṇaṁ ca bōhēsu |
pahiēhiṁ kiṁ va ghēppaï sāhijjaü dēvi! ēyampi? || 49 ||
āmantijjaü lacchī kattha vasantāṇa nāsaē buddhī |
kattha na nāsaï suhaḍō piyayama! sāhēsu ēyaṁ bhē? || 51 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ rannā sundari! paḍilōmaṁ vaḍḍhamāṇa vannamiṇaṁ |
‘saṁ-gā-mē’ iti, tattō, rannā bhaṇiyaṁ piē! bhaṇasu || 52 ||
kiṁ dharaï punna-candō, kiṁvā icchanti pāmarā khittē |
āmantasu anta-guruṁ kiṁvā sōkkhaṁ puṇō sōkkhaṁ? || 53 ||
kaha ṇu ramijjaï paḍhama para-mahilā jāra-purisēhiṁ? || 54 ||
surasundarīi cintiya bhaṇiyaṁ ēyampi jāṇiyaṁ dēva! |
aha puvva-vēriēṇavi sappēṇaṁ tēṇa dōṇṇivi jaṇāiṁ |
sappō sappotti payampirīi dēvīi kalayalaṁ sōccā |
pabhaṇaï piyaṁvayā vacca vacca lahu bāhuvēga! tumaṁ || 65 ||
maha vayaṇēṇa maggasu nayarē siri kuñjarāvattē || 66 ||
bhaṇasu ya jō sō vijjā-pasāhaṇujjaēṇa rakkhaṭṭhā |
tumaē nīō puvviṁ divva-maṇī maha samīvāō || 67 ||
sō ̣dhōijjaü sigdha iya bhaṇiō sō gaō turiya-vēgō |
tuṭṭhō nahayara-vaggō piyaṁvayā taha ya pariyaṇa-samaggā |
tā ērisammi cavalammi jīviē visaya-mōhiyā jīvā |
sura-sundarīvi dēvī diyahaṁ taṁ cēva paḍhamayaṁ kāuṁ |
jaha jaha vaḍḍhaï gabbhō taha taha dēvīvi gabbha-māhappā |
taṁ vivarīya-sarūvaṁ daṭṭhūṇa piyaṁvayā bhaṇaï bhaddē |
kīsa tumē ninnēhā bahu mannasi nēva rāyāṇaṁ? || 78 ||
tā gantuṁ nara-vaïṇō sāhijjasu jēṇa annahābhāvaṁ |
na karēi majjha uvariṁ viyaliya-nēhaṁ mamaṁ daṭṭhuṁ || 80 ||
annaṁ ca bhaṇasu daïyaṁ daṭṭhavvā nēva pāva-kammā haṁ |
jāva na jāi pasavō pāvaya-gabbhassa gabbhassa || 81 ||
taṁ sōuṁ rāyāvi hu vimhiya-cittō imaṁ bhaṇaï || 82 ||
avvō! jā maha virahaṁ dēvī nimisampi sọ̄dhumasamatthā |
sā gabbhassa pabhāvā adaṁsaṇaṁ niṭṭhurā mahaï || 83 ||
tā kiṁ na hōjja so cciya puvva-viruddhō subandhu-jīvō 'yaṁ |
tāva ya dēviṁ daṭṭhuṁ asuhajjhavasāya-dāruṇaṁ rannō |
mannē piya-mittā iva sāma-muhā sē thaṇā jāyā || 86 ||
savvēhivi garuyattaṁ pattaṁ na maētti laddha-patthāvaṁ |
puṭṭhō ya kahasu taṇayassa guṇa-gaṇaṁ ēyassa samaya-jāyassa |
ērisa-samaē jāō jaṇayassa na sundarō havaï bālō |
vaḍḍhantō piu-gēhē haṇaï kulaṁ rāya-lacchiṁ ca || 93 ||
dēva! na rūsēyavvaṁ jāva tumaṁ nēva pēcchasē ēyaṁ |
tāvacciya tuha kusalaṁ pāṇāṇavi saṁsaō diṭṭhē || 94 ||
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ bhaddaya! kō kōvō ēttha vatthu-paramatthē |
kaya-uvayārammi gaē sa-ṭṭhāṇaṁ aha nivēṇa vāhittā |
taṁ puṇa divva-vasēṇaṁ amhaṁ annārisaṁ jāyaṁ || 97 ||
tā bhaddē! taṁ gacchasu bālaṁ ghittūṇa dhāvi-sañjuttaṁ |
tīē tahatti bhaṇiuṁ nīō suranandaṇammi nayarammi |
jalakantassa u savvō tēṇavi bahu manniyā ēsā || 100 ||
kamasō pavaḍḍhamāṇō pattō sō jōvvaṇaṁ mayaṇavēgō |
ruvēṇa aṇaṅga-samō sūrō cāī piyaṁvaō dakkhō |
kassēsā vara-vilayā kassa va dhūyā ō kiṁnāmā? || 111 ||
tīē ya tiṇṇi taṇayā paḍhamō nahavāhaṇō, mayarakēū |
piuṇā saha pavvaïē jāē nahavāhaṇē, mayarakēū |
jāō rāyā sōvi ya viyaṇē vijjaṁ pasāhintō || 114 ||
tīē ēsā dhūyā kannā nāmēṇa mayaṇavēgatti |
ēyaṁ ca kumara! maggaï piyaṁyamāē piyayamassa || 117 ||
jalavēgō, kiṁ dinnā navitti sammaṁ na yāṇāmi || 118 ||
iya sōūṇa kumārō vajjaraï vasanta! suṇasu maha vayaṇaṁ |
ēyaṁ kannā-rayaṇaṁ viṇā u maha natthi jīyāsā || 119 ||
jaï jīviēṇa kajjaṁ ahayaṁ vā vallahō jaï ya tujjha |
tā gantūṇaṁ tāyaṁ taha bhaṇasu jahā lahuṁ lahaï || 120 ||
aha sō bāla-vayaṁsō nāūṇaṁ nicchayaṁ kumārassa |
gantūṇa ya taṁ rannō jahaṭṭhiyaṁ sāhaē savvaṁ || 121 ||
sōūṇa pāṇiggahaṇaṁ jalavēgō dumiō ya cittēṇa |
mitta! tumaṁ na viyāṇasi jēṭṭha-suō taṁ hi mayarakēussa |
avamanniō si mittaya! jaṇaēṇa tumaṁ suniṭṭhura-maṇēṇa |
tujjha kaṇiṭṭhō bhāyā juvarajjē jēṇa ahisittō || 127 ||
māyā-vittāṇi ya tujjha daṁsaṇaṁ kahavi nēya icchanti |
na ya lahasi tumaṁ gantuṁ tīi disāēvi jattha tuha jaṇaō |
tā piu-paribhūēṇaṁ vayaṁsa! kiṁ tujjha jīēṇa? || 129 ||
aha sō rōsa-vasaṭṭō pabhaṇaï daṁsēhi vēriyaṁ piyaraṁ |
daṁsēmi avannāē jēṇa phalaṁ tassa pāvassa || 131 ||
bhaṇaï taō jalakantō sō tujjha piyā aṇēga-khayarēhiṁ |
rūva-parivattiṇiṁ mitta! gēṇha ēyaṁ kulāgayaṁ vijjaṁ |
dinnā ya tēṇa vijjā rannaṁ gantūṇa sāhiyā kamasō |
mōttūṇa tīi rūvēṇa sō ṭhiō niva-vahaṭṭhāē || 135 ||
pāraddhammi ya suraē sahasā āyaḍ̣dhiūṇa karavālaṁ |
dōsa-paraddhō jamhā ahō! durantō imō dōsō || 142 ||
rāgāō hōi dōsō dōsāō hōi vēra-sambandhō |
ēvaṁ nāūṇa jaṇā rāga-ddōsāṇa vajjaṇaṁ kuṇaha |
cintēi ahō! dhaṭṭhā majjha vahaṭṭhā iha paviṭṭhā || 147 ||
dēvīvi vimhiya-maṇā bhaṇaï ya laliē! kimēvamāraddhaṁ |
pāvē! kēṇa paüttā duṭṭhēṇaṁ ghāiyā rannō? || 149 ||
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ itthīē sāhasaṁ ērisaṁ na sambhavaï |
tā dēvi! kōvi duṭṭhō diṭṭhō kālēṇa purisō 'yaṁ || 150 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ nivēṇa aṇuharaï dēvi! ēsō kumārassa || 152 ||
tā nūṇaṁ sō ēsō paḍhamō tuha puttaō na annotti |
tammi ya diṇammi suranandaṇāō jalakanta-santiō dūō |
sō vāhariō rannā puṭṭhō kiṁ bhadda! hōi sō ēsō |
sō jō piyaṁvayāē pāsē sampēsiō āsi? || 155 ||
bhaṇiyaṁ ca tēṇa ēvaṁ ēsō mayaṇavēgotti || 156 ||
sōūṇa tassa vayaṇaṁ rāyā sōyāurō vicintēī |
ajjavi puvva-viruddhō vaïrī paṭṭhiṁ na chaḍḍaï || 157 ||
dhī! saṁsāra-sahāvō puttōvi hu dāruṇō havaï vaïrī |
mantīhiṁ samaṁmantaṁ guttaṁ kāūṇa tāṇa vayaṇēṇaṁ |
sumaraï taṇayaṁ jēṭṭhaṁ kaṭṭha-harē saṇṭhiyaṁ nara-varindō |
cintaï hā! kaṭṭhaṁ na hu juttaṁ majjha ērisayaṁ || 162 ||
jaïvi hu kayāvarāhō dussīlō handi! nandaṇō majjha |
tahavi hu tammi niruddhē rajja-suhaṁ na pasaṁsāmi || 163 ||
pajjōsavaṇāvi hu maha na ya sujjhaï tammi bandhaṇa-ṭhiyammi |
muñcasu putta! visāyaṁ kuṇasu pasāyaṁ kumāra-bhuttīē |
paṭṭhaviō sōvi gaō amukka vērō niya-maṇammi || 166 ||
cintēi sō kayagdhō vivihōvāēhiṁ māraṇaṁ piuṇō |
rattīē lahaï niddaṁ na ya sō kūḍāiṁ cintēntō || 167 ||
tuṭṭhēṇa tēṇa dinnaṁ addissaṁ añjaṇaṁ tassa || 169 ||
mārēmi vēriyaṁ taṁ jēṇa maṇaṁ nivvuiṁ lahaï || 170 ||
ēsa maha rajja-lambhō hantavvō jaṁ piyā sa-hatthēṇa |
aha sō addissa-taṇū vañciya sayalampi rakkhaṇa-narōhaṁ |
duṭṭhaṁ apicchamāṇō ya nara-vaī takkhaṇēṇa nikkhantō |
pabhaṇaï rumbhaha dāṁraṁ addissō acchaē kōvi || 174 ||
dēsantāō pattā bhaṇanti parirakkhagā narā dēva! |
aha rāyā saṁviggō cintaï taṇayassa vilasiyaṁ ēyaṁ |
bhōgāsattō jiṇa-dhamma-vajjiō kahavi jaï maō hontō |
aṭṭa-jjhāṇōvagaō kā majjha gaī taō hontā? || 180 ||
aha annayā kayāivi vinnattō sō niutta-khayarēṇa |
taṁ sōuṁ saṁviggō pucchaï rāyā kahēhi mē bhayavaṁ! |
kiṁ vahaï vēra-bhāvaṁ maha puttō mayaṇavēgotti? || 185 ||
kattha va ciṭṭhaï sampaï, pabhaṇaï sūrī suṇēhi nara-nāha! |
jō sō subandhu-jīvō āsi surō kālabāṇō tē || 186 ||
uppannō vaṇa-mahisō davēṇa daḍ̣dhō maō rannē || 187 ||
jāō suṇaō tāva ya pañcama-divasē mayā jaṇaṇī || 188 ||
ḍasiō tēṇa nara-vara! paṇhōttara-vāvaḍō saha piyāē |
addissō haṇaï tumaṁ so cciya vaccō-harē taïyā || 193 ||
vaccāhārō tahiyaṁva sō ṭhiō dīharaṁ kālaṁ || 194 ||
rattīē niggaō sō naṭṭhō ya bhaēṇa tuha rāya! || 195 ||
jāyaṁ vēyaṇa-paüraṁ sampaï sō bhamaï dukkhattō || 196 ||
tāṇaṁ ca puvva-daïyā mittā tē tinnivi miliyā || 201 ||
ētthaṁrammi sūrī viharantō pāviō puriṁ campaṁ |
aha muṇiṇō vimhaïyā guruṇa sāhinti haraṇa-vuttantaṁ |
uvaüttō puvva-gaē nāuṁ taṁ vaïyaraṁ sūrī || 207 ||
vajjaraï gurū ajjā! vajjaha vēraṁ sudūrēṇa || 208 ||
jō sō mōhila-jīvō sumaṅgalō para-bhavammi ruṭṭhēṇa |
paraō mukkō taïyā hiḍantō maṇuya-virahiē rannē |
ḍasiō kukkuḍa-sappēṇa sō maō bhamaï saṁsārē || 210 ||
khaya-vāhīē mayammī suggīvē nara-vaī imō jāō |
kāūṇa ya bāla-tavaṁ jōisavāsī saṇiccharō jāō |
chiddaṁ gavēsayantō vigaha-pamattō ya vāyagō ajja |
sōūṇa sūri-vayaṇaṁ samaṇā samaṇī ya parama-saṁviggā |
bhaṇaï ya guru-āṇāē dhaṇadēva-juō ahaṁ tu pēyavaṇē |
tahiyaṁ ya na sō diṭṭhō diṭṭhā ya ciyā phuranta-iṅgālā |
pēyavaṇē paḍimatthaṁ piyaraṁ daṭṭhaṇa cintaē pāvō |
dāruya-bhariyaṁ sagaḍaṁ bhaggaṁ mōttūṇa tattha sāgaḍiō |
jāē tamandhayāraṁ tahi ō kaṭṭhēṁhiṁ tēṁṇa pāvēṇa |
dēhaṁ sa dahaï sihī sukka-jjhāṇēṇa sōvi kammāiṁ |
dēvēhiṁ kayā mahimā mōkkhaṁ pattāṇi kālēṇa || 228 ||
tā bhō bhavvā! ujjhaha rāga-ddōsē mahā-sattū || 229 ||
ittha ya kahā samappaï surasundari-nāmiyā purā bhaṇiyā |
niya-attha-payāṇēvi hu rasa-rahiyāō na dinti sabbhāvaṁ |
āsattaṁ suviyaḍ̣dhāṇa māṇasaṁ jaïvi aṇudiṇaṁ nūṇaṁ |
tahavi hu maha vinnattiṁ suṇantu iha sajjaṇā saralā || 234 ||
aviyaḍạdhāvi viyaḍ̣dhā jaha hōi tahā jaïjjāha || 236 ||
sīsō tassa suhammō tattō jambū taō ya pabhavotti |
ēvaṁ sūrīṇa paramparāē tā jāva vaïrotti || 238 ||
sāhāē tassa sūrī jiṇēsarō nāma āsi vikkhāō |
tattō ya nimmala-guṇō ujjhāō allaō nāma || 239 ||
sīsō ya tassa sūrī sūrōvva sayāvi jaṇiya-dōsantō |
rāgō ya jassa dhammē āsi paōsō ya jassa pāvammi |
tullō ya mitta-sattusu tassa ya jāyā duvē sīsā || 241 ||
tassa siri buddhisāgarasūrī ya sahōyarō bīō || 245 ||
tēsiṁ sīsa-varō dhaṇēsara-muṇī ēyaṁ kahaṁ pāyaḍaṁ caḍḍāvalli-purī-ṭhiō sa-guruṇō āṇāē pāḍhantarā |
kāsī vikkama-vaccharammi ya gaē bāṇaṅka-sunnōḍupē māsē bhaddavaē gurummi kasiṇē bīyā-dhaṇiṭṭhā-diṇē || 249 ||
